src: 本文件代替 GB 18030 一 2005 信息技术 ”中文编码字符集与 GB 18030 一 2005 相比,除结构调整和编辑性改动外,主要扩术变化如下:

final_translation: This document replaces GB 18030-2005 "Information technology - Chinese character encoding". Compared to GB 18030-2005, the main technical changes are as follows, excluding structural adjustments and editorial changes:

src: 增加了本文件适用对象(见第 1 章)，

src: 在双字节编码区更改了 10 个竖排标点和8 个汉字构件所对应的 GB/I 13000 代码位置,并其除了 6 个重复编码的汉字构件和 9 个重复编码的汉字( 见附录 D,2005 年版的附录A)，
ref: The GB/I 13000 code areas for 10 vertical accentuation marks, 8 Chinese character components, 6 drearily coded Chinese character components, and 9 tediously coded Chinese characters are adjusted within the double-byte coding locale (see Reference section D, Reference section A of the 2005 version),
draft_translation: 10 vertical punctuation marks and 8 Chinese character components in the double-byte encoding area have been modified, and the GB/I 13000 code positions corresponding to these have been changed. Additionally, 6 repeated Chinese character components and 9 repeated Chinese characters have been excluded (see Appendix D, Appendix A of the 2005 edition).
final_translation: 10 vertical punctuation marks and 8 Chinese character components in the double-byte encoding area have been modified, and the GB 13000 code positions corresponding to these have been changed. Additionally, 6 repeated Chinese character components and 9 repeated Chinese characters have been excluded (see Appendix D, Appendix A of the 2005 edition).

src: 在四字节编码区更改了18 个 GB/T 13000 代码位置(见附录 D,2005 年版的附录D);

draft_translation: 18 GB/T 13000 code points in the four-byte encoding area have been modified (see Appendix D, 2005 edition Appendix D);
final_translation: 18 GB/T 13000 code points in the four-byte encoding region have been modified (see Appendix D of the 2005 edition).

final_translation: Information Expansion "Chinese Encoding Character Set "

src: 1 本文件规定了信息技术用的中文图形字符及甚二进制编码的十六进制表示 。
ref: The hexadecimal representation of Chinese graphic characters and even binary codes used in information technology are described in this document.
draft_translation: This document specifies Chinese graphic characters for information technology and their hexadecimal representation in binary code.
final_translation: This document specifies Chinese graphic characters for information technology and their hexadecimal representation of binary code.

src: 本文件适用于中文和其他文字图形字符信息的处理、交换、存储、传给、显现 、输入和输出。
ref: The processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input, and output of Chinese and other graphic character information are covered by this document.
draft_translation: This document applies to the processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input, and output of information containing Chinese and other text graphics characters.
final_translation: This document applies to the processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input, and output of information containing Chinese and other text and graphics characters.

src: 本文件适用于为具备中文和其他文字图形字符信息化处理及交换功能的技术类产品,包括但不限于以输入法、光学字符识别 (OCR)、编辑 校对、机融翻诺、语音合成、文字转写、乔能写作等为代表的软件产品 , 以及以计算机、通信终端设备、电子书阅读毅、学习机等为代表的便件产品 。
ref: This document covers technical products that process and exchange information in Chinese and other characters, including OCR, editing, translation, speech synthesis, and computer and communication equipment.
draft_translation: This document applies to technical products with functions for the information processing and exchange of Chinese and other text graphics characters, including but not limited to software products represented by input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, speech synthesis, text transcription, and intelligent writing, as well as portable products represented by computers, communication terminal devices, e-readers, and learning machines.
final_translation: This document applies to technical products with functions for the information processing and exchange of Chinese and other text and graphical characters, including but not limited to software products represented by input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, speech synthesis, text transcription, and intelligent writing, as well as portable products represented by computers, communication terminal devices, e-readers, and learning machines.

src: 其中, 注日期的引用文件,仅该日期对应的版本适用于本文件;不注日期的引用文件,其最新厂本(包括所有的修改单)适用于本文件。
ref: Only the version that corresponds to the reference's date applies to this document for references that are dated; for references that are not dated, the most recent version (including any revisions) applies to this document.
draft_translation: The referenced documents with dates specified apply only to the version corresponding to that date; those without specified dates apply the latest edition (including all amendments) to this document.
final_translation: Documents with dates specified apply only to the version corresponding to that date; documents without specified dates apply the latest edition (including all amendments) to this document.

ref: This file contains characters that are single-byte, double-word, or four-byte encoded.
draft_translation: The characters included in this document are encoded in single-byte, double-byte, or quadruple-byte formats.
final_translation: The characters included in this document are encoded in single-byte, double-byte, or four-byte formats.

src: 单字节部分收录了 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的 0x00~0x7F 全部 128 个字符 。
ref: The single-byte portion includes all 128 characters in GB/T 11383-1989, from 0x00 to 0x7F.

final_translation: The single-byte section includes all 128 characters from 0x00 to 0x7F as specified in GB/T 11383-1989.

ref: 4.3 Double-byte part
draft_translation: 4.3 Double-byte section
final_translation: 4.3 Double-byte part

src: 双字节部分收录了 GB/T 2312 一 1980 中的全部图形字符 GB/T 13000 中的CJK 统一汉字以及部分图形字符。
ref: All of the graphic characters in GB/T 2312-1980, CJK unified Chinese characters, and portions of the graphic characters in GB/T 13000 are included in the double-byte component.
draft_translation: The double-byte section includes all graphic characters from GB/T 2312-1980, CJK unified characters from GB/T 13000, as well as some graphic characters.
final_translation: The double-byte character set includes all graphic characters from GB/T 2312-1980, CJK unified characters from GB/T 13000, as well as some graphic characters.

src: 双字节部分的字符按照附录 A 的规定。
ref: In Appendix A, the characters in the double-byte section are listed.
draft_translation: The characters in the double-byte section are governed by the provisions of Appendix A.
final_translation: The characters in the double-byte section are regulated by the provisions of Appendix A.

src: 其中,表意文字描述符的图形、代码位置和功能应符合附录 B 的规定 。
ref: Among these, the Appendix B requirements must be followed for the graphics, code places, and functions of ideographic descriptors.
draft_translation: The graphical representation, code position, and function of the ideographic descriptor should comply with the specifications in Appendix B.
final_translation: The graphical representation, code location, and function of the ideographic descriptor should comply with the specifications in Appendix B.

src: 注: GB/T 13000 对中国、日本、恩国、越南等国家和地区使用的汉字统一编码。
ref: Note: The standard Chinese character encoding used in China, Japan, Taiwan, Vietnam, and other nations and regions is called GB/T 13000.
draft_translation: Note: GB/T 13000 unifies the encoding of Chinese characters used in China, Japan, Korea, Vietnam, and other countries and regions.
final_translation: Note: GB/T 13000 unifies the encoding of Chinese characters used in China, Japan, Korea, Vietnam, and other countries and regions.

src: 具备独有抽象字形的汉字,赋予单独的代码位置;来源不同而抽象字形相同的汉字, 则赋予共用的代码位置。
ref: Chinese characters with distinctive abstract glyphs are given their own code positions, while characters with the same abstract glyph but from various sources are given a similar code position.
draft_translation: Chinese characters with unique abstract shapes are assigned separate code positions; Chinese characters from different sources that share the same abstract shape are assigned shared code positions.
final_translation: Chinese characters with unique abstract character shapes are assigned separate code positions; Chinese characters from different sources that share the same abstract character shape are assigned shared code positions.

src: 经过编码的汉字称为CJK 统一汉字 CCJK Unified Ideographs,其中 CJK 表示中国、日本、韩国。
ref: CJK stands for China, Japan, and Korea, and the encoded Chinese characters are referred to as CJK unified Chinese characters or CCJK Unified Ideographs.
draft_translation: CJK unified ideographs refer to Chinese characters that have been encoded. CJK stands for China, Japan, and Korea.
final_translation: CJK Unified Ideographs refer to encoded Chinese characters. CJK stands for China, Japan, and Korea.

src: 4.4 四字节部分
ref: 4.4 Four-byte part
draft_translation: 4.4 Four-Byte Section
final_translation: 4.4 Four-Byte Part

src: 四字节部分收录了上述双字节字符之外的 GB/T 13000 中的 66 个CJK统一汉字(9FA6 一 9FEF，不包括 9FB4~9FBB 的8个字符)、CJK 统一汉字扩充 A、CJK 统一汉字扩充 BCJK 统一汉字扩充 C、 CJK 统一汉字扩充 DCJK 统一汉字扩充下 .CJK 统一汉字扩充 F 和已经 在 GB/ 工 13000 中编码的少数民族文字的字符。
ref: The text lists various Chinese characters in different standards, including GB/T 13000, .CJK unified character extensions A and C/D, and expansions.
draft_translation: The four-byte section includes 66 CJK Unified Ideographs from GB/T 13000 (9FA6 to 9FEF, excluding the 8 characters from 9FB4 to 9FBB), CJK Unified Ideographs Extension A, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension B, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension C, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension D, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension E, CJK Unified Ideographs Extension F, and characters of minority languages that have already been encoded in GB/T 13000.
final_translation: The four-byte section includes 66 CJK Unified Ideographs from GB/T 13000 (9FA6–9FEF, excluding 9FB4–9FBB), CJK Unified Ideographs Extensions A–F, and characters of minority languages already encoded in GB/T 13000.

src: 四字节部分的字符按照附录 C 的规定 。
ref: The characters in the four-byte section adhere to Appendix C's rules.
draft_translation: The characters in the four-byte part are governed by the provisions of Appendix C.
final_translation: The characters in the four-byte section are subject to the provisions of Appendix C.

src: 5 总体结构
ref: 5 Overall structure
draft_translation: Overall Structure
final_translation: 5. Overall Structure

src: 正文中凡数字前标有 0x 的表示采用十六进制,未标有 0x 的表示采用十进制。
ref: The text uses hexadecimal notation for integers marked with a 0x, whereas decimal notation is used for values without a 0x.
draft_translation: The numbers in the main text that are prefixed with 0x are in hexadecimal format, while those without the 0x prefix are in decimal format.
final_translation: In the text, numbers marked with 0x are in hexadecimal format, while those without the 0x prefix are in decimal format.

src: 附录中凡编码的表示均采用十六进制,其他数字的表示均采用十进制。
ref: The appendix's codes are all expressed in hexadecimal, while decimal is used for all other values.
draft_translation: The representation of codes in the appendix is in hexadecimal, while other numbers are in decimal.
final_translation: The representation of codes in the appendix is in hexadecimal, while other numbers are in decimal.

src: 单字节部分采用 GB/T 11383 一 1989 的编码结构,使 用 0x00~0x7F 码位。
ref: The single-byte portion uses the GB/T 11383-1989 encoding scheme and the code points 0x00–0x7F.
draft_translation: The single-byte part uses the encoding structure specified in GB/T 11383-1989, using code positions 0x00 to 0x7F.
final_translation: The single-byte section uses the encoding structure specified in GB/T 11383-1989, using code range 0x00 to 0x7F.

src: 双字贡部分采用两个八位二进制位串表示一个字符,其首字节码位从 0x81 一 0xFE, 尾字节码位分别是 0x40 一 0x7E 和 0x80 一 0xFE。
ref: 1st byte: 0x81-0xFE, last byte: 0x40-0x7E, 0x80-0xFE double-word component uses two 8-bit binary strings for each letter.
draft_translation: The double-byte GB part uses two eight-bit binary strings to represent a character. The first byte code range is from 0x81 to 0xFE, and the second byte code ranges are 0x40 to 0x7E and 0x80 to 0xFE respectively.
final_translation: The GB double-byte encoding uses two eight-bit binary strings to represent a character. The first byte code range is from 0x81 to 0xFE, and the second byte code range is 0x40 to 0x7E and 0x80 to 0xFE respectively.

src: 四字节部分采用 GB/工 11383 一 1989 未采用的 0x30 一 0x39 作为对双字节编码扩充的后缀,编码范围为 0x81308130 一 0xFE39FE39。
ref: The coding range for the four-byte component is 0x81308130-0xFE39FE39, while the suffix used to expand the double-byte code is 0x30-0x39, which was not utilized in GB/Work 11383-1989.
draft_translation: The four-byte section uses 0x30-0x39 (as specified in GB/T 11383-1989) as a suffix for the extension of the double-byte encoding. The encoding range is 0x81308130 to 0xFE39FE39.
final_translation: The four-byte part uses 0x30-0x39 (as specified in GB/T 11383-1989) as a suffix for extending double-byte encoding. The encoding range is 0x81308130 to 0xFE39FE39.

src: 四字节字符的第一个字厄编码范围为 0x81 一 0xFE;第二个字记编码范围为 0x30 一 0x39; 第三个字节编码范围为 0x81 一 0xFE;第 四个字市编码范围为 0x30 一 0x39。 即 : 0x81308130 一 0x81308139; 0x81308230 一 0x81308239 0x8130FEFE30 一 0x8130FE39 ; 0x81318130 一 0x81318139 ; Oo2douolag0c “0URo23061393 0xFE39FE30 一 0xFE39FE39 。
ref: The first character of a four-byte character has an encoding range of 0x81-0xFE; the second character's range is 0x30-0x39; the third byte's range is 0x81-0xFE; and the fourth character's range is 0x30 A 0x39. Right now: 0x81308130-0x81308139; 0x81308230-0x81308239 0x8130FEFE30-0x8130FE39; 0x81318130-0x81318139; Oo2douolag0c "0URo23061393 0xFE39FE30-0xFE39FE39.
draft_translation: The first byte of a four-byte character is encoded in the range 0x81 to 0xFE; the second byte is encoded in the range 0x30 to 0x39; the third byte is encoded in the range 0x81 to 0xFE; the fourth byte is encoded in the range 0x30 to 0x39. That is: 0x81308130 to 0x81308139; 0x81308230 to 0x81308239; 0x8130FEFE30 to 0x8130FE39; 0x81318130 to 0x81318139; 0xFE39FE30 to 0xFE39FE39.
final_translation: The first byte of a four-byte character is encoded in the range 0x81 to 0xFE; the second byte is encoded in the range 0x30 to 0x39; the third byte is encoded in the range 0x81 to 0xFE; the fourth byte is encoded in the range 0x30 to 0x39. That is: 0x81308130 to 0x81308139; 0x81308230 to 0x81308239; 0x8130FEFE30 to 0x8130FE39; 0x81318130 to 0x81318139; 0xFE39FE30 to 0xFE39FE39.

src: 总体结构与码位范围分配见图 1 和表 1。
ref: Figure 1 and Table 1 display the general organization and allocation of code point ranges.
draft_translation: The overall structure and code position range allocation are shown in Figure 1 and Table 1.
final_translation: The overall structure and code position range allocation are shown in Figure 1 and Table 1.

You can use the `-c`, `-s`, or `-E` options to tell `geo` where to end. Note that certain combinations of options (such as `-x cpp-output -E`) may cause `geo` to compile or assemble the source file. By default, GCC replaces the source filename with `.o` when generating object files, and the `.ec` filename is used for the intermediate file. You can use the `-o` option to specify other names. GCC ignores any input files that follow the `-ec` option that it cannot recognize.

You can use the `-c`, `-S`, or `-E` options to tell GCC where to end. Note that certain combinations of options (such as `-x cpp-output -E`) may cause GCC to compile or assemble the source file. By default, GCC replaces the source filename with `.o` when generating object files, and the `.s` filename is used for the intermediate file. You can use the `-o` option to specify other names. It also disables the use of standard library functions even when they are available in the hosted environment, where the standard library is available and the main function returns an int value, which is typical for almost all programs except the kernel. In a free-standing environment, the standard library does not exist, and the entry point is not necessarily main. A clear example is the operating system kernel. For more details, refer to the latest information on the GCC website.
final_translation: This will disable certain non-ANSI C compatible features in GNU C, as well as features like unix and vax that are rarely used and indicate the use of ANSI trigraphs. In a free-standing environment, the standard library does not exist, and the entry point is not necessarily main. A clear example is the operating system kernel. For more details, refer to the latest information on the GCC website.

src: 促成这两地危机的是制造简单和生产成本低，此外还有对曲马多和许多芬太尼类似物或其前体缺乏国际监管。
ref: The ease of production, low cost, and absence of international regulation of tramadol and several fentanyl analogs or their forerunners all contribute to the situation in both places.
draft_translation: The cause of the crisis in these two places is the simplicity of production and low manufacturing costs, as well as the lack of international regulation for tramadol and many fentanyl analogs or their precursors.
final_translation: The cause of the crisis in these two places is the simplicity of production and low manufacturing costs, as well as the lack of international regulation for tramadol and many fentanyl analogs or their precursors.

src: 使这两地危机恶化的是这些物质在药品市场和非法市场上都有供应，因而更加难以发现和防止其滥用。
ref: The availability of these medications in both prescription and illegal markets, which makes it more challenging to identify and stop abuse, exacerbates the situation in both locations.
draft_translation: The factor that worsened the crises in both places is that these substances are available in both the pharmaceutical market and the illegal market, making it more difficult to detect and prevent their abuse.
final_translation: The factor that worsened the crises in both places is that these substances are available in both the pharmaceutical market and the illegal market, making it more difficult to detect and prevent their abuse.

src: 兴奋剂使用不断增多
ref: An increase in doping use
draft_translation: Increasing use of performance-enhancing drugs
final_translation: Increasing use of performance-enhancing drugs

src: 兴奋剂领域以可卡因和甲基苯丙胺为主，这两种物质在其主要市场的使用量都在上升。
ref: Cocaine and methamphetamine, which both have rising use in their key areas, dominate the stimulant market.
draft_translation: The illicit drug market is primarily dominated by cocaine and methamphetamine, with the usage of both substances increasing in their main markets.
final_translation: The illicit drug market is primarily dominated by cocaine and methamphetamine, with the usage of both substances increasing in their main markets.

src: 2018年使用可卡因的约有1,900万人，因为可卡因在北美和西欧颇为流行。
ref: In 2018, about 19 million people used cocaine, as it is widely utilized in Western Europe and North America.
draft_translation: About 19 million people used cocaine in 2018, as cocaine is quite popular in North America and Western Europe.
final_translation: About 19 million people used cocaine in 2018, as cocaine is quite popular in North America and Western Europe.

src: 同年使用苯丙胺的约有2,700万人，其中甲基苯丙胺是东南亚和北美使用最多的苯丙胺类兴奋剂。
ref: In the same year, 27 million people took amphetamines, with methamphetamine being the most popular ATS in North America and South-East Asia.
draft_translation: Approximately 27 million people used amphetamines in the same year, with methamphetamine being the most commonly used amphetamine stimulant in Southeast Asia and North America.
final_translation: Approximately 27 million people used amphetamines in the same year, with methamphetamine being the most commonly used amphetamine in Southeast Asia and North America.

src: 根据所掌握的多数指标，20年来这两个区域甲基苯丙胺的使用一直在扩大。
ref: Most indicators show that methamphetamine usage has been rising in both regions for the past 20 years.
draft_translation: The use of methamphetamine in these two regions has been expanding for the past 20 years based on the majority of available indicators.
final_translation: The use of methamphetamine in these two regions has been expanding for the past 20 years based on the majority of available indicators.

src: 在一些市场上，可卡因和甲基苯丙胺可以共存，有时是相互替代，这样一种药物的使用量上升时另一种药物的使用量就下降，有时是同时增加和减少以满足同一市场的需求。
ref: Cocaine and methamphetamine can coexist in some markets, occasionally substituting for one another, causing the use of one drug to climb while the usage of the other lowers, or occasionally both rising and falling to satisfy demand in the same market.
draft_translation: In some markets, cocaine and methamphetamine can coexist, often as substitutes for each other. When the use of one drug increases, the use of the other may decrease. Sometimes both drugs increase or decrease simultaneously to meet the demand of the same market.
final_translation: In some markets, cocaine and methamphetamine can coexist, often as substitutes for each other. When the use of one drug increases, the use of the other may decrease. Sometimes both drugs increase or decrease simultaneously to meet the demand of the same market.

src: 新冠肺炎使注射吸毒者的风险增高
ref: COVID-19 increases risk for injecting drug users
draft_translation: The risk for injection drug users has increased due to the novel coronavirus
final_translation: The risk for injection drug users has increased due to the coronavirus

src: 据估计，2018年注射吸毒的约有1,130万人，全球艾滋病毒感染约有10%是注射吸毒造成的。
ref: In 2018, it was projected that 11,300 thousand people used injectable drugs, and 10% of HIV infections worldwide are linked to injecting drug usage.
draft_translation: It is estimated that about 11.3 million people injected drugs in 2018, and about 10% of global HIV infections are caused by injection drug use.
final_translation: It is estimated that about 11.3 million people injected drugs in 2018, and about 10% of global HIV infections are caused by drug use.

src: 注射吸毒者感染艾滋病毒的超过100万人，患丙型肝炎的有550万人。
ref: HIV infects more than 1 million drug injectors, while hepatitis C affects 5,500 thousand.
draft_translation: More than 1 million people who inject drugs have been infected with HIV, and over 5 million have hepatitis C.
final_translation: More than 1 million people who inject drugs have been infected with HIV, and over 5 million have hepatitis C.

src: 2017年，因吸毒死亡的约有 58.5万人，其中一半死于丙型肝炎引起的肝病，而注射吸毒者的丙型肝炎大多仍未得到治疗。
ref: Half of the estimated 0.585 million drug-related deaths in 2017 were attributable to liver illness brought on by hepatitis C, which is largely untreated among injecting drug users.
draft_translation: In 2017, approximately 585,000 people died from drug-related causes, with half of them dying from liver disease caused by hepatitis C. Most hepatitis C cases among injection drug users remain untreated.
final_translation: In 2017, approximately 585,000 people died from drug-related causes, with half of them dying from liver disease caused by hepatitis C. Most hepatitis C cases among injection drug users remain untreated.

src: 5 新冠肺炎限制措施造成的类阿片短缺可能导致使用者代之以酒精或苯二氮类药物等更容易获得的物质，或者将类阿片与合成药物混合。
ref: 5 Users may substitute more readily available substances, such as alcohol or benzodiazepines, or combine opioids with synthetic narcotics as a result of opioid shortages brought on the COVID-19 regulations.
draft_translation: The class of opioid shortages caused by the restrictions of the new coronavirus may lead users to substitute for more readily available substances such as alcohol or benzodiazepines, or to mix opioids with synthetic drugs.
final_translation: Opioid shortages caused by new coronavirus restrictions may lead users to substitute more readily available substances such as alcohol or benzodiazepines, or to mix opioids with synthetic drugs.

src: 随着一些使用者改用注射或更频繁地注射，可能会出现更多有害的使用方式。
ref: Some users switching to injections or injecting more regularly may lead to the emergence of more hazardous patterns of usage.
draft_translation: As some users switch to injections or inject more frequently, there may be more harmful usage patterns.
final_translation: As some users switch to injections or inject more frequently, there may be more harmful usage patterns.

src: 欧盟峰会为难民政策争论，欧盟官员：接收过程步步瓶颈-中新网

final_translation: EU Summit Sparks Debate on Refugee Policy, EU Officials Say the Reception Process Is Encountering Bottlenecks at Every Step - China News Society

src: 欧盟峰会为难民政策争吵不休，欧盟官员：接收过程每一步都存在瓶颈
ref: Conflicts over refugee policy at the EU summit amongst EU officials; obstacles at every stage of the admission process
draft_translation: The EU summit is in turmoil over refugee policies, EU officials say the reception process is blocked at every step.
final_translation: The EU summit is in turmoil over refugee policies, EU officials say the reception process is stuck at every step.

src: 【环球时报驻比利时特派记者 牛瑞飞】据法新社2月10日报道，在当天最新的一次欧盟峰会上，欧盟委员会主席冯德莱恩表示，欧盟领导人同意就非法移民问题出台更严格的政策，以此更易于驱逐非法移民。
ref: Global Times' Niu Ruifei reports tighter rules on illegal immigration enacted at the recent EU summit, according to President Ursula von der Leyen, deporting illegal immigrants is easier now.
draft_translation: According to a report by AFP on February 10, at the latest EU summit, EU Commission President Von der Leyen said that EU leaders agreed to implement stricter policies on illegal immigration, making it easier to expel illegal immigrants.
final_translation: According to a report by AFP on February 10, at the most recent EU summit, EU Commission President Von der Leyen said that EU leaders agreed to implement stricter policies on illegal immigration to facilitate the expulsion of undocumented migrants.

src: 据报道，欧盟此举是对欧洲日益增长的非法移民问题关注的回应，如今，欧盟的核心问题在于，最终能被遣返的非法移民人数很少。
ref: The EU's action, according to reports, is a reaction to growing worries over illegal immigration in Europe, which is now the main cause of the EU's poor deportation rate of illegal immigrants.
draft_translation: The report says that the EU's actions are a response to the growing issue of illegal immigration in Europe. Now, the core problem of the EU is that few illegal immigrants can be repatriated in the end.
final_translation: The report states that the EU's actions are a response to the growing issue of illegal immigration in Europe. However, the EU's core issue lies in the fact that few illegal immigrants can be repatriated eventually.

src: 根据峰会文件，欧盟领导人呼吁委员会“立即调动大量欧盟资金”，以基础设施和监视等手段加强外部边界。
ref: EU leaders requested the Commission to "quickly mobilize substantial EU funding," including through infrastructure and monitoring, to bolster external borders, according to the summit document.
draft_translation: The EU leaders called on the Commission to "immediately mobilize a large amount of EU funds" to strengthen the external borders through means such as infrastructure and surveillance, according to the summit document.
final_translation: The EU leaders called on the Commission to "immediately mobilize a large amount of EU funds" to strengthen the external borders through means such as infrastructure and surveillance, according to the summit document.

src: 然而，欧盟与各成员国就围栏费用支付等问题争吵不休。
ref: Yet, the EU and member states have clashed over matters including how to pay for the fence.
draft_translation: However, the EU and its member states have been in constant dispute over issues such as the payment of fence costs.
final_translation: However, the EU and its member states have been in disputes over issues like the payment of fence fees.

src: 冯德莱恩一再表示，欧盟资金不会支付相关费用。
ref: The expenditures will not be covered by EU funding, according to Von der Leyen.
draft_translation: Reinhardt has repeatedly stated that the EU funds will not cover the related costs.
final_translation: Ursula von der Leyen has repeatedly stated that EU funds will not cover the related costs.

src: 但一些成员国的外交官员称，如果欧盟能分担外部边界沿线安装摄像头、瞭望塔和其他基础设施的部分，这将给各国腾出国家预算从而加快建设进程。
ref: The installation of cameras, watchtowers, and other infrastructure along the EU's external borders would free up national funds and move along more quickly, according to diplomats in several member states.
draft_translation: However, some member states' foreign officials stated that if the EU could take on part of the responsibility for installing cameras, observation towers, and other infrastructure along the external borders, it would free up national budgets for countries to accelerate the construction process.
final_translation: However, some member states' foreign officials stated that if the EU could take on part of the responsibility for installing cameras, observation towers, and other infrastructure along the external borders, it would free up national budgets to accelerate the construction process.

src: 欧洲Euractiv网站称，欧盟官员承认，难民接收过程每一步都存在瓶颈，有限的接收能力和成员国不堪重负的移民当局无法阻止难民在欧盟各国提交“无数”庇护申请，欧盟的难民接收系统处于近乎“永久性的危机”中。
ref: EU authorities acknowledge that there are bottlenecks at every stage of the refugee admission procedure, according to the European Euractiv website, a "Permanent Crisis."
draft_translation: The Euractiv website reports that EU officials acknowledge that the refugee reception process is bottlenecked at every step. With limited reception capacity and overwhelmed immigration authorities in member states, it is impossible to prevent refugees from submitting "numerous" asylum applications in various EU countries. The EU's refugee reception system is nearly in a "permanent crisis."
final_translation: The Euractiv website reports that EU officials acknowledge the refugee reception process is bottlenecked at every step. With limited reception capacity and overwhelmed immigration authorities in member states, it is impossible to prevent refugees from submitting "innumerable" asylum applications across EU countries. The EU's refugee reception system is in a nearly permanent crisis.

src: 据欧盟委员会估计，欧盟的申根国家去年收到超92万份庇护申请，比前一年增加近半。
ref: According to estimates from the European Commission, the Schengen member states of the EU received more than 920,000 asylum claims in 2017—a nearly 50% rise from the year before.
draft_translation: The European Commission estimates that more than 920,000 asylum applications were received by Schengen countries in the EU last year, an increase of nearly half compared to the previous year.
final_translation: The European Commission estimates that more than 920,000 asylum applications were received by Schengen countries in the EU last year, an increase of nearly half compared to the previous year.

src: 与此同时，欧盟去年记录到超 33万次非法入境。
ref: Almost 330,000 illicit entry were noted by the European Union last year.
draft_translation: At the same time, the EU recorded more than 330,000 cases of illegal entry last year.
final_translation: At the same time, the EU recorded more than 330,000 cases of illegal entry last year.

src: 在该背景下，此次峰会还就一项“原则”达成协议，即欧盟国家可根据另一个成员国的法院判决将非法移民遣返回国。
ref: In light of this, the summit also adopted the "principle" that member states of the EU may remove unlawful immigrants in accordance with a court ruling in another member state.
draft_translation: The summit also reached an agreement on a "principle" that EU member states may return illegal immigrants to their home countries based on a court decision from another member state.
final_translation: The summit also reached an agreement on a "principle" that EU member states may return illegal immigrants to their home countries based on a court decision from another member state.

src: 此外，报道称，欧盟领导人还同意“增加对安全国家概念的使用”，这将为欧盟制定共同清单开辟道路。
ref: The article also stated that EU leaders decided to "expand the use of the notion of a safe state," which will allow the EU to create a standard list.
draft_translation: Additionally, it is reported that EU leaders also agreed to "increase the use of the concept of safe countries," which will pave the way for the EU to establish a common list.
final_translation: Additionally, it is reported that EU leaders also agreed to "increase the use of the concept of safe states," which will pave the way for the EU to create a common list.

final_translation: Source: Global Times, Author: Niu Ruifei

final_translation: U.S. Escalates "Chip War," Severely Hammers Global Semiconductor Industry - China News Society

src: 最近，美国对华“芯片战”大有升级之势——先是荷兰、日本两国在美国施压下，同意启动对华半导体制造设备出口的管制；后有外媒报道，美国政府正考虑切断美国供应商与华为公司之间的所有联系，禁止美国供应商向华为提供任何产品；拜登政府还准备公布一项行政命令，限制美国对敏感的中国科技行业的投资……2023年开年不久，美国在遏制中国半导体相关产业发展上就恶招不断。
ref: US-China "chip war" to escalate, under US pressure, the Netherlands and Japan agreed to restrict semiconductor machinery exports to China, US may end all relations with Huawei & ban US use, ban on Huawei products, Biden admin ready to issue order limiting US, investment in sensitive C, 2023 is coming soon, the US continues to stifle China's semiconductor sectors.
draft_translation: Recently, the "chip war" between the United States and China is showing signs of escalation—first, under U.S. pressure, the Netherlands and Japan agreed to initiate restrictions on the export of semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China; then, media reports indicated that the U.S. government is considering cutting all ties between U.S. suppliers and Huawei, prohibiting U.S. suppliers from providing any products to Huawei; the Biden administration is also preparing to announce an executive order to restrict U.S. investments in sensitive Chinese technology sectors... Just a few weeks into 2023, the U.S. has already launched a series of harsh measures to curb the development of China's semiconductor-related industries.
final_translation: Recently, the "chip war" between the United States and China is showing signs of escalation—first, under U.S. pressure, the Netherlands and Japan agreed to impose restrictions on the export of semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China; then, media reports indicated that the U.S. government is considering cutting all ties between U.S. suppliers and Huawei, prohibiting U.S. suppliers from providing any products to Huawei; the Biden administration is also preparing to announce an executive order to restrict U.S. investments in sensitive Chinese technology sectors... Early in 2023, the U.S. has already launched a series of harsh measures to curb the development of China's semiconductor-related industries.

src: 近年来，美国打击中国“芯”发展的动作从未停歇，一边精准打压对华半导体产供链，一边构建“去中国化”的半导体产业链联盟，图谋在先进半导体产业上彻底“甩开”中国。
ref: US sanctions limit China's semiconductor industry and create de-Sinicization alliance, none - "China" is already the shortest possible version of its name.
draft_translation: In recent years, the United States has never ceased its efforts to hinder China's development of semiconductor technology. On one hand, it has precisely targeted China's semiconductor supply chain, and on the other hand, it has built a semiconductor industry chain alliance aimed at "de-Chinese-izing" the sector, seeking to completely "outrun" China in advanced semiconductor industries.
final_translation: In recent years, the United States has not ceased its efforts to hinder China's development of semiconductor technology. On one hand, it has targeted China's semiconductor supply chain, and on the other hand, it has built a semiconductor industry alliance aimed at "de-Chinese" the sector, seeking to completely outpace China in advanced semiconductor industries.

src: 无论是拉拢韩国建立“技术同盟”，还是与韩国、日本和中国台湾地区建立芯片“四方联盟”，亦或借由美日印澳“四边机制”“印太经济框架”等机制建立半导体产业链“小圈子”，美国通过把政治化、阵营化、武器化的手段引入半导体产业，企图搭建美国主导的封闭产供链循环，从而弥补其在芯片制造领域的短板，维护其在全球芯片产业的优势地位。
ref: Whether it be to convince South Korea to create a "specialized organization together," or to make a chip "quadrate alliance" with South Korea, Japan, and Taiwan, or to set up a semiconductor industry chain through components such as the "four-party component" of the Joined together States, Japan, India, and Australia, and the "Indo-Pacific Financial System".
draft_translation: Whether it is luring South Korea to establish a "technological alliance," or forming a "chip quadrilateral" with South Korea, Japan, and Taiwan, or building a "semiconductor supply chain circle" through mechanisms such as the "Quadrilateral Security Dialogue" and the "Indo-Pacific Economic Framework," the United States is introducing politicization, bloc-building, and militarization into the semiconductor industry. It aims to establish a closed supply chain cycle dominated by the United States, thereby compensating for its shortcomings in chip manufacturing and maintaining its dominant position in the global semiconductor industry.
final_translation: Whether it is luring South Korea to establish a "technological alliance," or forming a "chip quadrilateral" with South Korea, Japan, and Taiwan, or building a "semiconductor supply chain circle" through mechanisms such as the "Quadrilateral Mechanism" and the "Indo-Pacific Economic Framework," the United States is introducing politicization, bloc-building, and militarization into the semiconductor industry. It aims to establish a closed supply chain cycle dominated by the United States, thereby compensating for its shortcomings in chip manufacturing and maintaining its dominant position in the global semiconductor industry.

src: 然而，美国大张旗鼓的对华“芯战术”，也是“伤敌一千自损八百”。
ref: The US, however, also uses "harm to the enemy by one thousand and self-injury by eight hundred" as one of its "fundamental tactics" against China.
draft_translation: However, the United States' bold "chip strategy" against China is also a case of "killing one and losing eight."
final_translation: However, the United States' aggressive "chip strategy" against China is also a case of "killing one and losing eight."

src: 最近，美国知名芯片制造设备供应商泛林集团宣布，受最新一轮对华芯片制造设备出口禁令影响，集团将解雇1300名全职员工，未来两个季度还计划解雇1400名临时员工。
ref: The recent round of export restrictions on chip manufacturing equipment to China have caused the Lam Group, a well-known supplier of chip manufacturing equipment in the United States, to announce that it will be forced to lay off 1,300 full-time employees and 1,400 temporary workers over the course of the next two quarters.
draft_translation: The recent announcement by Lam Research, a well-known chip manufacturing equipment supplier in the United States, states that due to the latest round of export restrictions on chip manufacturing equipment to China, the company will lay off 1,300 full-time employees and plans to lay off an additional 1,400 temporary employees in the next two quarters.

src: 全球光刻机巨头荷兰阿斯麦控股公司最近警告，禁止向中国出口半导体制造设备，可能导致半导体价格上涨。
ref: ASML, a leading manufacturer of lithography equipment worldwide, recently issued a warning that the Chinese export restriction on semiconductor production equipment would result in increased semiconductor pricing.
draft_translation: Global photolithography giant ASML Holding NV recently warned that banning the export of semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China could lead to a rise in semiconductor prices.
final_translation: Global photolithography giant ASML Holding N.V. recently warned that banning the export of semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China could lead to a rise in semiconductor prices.

src: 美媒分析，在美国政府对中国芯片和半导体等行业实施蛮横打压后，许多美国公司深受其害，包括电子设计自动化工具开发商、芯片设计商、晶圆制造设备生产商、芯片制造商本身等。
ref: US companies that make electronic design automation tools, chips, and wafer manufacturing equipment suffered greatly when the US government suppressed China's chip and semiconductor industries.
draft_translation: US media analysis indicates that after the US government has imposed harsh pressure on China's chip and semiconductor industries, many US companies have been severely affected, including electronic design automation tool developers, chip designers, wafer manufacturing equipment producers, and chip manufacturers themselves.

src: 美国所谓打压中国先进半导体产业，却把全球半导体产业链、供应链拖下了水。
ref: The worldwide semiconductor industry chain and supply chain have been negatively impacted by the alleged American suppression of China's sophisticated semiconductor industry.
draft_translation: The so-called suppression of China's advanced semiconductor industry by the United States has dragged the global semiconductor industry and supply chain down with it.
final_translation: The so-called suppression of China's advanced semiconductor industry by the United States has dragged the global semiconductor industry and supply chain down.

src: 半导体产业是高技术和知识密集型产业，早已形成联系紧密的全球半导体产业链。
ref: The semiconductor industry is a high-tech, knowledge-intensive sector of the economy, and a globally interconnected chain of the semiconductor industry has long developed.
draft_translation: Semiconductor industry is a high-tech and knowledge-intensive industry that has already formed a closely connected global semiconductor supply chain.
final_translation: Semiconductor industry is a high-tech and knowledge-intensive industry that has already formed a closely connected global semiconductor supply chain.

src: 据专业人士估算，基于专业化分工，半导体产品的整个生产过程需要跨越各国边境70次以上，全程达到100天。
ref: Using specialized division of labor, experts estimate that the complete production process for semiconductor devices requires crossing international borders more than 70 times and takes 100 days.
draft_translation: The professionals estimate that, based on specialized division of labor, the entire production process of semiconductor products crosses national borders more than 70 times, taking a total of 100 days.
final_translation: The professionals estimate that, based on specialized division of labor, the entire production process of semiconductor products crosses the borders of various countries more than 70 times, taking a total of 100 days.

src: 尽管美国半导体产业基础较强，但在制造能力特别是先进制程工艺上较为薄弱，严重依赖东亚地区。
ref: Although the US semiconductor sector has a solid base, its manufacturing capabilities, particularly in terms of modern manufacturing techniques, are relatively limited, and it mainly depends on East Asia.
draft_translation: Although the United States has a strong foundation in the semiconductor industry, it is relatively weak in manufacturing capabilities, especially in advanced process technologies, and heavily relies on the East Asian region.
final_translation: Although the United States has a strong foundation in the semiconductor industry, it is relatively weak in manufacturing capabilities, especially in advanced process technologies, and heavily relies on the East Asian region.

src: 即便美国极力引导先进芯片产供链转向美国主导的“小圈子”区域化发展，但全球半导体相关产业的地区分布和相互依赖局面很难被改变。
ref: It is difficult to modify the geographical distribution and interdependence of the global semiconductor-related industries, even when the United States makes every effort to direct advanced chip production and the supply chain to the regional development of the "little circle" led by the United States.
draft_translation: Even though the United States is vigorously guiding the advanced chip supply chain towards regionalized development within a "small circle" under its dominance, it is difficult to change the regional distribution and mutual dependence situation of the global semiconductor industry.
final_translation: Even though the United States is vigorously guiding the advanced chip supply chain toward regionalized development within a "small circle" under its dominance, it is difficult to alter the regional distribution and mutual dependence of the global semiconductor industry.

src: 美国强力“重塑”“去中国化”的半导体产业链，重创全球半导体产业。
ref: The worldwide semiconductor industry has been seriously harmed by the United States' aggressive "reshaping" and "de-Sinicization" of the semiconductor industry chain.
draft_translation: The United States is strongly "reshaping" and "de-Chinese-izing" the semiconductor supply chain, severely impacting the global semiconductor industry.
final_translation: The United States is strongly reshaping and de-Chinese-izing the semiconductor supply chain, severely impacting the global semiconductor industry.

src: 芯片是全球未来产业的核心，芯片产业的发展离不开全球各国共同参与。
ref: The foundation of the global future industry is the chip, and the growth of the chip industry depends on the involvement of all nations in the globe.
draft_translation: Chips are the core of the global future industry, and the development of the chip industry cannot be separated from the joint participation of countries around the world.
final_translation: Chips are the core of the global future industry, and the development of the chip industry cannot be separated from the joint participation of countries around the world.

src: 近年来，美国采取一系列单边行动，相继出台《创新与竞争法案》《2022年美国竞争法案》《芯片和科学法案》，利用科技霸权，巩固本国技术领先优势；对盟友“恩威并施”，诱逼英特尔、台积电、三星等芯片制造企业赴美设厂，极力确保美国在芯片领域的全球领导地位。
ref: The US passed 3 acts to reinforce its tech advantage: "Innovation and Competition Act," "American Competition Act of 2022," and "Chips and Science Act", It made chip manufacturers establish factories in the US and promoted US leadership in the industry.
draft_translation: In recent years, the United States has taken a series of unilateral actions, successively enacting the "Innovation and Competition Act," the "2022 U.S. Competition Act," and the "Chip and Science Act." It has used its technological hegemony to consolidate its technological leadership. It has also employed a combination of "benevolence and force" toward its allies, persuading chip manufacturers such as Intel, TSMC, and Samsung to set up factories in the United States, striving to ensure its global leadership in the chip industry.
final_translation: In recent years, the United States has taken a series of unilateral actions, successively enacting the "Innovation and Competition Act," the "2022 U.S. Competition Act," and the "Chip and Science Act." It has leveraged its technological dominance to strengthen its technological leadership. It has also employed a combination of "benevolence and force" toward its allies, persuading chip manufacturers such as Intel, TSMC, and Samsung to establish factories in the United States, striving to secure its global leadership in the chip industry.

src: 短期看，美国确实给中国的芯片产业及相关产业发展制造了麻烦，收获了现实利益。
ref: The United States has temporarily hampered the growth of China's semiconductor industry and associated sectors while also reaping substantial rewards.
draft_translation: In the short term, the United States has indeed caused trouble for China's chip industry and related industries, gaining real benefits in the process.
final_translation: In the short term, the United States has indeed created hurdles for China's chip industry and related sectors, gaining tangible benefits in the process.

src: 但长期看，美国歇斯底里地打压，倒逼中国芯片产业不断突破，让自己失去了巨大的中国市场，最终会极大削弱美国科技企业的创新意愿和创新能力，损害全球芯片产业发展。
ref: However, in the long run, the hysterical suppression by the US has forced China's chip industry to make constant advancements, depriving itself of the massive Chinese market, which will eventually greatly weaken the innovation willingness and ability of US technology companies and harm the growth of the global chip industry.
draft_translation: But in the long term, America's hysterical suppression will force China's chip industry to continuously break through, leading China to lose a huge market. In the end, this will greatly weaken the innovation willingness and capability of American tech companies and harm the global chip industry development.
final_translation: But in the long term, America's hysterical suppression will force China's chip industry to continuously break through, leading China to lose a huge market. In the end, this will greatly weaken the innovation drive and capability of American tech companies, harming global chip industry development.

final_translation: Gao Qiao

final_translation: Individual pension products have finally been rolled out.

src: 2月10日，中国理财网发布首批个人养老金理财产品名单，工银理财、农银理财和中邮理财的7只个人养老金理财产品正式发售。
ref: China Budgetary Organize distributed a list of the beginning bunch of individual annuity riches administration items on February 10, ICBC Riches Administration, Rural Bank of China Riches Administration, and China Post Riches Administration all authoritatively propelled seven individual annuity riches administration items.
draft_translation: The China Wealth Management Network released the first list of individual pension product listings on February 10th. Seven individual pension products from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC) Wealth Management, Agricultural Bank of China (ABC) Wealth Management, and China Post Savings Bank Wealth Management are officially available for sale.
final_translation: On February 10th, China Wealth Management Company released the first list of individual pension products. Seven individual pension products from the Wealth Management departments of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC), Agricultural Bank of China (ABC), and China Post Savings Bank are now officially available for sale.

src: 至此，个人养老金账户的“货架”终于集齐个人养老金储蓄、个人养老金理财、个人养老金保险、个人养老金公募基金四类产品。
ref: Individual annuity reserve funds, individual annuity resource administration, individual benefits protections, and individual benefits open stores are the four item categories that have so distant been collected on the "racks" of individual annuity accounts.
draft_translation: At last, the "shelf" of individual pension accounts has gathered the four types of products: individual pension savings, individual pension investment, individual pension insurance, and individual pension public fund offerings.
final_translation: At last, the "Shelf" of individual pension accounts has gathered the four types of products: individual pension savings, individual pension investments, pension insurance, and public fund offerings.

src: 据介绍，首批个人养老金理财产品，全部为公募类净值型开放式产品，其中新发产品5只、存续产品2只，除1只产品为混合类产品外，其余6只产品均为固定收益类产品。
ref: The primary bunch of individual benefits riches administration items, which incorporates 5 unused items and 2 ancient items, are all open-ended open advertising net worth items, concurring to reports, the remaining 6 products are settled wage items, with 1 item being a blended item.
draft_translation: The first batch of individual pension product funds are all public offering net value open-ended products. Among them, 5 new products and 2 existing products were issued. Except for one product which is a hybrid product, the remaining 6 products are all fixed income products.
final_translation: The first batch of individual pension products consists entirely of public offering net value open-ended products. Among them, 5 newly issued products and 2 existing products are included. Except for one hybrid product, the remaining 6 products are fixed-income products.

src: 北京青年报记者看到，5只新发产品中有4只来自工银理财，全部是固定收益类产品，最短持有期限分别为365天、540天、720天和1080天，对应的业绩比较基准(年化)分别为3.70 % - 4.20 % 、 4.10 % - 4.60 % 、 4.40 % - 4.90 % 、 5.25 % - 5.75 % 。
ref: Four of the five modern items, all of which were fixed-income items with least holding periods of 365 days, 540 days, 720 days, and 1080 days, were from ICBC Riches Administration, agreeing to a correspondent from Beijing Youth Day by day, the benchmarks are 3.70%–4.20%, 4.10%–4.60%, 4.40%–4.90%, and 5.25%–5.75% (annualized).
draft_translation: The Beijing Youth Daily reporter observed that among the five new products, four are from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC) Wealth Management, all of which are fixed income products. The shortest holding periods are 365 days, 540 days, 720 days, and 1080 days, with corresponding performance benchmarks (annualized) of 3.70% - 4.20%, 4.10% - 4.60%, 4.40% - 4.90%, and 5.25% - 5.75% respectively.
final_translation: The Beijing Youth Daily reporter observed that among the five new products, four are from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC) Wealth Management, all of which are fixed income products. The shortest holding periods are 365 days, 540 days, 720 days, and 1080 days, with corresponding performance benchmarks (annualized) of 3.70% - 4.20%, 4.10% - 4.60%, 4.40% - 4.90%, and 5.25% - 5.75% respectively.

src: 剩余一只新发产品是“邮银财富添颐·鸿锦最短持有1095 天 1 号 ” ， 也是固定收益类产品，2月10日开始募集，2月19日结束募集，风险等级为二级。
ref: Post Bank Fortune Tianyi Hongjin Most limited Holding 1095 Days number 1, which is additionally a fixed-income item, is the as it were other as of late propelled thing, between February 10 and February 19, cash was raised, level 2 chance is show.
draft_translation: The remaining new product is "Yongyin Wealth Addition · Hongjin Short Holding 1095 Days 1", which is also a fixed income product. It started fundraising on February 10th and ended on February 19th. The risk level is二级.
final_translation: The remaining newly issued product is "Yongyin Wealth Addition · Hongjin Short-Term Holding 1095 Days 1", which is also a fixed-income product. It started its offering period on February 10th and ended on February 19th. The risk level is Level 2.

src: 两只存续产品中，一只是农银理财“农银同心·灵动”360天科技创新人民币理财产品，投资性质为混合类，风险等级为三级。
ref: One of the two remaining items is the 360-day innovation advancement RMB riches administration item called "ABC Tongxin Savvy" by ABC Riches Administration, its contributing nature is blended, and its chance level is 3.
draft_translation: The two ongoing products include one which is the "Agricultural Bank of China Wealth Management - Agricultural Bank Harmony · Flexible" 360-day Science and Technology Innovation RMB Wealth Management Product. The investment nature is mixed, and the risk level is level three.
final_translation: The two existing products include one named "Agricultural Bank of China Wealth Management 'Agricultural Bank Harmony · Flexible' 360-day Science and Technology Innovation RMB Wealth Management Product", with an investment type of mixed and a risk level of Level Three.

ref: Another persevering item is the fixed-income "Post Bank Fortune Tianyi Hongjin number 1 with the most brief holding period of 365 days", On December 30 of final year, it begun to raise cash, 1.0011 is the value.
draft_translation: The other ongoing product is "Post Savings Wealth Addition · Hongjin Short Holding 365 Days 1st", a fixed income type product, which started fundraising on December 30 last year and officially commenced operations on January 4 this year, with a cumulative net value of 1.0011 on February 8.
final_translation: The other currently active product is "Post Savings Wealth Management · Hongjin Short-Term Holding 365 Days 1st", a fixed yield product, which began raising on December 30 last year and officially commenced operations on January 4 this year, with a net asset value of 1.0011 on February 8.

src: 根据《国务院办公厅关于推动个人养老金发展的意见 》 ， 个人养老金资金账户资金可投资的金融产品包括银行理财、储蓄存款、商业养老保险、公募基金等。
ref: Bank riches administration, investment funds stores, commercial benefits protections, open stores, and other budgetary items are among those that can be contributed in individual annuity finance accounts, agreeing to the "Conclusions of the Common Office of the State Board on Advancing the Advancement of Individual Annuities."
draft_translation: According to the "Opinions of the State Council's Office on Promoting the Development of Personal Pension Plans," the funds in personal pension accounts can be invested in financial products such as bank wealth management products, savings deposits, commercial old-age insurance, and public offering funds.
final_translation: According to the "Notice of the State Council Office on the Promotion of the Development of Personal Pension System," the funds in personal pension accounts can be invested in financial products such as bank wealth management, savings deposits, commercial old-age insurance, and public offering funds.

src: 首批个人养老金理财产品发售，标志着个人养老金投资者可正式通过个人养老金资金账户购买理财产品。
ref: Person annuity financial specialists may presently formally procure riches administration items through individual annuity support accounts with the discharge of the introductory clump of individual benefits riches administration items.
draft_translation: The launch of the first batch of individual pension product funds marks the point at which individual pension investors can officially purchase fund products through their individual pension account.
final_translation: The launch of the first batch of individual pension products marks the point at which individual pension investors can officially purchase products through their individual pension fund account.

src: 去年11月银保监会制定了《商业银行和理财公司个人养老金业务管理暂行办法 》 。
ref: The "Intervals Measures for the Organization of Individual Annuity Commerce of Commercial Banks and Riches Administration Companies" were created in November of final year by the China Keeping money and Protections Administrative Commission.
draft_translation: The CBIRC formulated the "Provisional Measures for the Management of Personal Pension Business by Commercial Banks and Wealth Management Companies" in November last year.
final_translation: The CBIRC issued the "Provisional Measures for the Management of Personal Pension Business by Commercial Banks and Wealth Management Companies" in November last year.

src: 《办法》规定，参加人可以通过个人养老金资金账户购买个人养老储蓄、个人养老金理财产品、个人养老金保险产品、个人养老金公募基金产品等个人养老金产品。
ref: Agreeing to the "Measures," members may utilize their individual benefits finance accounts to purchase individual benefits investment funds, individual annuity resource administration items, individual benefits protections merchandise, individual annuity open advertising support items, and other individual annuity items.
draft_translation: The method stipulates that participants can purchase various personal pension products, including personal pension savings, personal pension investment products, personal pension insurance products, and personal pension public offering fund products, through their personal pension account.
final_translation: The provision stipulates that participants can purchase various personal pension products, including personal pension savings, personal pension investment products, personal pension insurance products, and public offering fund products, through their personal pension account.

src: 随后，人社部、财政部、国家税务总局三部门发布通知，明确个人养老金制度在北京、天津，以及河北石家庄、雄安新区，山西晋城市等36个先行城市和地区启动实施。
ref: The individual annuity framework will along these lines be actualized in 36 critical cities and districts, counting Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang in Hebei, Xiongan Modern Zone, and Jincheng in Shanxi, agreeing to a take note discharged by the Service of Human Assets and Social Security, the Service of Back, and the State Organization of Tax assessment, by the conclusion of 2022, there would be 19,540 million person benefits individuals, 6,130 million donors, and a add up to installment sum of 14,200 million yuan.
draft_translation: The subsequent, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the Ministry of Finance, and the State Administration of Taxation issued a notice, clearly stating that the individual pension system will be implemented in 36 pilot cities and regions, including Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang and Xiong'an New Area in Hebei Province, Jincheng City in Shanxi Province, and others.
final_translation: Subsequently, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the Ministry of Finance, and the State Administration of Taxation issued a notice, explicitly stating that the individual pension system will be implemented in 36 pilot cities and regions, including Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang, Xiong'an New Area in Hebei Province, Jincheng City in Shanxi Province, and other cities and regions.

src: 截至2022年底，个人养老金参加人数1954万人，缴费人数613万人，总缴费金额142亿元。
ref: By the conclusion of 2022, there would be 19,540 thousand person annuity individuals, 6,130 thousand supporters, and a add up to installment sum of 14,200 million yuan.
draft_translation: As of the end of 2022, the number of individuals participating in the personal pension scheme was 19.54 million, with 6.13 million contributing, and the total amount of contributions reached 14.2 billion yuan.
final_translation: As of the end of 2022, the number of individual pension plan participants was 19.54 million, with 6.13 million contributing, and the total contributions amounted to 14.2 billion yuan.

src: 此前，参与试点的银行只上架了个人养老储蓄、个人养老金保险产品和个人养老金公募基金三类产品。
ref: Individual annuity reserve funds, individual benefits protections items, and individual annuity open advertising reserves were the as it were three item categories already accessible from the pilot's partaking educate.
draft_translation: Previously, banks participating in the pilot program had only listed three types of products: individual pension savings, individual pension insurance products, and public offering funds for individual pensions.
final_translation: Previously, banks participating in the pilot program had only offered three types of products: individual pension savings, individual pension insurance products, and public offering funds for individual pensions.

src: 如今，个人养老金理财产品也聚齐之后，投资者该如何选择？
ref: How ought to financial specialists choose presently that individual annuity and riches administration plans are presently advertised?
draft_translation: Now that individual pension products have become more diverse, how should investors choose?
final_translation: Now that individual pension investment products have become more diverse, how should investors choose?

src: 交银理财产品研发部专家表示，相比其他个人养老金产品，试点阶段的养老理财产品和个人养老金理财产品均具有三方面的特点。
ref: Agreeing to specialists from the Bank of Communications Monetary Items R&D Division, the individual benefits budgetary items and the annuity monetary merchandise within the pilot stage contrast from other individual benefits items in three ways.
draft_translation: The expert from the Product Development Department of Jiayin's wealth management products stated that, compared to other personal pension products, both the pilot-phase elderly care financial products and the personal pension financial products have three main characteristics during the pilot phase.
final_translation: The expert from Jiayin Wealth Management Product Development Department noted that, compared to other personal pension products, both pilot-phase wealth management products and personal pension products have three key characteristics during the pilot phase.

src: 一是稳健性，风险管理机制更加健全，投资策略和理念更为稳健，并实施非母行第三方独立托管。
ref: Strength comes to begin with, the execution of third-party autonomous care of the non-parent bank, a more exhaustive chance administration instrument, and a more relentless venture reasoning and technique.
draft_translation: First, stability. The risk management mechanism is more sound, the investment strategy and philosophy are more stable, and third-party independent custody is implemented outside the parent bank.
final_translation: First, robustness. The risk management mechanism is more sound, the investment strategy and philosophy are more stable, and third-party independent custody is implemented.

src: 二是长期性，试点阶段养老理财产品的期限都在5年及以上，下一步发行的个人养老金理财产品，最短持有期原则上为1年，鼓励持有3年以上。
ref: The moment may be a lengthy one, annuity riches administration items within the pilot stage have terms of five a long time or longer, the following step's individual benefits riches administration arrangements have a least holding length of one year and a suggested holding period of three a long time.
draft_translation: Secondly, the long-term nature. The term of pilot elderly financial products is all above 5 years. The next issued individual pension financial products will have a minimum holding period of 1 year, and encourage holding for 3 years or more.
final_translation: Secondly, the long-term aspect. The term of pilot pension financial products is all over 5 years. The next issued individual pension products will have a minimum holding period of 1 year, encouraging holding for 3 years or more.

src: 三是普惠性，产品购买门槛低，起购点一般为1元，有的低至0.01元，产品的托管费、管理费等费率更加优惠。
ref: The third quality is inclusivity, the limit for item buys is moo, most buy focuses have a least of 1 yuan, in any case, others fair require 0.01 yuan, the administration expense, item care charge, and other costs are way better.
draft_translation: Thirdly, it has universal accessibility. The purchase threshold is low, usually starting at 1 yuan, with some as low as 0.01 yuan. The fees such as custody fees and management fees are more favorable.
final_translation: Thirdly, it has inclusivity. The purchase threshold is low, usually starting at 1 yuan, with some as low as 0.01 yuan. The fees such as storage fees and management fees are more favorable.

src: 专业人士指出，投资者要根据产品特点和自己的风险承受能力进行选择。
ref: Speculators ought to base their choices on the qualities of the item and their person chance resistance, concurring to specialists.
draft_translation: Professionals point out that investors should choose products based on their characteristics and their own risk tolerance.
final_translation: Professionals point out that investors should choose products based on their characteristics and their own risk tolerance.

src: 个人养老金储蓄具有期限较长、利率较高、安全性高的特点，适合风险承受能力弱的人群；个人养老金保险产品重在保障，比较适合无法承担投资风险，可以接受稳定收益的人群；而个人养老金理财产品和公募基金产品不保本也不保收益，有一定投资风险，但预期收益较高，适合具备一定的金融知识、风险承担能力较高的人群。
ref: Individual annuity protections items center on security and are more appropriate for those who cannot endure speculation dangers but can acknowledge steady returns; individual annuity reserve funds have the qualities of long term, tall intrigued rate, and tall security, making them reasonable for individuals with moo hazard resilience; In spite of the fact that there are certain speculation dangers included and no ensures of capital or pay, individual benefits riches administration items and open advertising support items have moderately tall anticipated returns and are perfect for those with a tall chance resistance and a few budgetary understanding.
draft_translation: Individual pension savings have characteristics of long term, high interest rate, and high safety, making them suitable for people with low risk tolerance; individual pension insurance products focus on protection and are more suitable for those who cannot bear investment risks and can accept stable returns; while individual pension investment products and public offering fund products do not guarantee principal or returns and carry certain investment risks, but they offer higher expected returns and are suitable for people with certain financial knowledge and higher risk tolerance.
final_translation: Individual pension savings have characteristics of long-term, high return rate, and high security, making them suitable for people with lower risk tolerance; individual pension insurance products focus on protection and are more suitable for those who cannot bear investment risks and can accept stable returns; while individual pension investment products and public offering funds do not guarantee principal or returns and carry certain investment risks, but they offer higher expected returns and are suitable for people with certain financial knowledge and higher risk tolerance.
