draft_translation: A man from Kahramanmaraş is holding the cat he just rescued
final_translation: A man from Kahramanmaraş is holding the cat he just rescued

src: 奇迹般的成功营救案例给原本已经希望渺茫的搜救工作带来了一线曙光，然而与此同时，遇难人数也在不断上升。
ref: The miraculous successful rescue case brought a glimmer of hope to the previously bleak search and rescue operation, but at the same time, the number of casualties continues to rise.
draft_translation: A miraculous rescue case brought a glimmer of hope to the already desperate search and rescue efforts, yet at the same time, the number of victims was continuously rising.
final_translation: A miraculous rescue case brought a glimmer of hope to the already desperate search and rescue efforts, yet at the same time, the number of victims is continuously rising.

src: 目前根据官方统计，周一的地震已经在土耳其造成超过2万人死亡，邻国叙利亚的死亡人数估计在3500人以上。
ref: According to official statistics, the earthquake on Monday has resulted in over 20,000 deaths in Turkey, with an estimated death toll of over 3,500 people in neighboring Syria.
draft_translation: The official statistics currently show that the earthquake on Monday has already caused over 20,000 deaths in Turkey, with the death toll in neighboring Syria estimated to be over 3,500.
final_translation: The official statistics currently show that the earthquake on Monday has already caused over 20,000 deaths in Turkey, with the death toll in neighboring Syria estimated to be over 3,500.

src: 尽管专家表示，人在被困废墟之后最多还能存活一周以上的时间，但是寻找到更多幸存者的希望已经变得愈加渺茫。
ref: Despite experts stating that a person can potentially survive for over a week when trapped under rubble, the hope of finding more survivors has become increasingly bleak.
draft_translation: Although experts say that people can survive for more than a week after being trapped under the ruins, the hope of finding more survivors has become increasingly slim.
final_translation: Although experts say that people can survive for more than a week after being trapped under the ruins, the hope of finding more survivors has become increasingly slim.

src: 救援人员仍然在借助热成像仪来探寻废墟之下的生命迹象。
ref: Rescue workers are still using thermal imaging devices to search for signs of life beneath the rubble.
draft_translation: Rescue personnel are still using thermal imaging cameras to search for signs of life beneath the ruins.
final_translation: Rescue personnel are still using thermal imaging instruments to search for signs of life beneath the ruins.

src: 与此同时，救援工作的重点开始转向帮助那些急需救助的幸存者。
ref: Meanwhile, the focus of the rescue efforts has shifted towards assisting the survivors who are in urgent need of help.
draft_translation: At the same time, the focus of the rescue efforts began to shift towards helping the survivors in urgent need of assistance.
final_translation: At the same time, the focus of the rescue efforts began to shift towards helping the survivors in urgent need of assistance.

src: 联合国官员：该地区“百年未遇”的灾难
ref: UN Official: "Once-in-a-Century" Disaster in the Region
draft_translation: United Nations official: A disaster "unprecedented in a century" in the region
final_translation: United Nations official: A disaster "unprecedented in a century" in the region

src: 主管人道主义事务的联合国副秘书长兼紧急救济协调员马丁·格里菲思（Martin Griffiths）在土耳其召开的记者会上表示，这次地震是该地区“百年以来最糟糕的一次灾难”。
ref: UN Deputy Secretary-General and Emergency Relief Coordinator, Martin Griffiths, stated in a press conference held in Turkey that this earthquake is the "worst disaster in the region in a century."
draft_translation: United Nations Under-Secretary-General for Humanitarian Affairs and Emergency Relief Coordinator Martin Griffiths said at a press conference in Turkey that this earthquake is "the worst disaster in the region in a century."
final_translation: United Nations Under-Secretary-General for Humanitarian Affairs and Emergency Relief Coordinator Martin Griffiths said at a press conference in Turkey that this earthquake is "the worst disaster in the region in a century."

src: 他还称赞土耳其在灾后的应对行动是“非同寻常”的。
ref: He also praised Turkey's post-disaster response as "extraordinary."
draft_translation: He also praised Turkey's response to the disaster as "unusual".
final_translation: He also praised Turkey's response to the disaster as "unprecedented".

src: 他还对路透社记者表示，希望能够将救援提供给叙利亚政府和反对派所控制的地区，但是也表示相关事宜“尚不明朗”。
ref: He also told Reuters reporters that he hopes to provide aid to both the Syrian government-controlled areas and the areas controlled by opposition forces, but he mentioned that the situation is still unclear.
draft_translation: He also told Reuters that he hopes to provide aid to areas controlled by the Syrian government and opposition groups, but also noted that the matter is "still unclear."
final_translation: He also told Reuters that he hopes to provide aid to areas controlled by the Syrian government and opposition groups, but also noted that the issue is "still unclear."

src: 联合国承诺向叙利亚的地震灾区民众额外提供2500万美元的救援捐款。
ref: The United Nations has pledged an additional $25 million in humanitarian aid to the earthquake-affected population in Syria.
draft_translation: The United Nations has pledged to provide an additional $25 million in aid donations to the people affected by the earthquake in Syria.
final_translation: The United Nations has pledged to provide an additional $25 million in aid to the people affected by the earthquake in Syria.

src: 本周早些时候，联合国已经宣布拨款2500万美元用于土耳其和叙利亚赈灾。
ref: Earlier this week, the United Nations announced a $25 million allocation for humanitarian assistance in Turkey and Syria for disaster relief.
draft_translation: Earlier this week, the United Nations announced a funding of 25 million dollars for disaster relief in Turkey and Syria.
final_translation: Earlier this week, the United Nations announced funds of 25 million dollars for disaster relief in Turkey and Syria.

src: 60年来全球发生的破坏性最强的大地震
ref: The world's most destructive earthquake in 60 years

final_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years

src: 智利大地震（1960年）
ref: The Great Chilean Earthquake (1960)
draft_translation: 1960 Chilean Earthquake
final_translation: 1960 Great Chilean Earthquake

src: 当地时间1960年5月22日下午3点11分，智利瓦尔迪维亚发生人类史上观测记录到的规模最大的地震，地震矩规模为9.5。
ref: At 3:11 pm local time on May 22, 1960, the largest earthquake recorded by observations in Waldiva, Chile, in the history of human history, with a scale of the earthquake 9.5.
draft_translation: The earthquake, recorded as the largest ever observed in human history, occurred at 3:11 PM local time on May 22, 1960, in Valdivia, Chile, with a moment magnitude of 9.5.
final_translation: The earthquake, the largest ever recorded in human history, occurred at 3:11 PM local time on May 22, 1960, in Valdivia, Chile, with a moment magnitude of 9.5.

src: 短短十分钟内，瓦尔迪维亚整座城市变为废墟。
ref: In just ten minutes, the entire city of Waldivia became ruins.
draft_translation: The entire city of Valdivia turned into ruins within just ten minutes.
final_translation: The entire city of Valdivia turned into ruins within just ten minutes.

src: 地震之后引发的巨大海啸袭击到智利海岸线，掀起浪高高度是25米高的巨大海啸。
ref: The massive earthquake triggered a devastating tsunami that struck the Chilean coastline, generating gigantic waves reaching a height of 25 meters.
draft_translation: The massive tsunami triggered by the earthquake struck the Chilean coastline, with wave heights reaching as high as 25 meters.
final_translation: The massive tsunami triggered by the earthquake struck the Chilean coastline, with wave heights reaching as high as 25 meters.

src: 海啸波及到遥远的日本、菲律宾。
ref: The tsunami spread to distant Japan and the Philippines.
draft_translation: The tsunami affected distant Japan and the Philippines.
final_translation: The tsunami affected remote Japan and the Philippines.

src: 如此范围的灾难所造成的罹难人数以及经济损失无法精确得知。
ref: The exact number of casualties and economic losses caused by such a widespread disaster cannot be accurately determined.
draft_translation: The number of casualties and economic losses caused by such a disaster cannot be precisely determined.
final_translation: The number of casualties and economic losses caused by such a disaster cannot be precisely determined.

draft_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years

src: 阿拉斯加大地震（1964年）
ref: The Great Alaskan Earthquake of 1964
draft_translation: Alaska Earthquake (1964)
final_translation: Alaska Earthquake (1964)

src: 1964年3月27日是一个星期五，也是是耶稣受难日。
ref: March 27, 1964 was a Friday, and it was also Good Friday.
draft_translation: March 27, 1964 was a Friday, which was also Good Friday.
final_translation: March 27, 1964 was a Friday, which was also the Day of Suffering of Jesus.

src: 这一天美国阿拉斯加发生北美洲历史上最大的地震，矩震级达到9.2。
ref: On this day, the largest earthquake in North American history occurred in Alaska, United States, with a magnitude of 9.2.
draft_translation: On this day, the largest earthquake in North American history occurred in Alaska, USA, with a moment magnitude of 9.2.
final_translation: On this day, the largest earthquake in North American history occurred in Alaska, USA, with a moment magnitude of 9.2.

src: 直到2006年，阿拉斯加大地震仍然是有纪录以来世界第三大地震。
ref: Until 2006, the Alaska earthquake remained the third-largest earthquake in recorded history.
draft_translation: Until 2006, the Alaskan earthquake was still the third largest earthquake in recorded history.
final_translation: Until 2006, the Alaska earthquake was the third largest earthquake in recorded history.

src: 地震发生时，太平洋板块和北美洲板块之间的一个断层在威廉王子湾接近学院峡湾的地方断裂。
ref: During the earthquake, a fault line between the Pacific Plate and the North American Plate ruptured near Prince William Sound, close to College Fjord.
draft_translation: The fault between the Pacific Plate and the North American Plate broke near College Inlet in Prince William Sound during the earthquake.
final_translation: The fault between the Pacific Plate and the North American Plate broke near College Inlet in Prince William Sound during the earthquake.

src: 在大部分的地区这场地震持续了3分钟到5分钟。
ref: The earthquake in most areas lasted 3 minutes to 5 minutes.
draft_translation: The earthquake lasted from 3 to 5 minutes in most areas.
final_translation: The earthquake lasted from 3 to 5 minutes in most areas.

src: 海床位移引发了巨大的海啸，高度为67米。
ref: The displacement of the seafloor triggered a massive tsunami with a height of 67 meters.
draft_translation: The tsunami caused by the sea floor displacement reached a height of 67 meters.
final_translation: The tsunami caused by the sea floor displacement reached a height of 67 meters.

src: 由于当天是假日，所以学校和许多企业都关闭了。
ref: Because it was a holiday, schools and many businesses were closed.
draft_translation: Since it was a holiday that day, the school and many businesses were closed.
final_translation: Since it was a holiday that day, the school and many businesses were closed.

src: 这场大地震最后导致了139人罹难。
ref: The earthquake killed 139 people.
draft_translation: This earthquake ultimately resulted in 139 deaths.
final_translation: This earthquake ultimately resulted in 139 deaths.

src: 其中9人直接死于地震，其他130人死于地震引发的海啸。
ref: Nine people died directly from the earthquake, while the other 130 people died from the tsunami triggered by the earthquake.
draft_translation: Nine people died directly from the earthquake, and another 130 died from the tsunami caused by the earthquake.
final_translation: Nine people died directly from the earthquake, and another 130 died from the tsunami caused by the earthquake.

src: 60年来全球发生的破坏性最强的大地震
ref: The world's most destructive earthquake in 60 years
draft_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years
final_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years

src: 唐山大地震（1976年）
ref: The Tangshan earthquake (1976)
draft_translation: Tangshan Earthquake (1976)

src: 1976年7月28日，中国河北省唐山市和丰南县在16小时内发生两次7级以上强烈地震。
ref: On July 28, 1976, two strong earthquakes with a magnitude of 7 or above occurred within 16 hours in Tangshan City and Fengnan County, Hebei Province, China.
draft_translation: On July 28, 1976, two strong earthquakes with magnitudes of 7 or higher occurred in Tangshan City, Fengnan County, Hebei Province, China within 16 hours.
final_translation: On July 28, 1976, two strong earthquakes with magnitudes of 7 or higher occurred in Tangshan City, Fengnan County, Hebei Province, China within 16 hours.

src: 震源距地面23千米。
ref: The epicenter was located 23 kilometers below the Earth's surface.
draft_translation: The epicenter is 23 kilometers above the ground.
final_translation: The epicenter is 23 kilometers below the surface.

src: 唐山市全市交通、通讯、供水、供电中断，顷刻间被夷为平地。
ref: The city's traffic, communications, water supply and power supply were interrupted and flattened in an instant.
draft_translation: The entire city of Tangshan was instantly reduced to ruins, with traffic, communication, water supply, and electricity all cut off.
final_translation: The entire city of Tangshan—instantly reduced to ruins—had traffic, communication, water supply, and electricity all cut off.

src: 140公里外的首都北京也有强烈震感。
ref: The capital city of Beijing, located 140 kilometers away, also felt strong tremors from the earthquake.
draft_translation: The capital Beijing, 140 kilometers away, also felt strong tremors.
final_translation: The capital Beijing, 140 kilometers away, also felt strong tremors.

src: 据官方统计，包括北京、天津在内的所有受灾地区，地震造成242769人死亡，164851人重伤。
ref: According to official statistics, including the affected areas such as Beijing and Tianjin, the earthquake resulted in 242,769 deaths and 164,851 serious injuries.
draft_translation: The official statistics show that, including Beijing and Tianjin, the earthquake caused 242,769 deaths and 164,851 serious injuries in all affected areas.
final_translation: The official statistics show that the earthquake caused 242,769 deaths and 164,851 serious injuries in all affected areas, including Beijing and Tianjin.

src: 唐山大地震成为中国有记录至今第二多人死亡的地震，仅次于1556年嘉靖大地震。
ref: The Tangshan earthquake became the second deadliest earthquake in recorded history in China, with the highest death toll since the Great Shaanxi earthquake in 1556.
draft_translation: Tangshan earthquake is the second deadliest earthquake in China with recorded history, ranking behind the 1556 Jiangxi earthquake.
final_translation: The Tangshan earthquake is the second deadliest earthquake in China in recorded history, ranking second to the 1556 Shaanxi earthquake.

src: 但是有海外科学家估计，这场地震可能造成至少65万人死亡。
ref: However, some overseas scientists have estimated that the earthquake may have caused at least 650,000 deaths.
draft_translation: However, overseas scientists estimate that this earthquake may cause at least 650,000 deaths.
final_translation: However, overseas scientists estimate that this earthquake may cause at least 650,000 deaths.

draft_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years

src: 印度洋大地震（2004年）
ref: Indian Ocean earthquake (2004)
draft_translation: 2004 Indian Ocean Earthquake
final_translation: 2004 Indian Ocean Earthquake

src: 2004年12月26日，印尼苏门答腊岛亚齐省西岸160公里处发生地震，震源深度30公里，矩震级9.1到9.3。
ref: On December 26, 2004, an earthquake occurred 160 km off the west coast of Aceh Province, Sumatra Island, Indonesia, with a depth of 30 km and a moment magnitude of 9.1 to 9.3.
draft_translation: The earthquake occurred 160 kilometers from the west coast of Aceh Province, Sumatra Island, Indonesia on December 26, 2004. The hypocentral depth was 30 kilometers, and the moment magnitude was between 9.1 and 9.3.
final_translation: The earthquake occurred 160 kilometers from the west coast of Aceh Province, Sumatra Island, Indonesia on December 26, 2004. The hypocenter depth was 30 kilometers, and the moment magnitude was between 9.1 and 9.3.

src: 地震引发了浪高高度达15到30米的巨大海啸。
ref: The earthquake triggered massive tsunamis with wave heights ranging from 15 to 30 meters.
draft_translation: A earthquake triggered a tsunami with wave heights reaching 15 to 30 meters.
final_translation: A earthquake triggered a tsunami with wave heights reaching 15 to 30 meters.

src: 太平洋沿岸总共14个国家被波及，其中受灾严重最严重的地区包括印尼亚齐省、泰国镐立和普吉岛渡假区、斯里兰卡和印度泰米尔邦。
ref: A total of 14 countries along the Pacific Rim were affected, with the hardest-hit areas including Aceh Province in Indonesia, the resort areas of Khao Lak and Phuket in Thailand, Sri Lanka, and Tamil State in India.
draft_translation: The Pacific coastal area is affected by 14 countries in total, with the most severely affected regions including Aceh Province in Indonesia, the Phuket and Krabi tourist areas in Thailand, Sri Lanka, and the Tamil Nadu region in India.
final_translation: A total of 14 countries along the Pacific coast are affected, with the most severely impacted regions including Aceh Province in Indonesia, the Phuket and Krabi Islands in Thailand, Sri Lanka, and Tamil Nadu in India.

src: 当时正值圣诞节的旅游旺季，受灾地区聚集了大量的旅客和本地居民，导致许多在沙滩上享受假期的旅客和在海边工作的当地人被海啸卷到海底，使这次地震不少人成为失踪者。
ref: It was the peak of the Christmas tourist season, and the affected areas gathered a large number of tourists and local residents, resulting in many tourists enjoying their holidays on the beach and locals working on the beach being swept to the bottom of the sea by the tsunami, making many people missing from this earthquake.
draft_translation: At that time, it was the peak of the Christmas travel season, and a large number of tourists and local residents gathered in the affected area, leading to many tourists enjoying their holidays on the beach and local workers working by the sea being swept down to the bottom of the sea by the tsunami, resulting in many people becoming missing due to the earthquake.
final_translation: At that time, it was the peak of the Christmas travel season, and a large number of tourists and local residents gathered in the affected area, leading to many tourists enjoying their holidays on the beach and local workers working by the coast being swept down to the ocean floor by the tsunami, resulting in many people being missing due to the earthquake.

src: 据估计，罹难人数和失踪人数至少有30万人。
ref: It is estimated that the number of dead and missing persons is at least 300,000 people.
draft_translation: The estimated number of victims and missing persons is at least 300,000.
final_translation: The estimated number of victims and missing persons is at least 300,000.

ref: Wenchuan Earthquake (2008)
draft_translation: Wenchuan Earthquake (2008)
final_translation: Wenchuan Earthquake (2008)

src: 2008年5月12日，中国四川省汶川地区发生大地震。
ref: On May 12, 2008, a major earthquake struck the Wenchuan region in Sichuan Province, China.
draft_translation: On May 12, 2008, a major earthquake struck the Wenchuan area of Sichuan Province, China.
final_translation: On May 12, 2008, a major earthquake struck the Wenchuan area of Sichuan Province, China.

src: 根据中国地震局的数据，此次地震的面波震级达8.2级、矩震级达8.3级，破坏地区超过10万平方公里。
ref: According to the China Earthquake Administration, the earthquake had a surface wave magnitude of 8.2 and a moment magnitude of 8.3, damaging an area of more than 100,000 square kilometers.
draft_translation: The data from the China Earthquake Administration shows that the earthquake reached a surface wave magnitude of 8.2 and a moment magnitude of 8.3, with the affected area exceeding 100,000 square kilometers.
final_translation: The data from the China Earthquake Administration shows that the earthquake reached a surface wave magnitude of 8.2 and a moment magnitude of 8.3, with the affected area exceeding 100,000 square kilometers.

src: 截至2008年9月25日，地震共计造成69227人遇难，17923人失踪，374643人不同程度受伤，1993.03万人失去住所，受灾总人口达4625.6万人。
ref: As of September 25, 2008, the earthquake had caused a total of 69,227 deaths, 17,923 people missing, 374,643 people injured to varying degrees, 19.93 million people losing their homes, and a total affected population of 46.256 million people.
draft_translation: As of September 25, 2008, the earthquake caused a total of 69,227 deaths, 17,923 missing persons, 374,643 people injured at various degrees, and 19.93 million people homeless. The total number of affected people reached 46.256 million.

src: 是中华人民共和国成立以来破坏力最大的地震，也是唐山大地震后伤亡最惨重的一次。
ref: It was the most destructive earthquake since the founding of the People's Republic of China and the one with the heaviest casualties after the Tangshan earthquake.
draft_translation: This is the most destructive earthquake since the founding of the People's Republic of China, and also the most deadly one after the Tangshan earthquake.
final_translation: This is the most destructive earthquake since the founding of the People's Republic of China, and also the most deadly one after the Tangshan earthquake.

src: 2009年3月，中国国务院宣布将每年的5月12日定为防灾减灾日，加强对民众的教育和对防灾减灾工作的关注。
ref: In March 2009, the State Council of China announced that May 12 of each year will be designated as the Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Day to strengthen public education and attention to disaster prevention and mitigation.
draft_translation: The Chinese State Council announced in March 2009 that May 12th would be designated as Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Day every year, to strengthen public education and attention on disaster prevention and mitigation work.
final_translation: The Chinese State Council announced in March 2009 that May 12th would be designated as Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Day every year, to strengthen public education and attention on disaster prevention and mitigation.

src: 之后中国多地政府和中小学在每年这一天举行防震演习。
ref: Subsequently, governments and elementary and secondary schools in many parts of China hold earthquake drills on this day every year.
draft_translation: After that, governments in many places in China and primary and secondary schools hold earthquake drills on this day every year.

src: 中小学也开始重视普及“防震减灾”教育。
ref: Elementary and secondary schools have also started to pay attention to promoting "earthquake prevention and disaster reduction" education.
draft_translation: Primary and secondary schools have also begun to pay more attention to popularizing "earthquake prevention and disaster reduction" education.
final_translation: Primary and secondary schools have also begun to pay more attention to popularizing "earthquake prevention and disaster reduction" education.

src: 海地地震（2010年）
ref: Haiti Earthquake (2010)
draft_translation: 2010 Haitian earthquake
final_translation: Haitian earthquake (2010)

src: 2010年1月12日，加勒比海岛国海地发生里氏7.0级的地震。
ref: On January 12, 2010, the Caribbean island nation of Haiti experienced a magnitude 7.0 earthquake.
draft_translation: On January 12, 2010, a 7.0 magnitude earthquake struck Haiti, a Caribbean island nation.

src: 震中位于海地首都太子港以西南方25公里，震源距离地表13千米左右。
ref: The epicenter was located approximately 25 kilometers southwest of the Haitian capital, Port-au-Prince, and the depth of the earthquake's focus was around 13 kilometers below the surface.
draft_translation: The epicenter is 25 kilometers southwest of Port-au-Prince, the capital of Haiti, and the focus is about 13 kilometers below the surface.
final_translation: The epicenter is 25 kilometers southwest of Port-au-Prince, the capital of Haiti, and the hypocenter is approximately 13 kilometers beneath the surface.

src: 国际红十字会估计，受到地震影响的人口大约为300万。
ref: The International Red Cross estimated that the population affected by the earthquake was approximately 3 million.
draft_translation: The International Red Cross estimates that the population affected by the earthquake is approximately three million.
final_translation: The International Red Cross estimates that the population affected by the earthquake is approximately three million.

src: 海地政府公布的确认死亡人数超过20万。
ref: The Haitian government has confirmed the death toll at more than 200,000.
draft_translation: The Haitian government has announced that the confirmed death toll exceeds 200,000.
final_translation: The Haitian government has announced that the confirmed death toll exceeds 200,000.

src: 海地国内的一些地区，多达90%的房屋在地震中被摧毁。
ref: In some areas of Haiti, as many as 90% of houses were destroyed in the earthquake.
draft_translation: In some areas within Haiti, up to 90% of the houses were destroyed in the earthquake.
final_translation: In some areas of Haiti, up to 90% of the houses were destroyed in the earthquake.

src: 虽然国际社会提供了大量援助和支持，但是这个人口过剩腐败横行的贫困国家从未从这场灾难中恢复过来。
ref: Despite the significant amount of aid and support provided by the international community, this overpopulated, corruption-plagued, and impoverished country has never fully recovered from this disaster.
draft_translation: Although the international community has provided a large amount of aid and support, this poor country, which is overpopulated and riddled with corruption, has never recovered from this disaster.
final_translation: Although the international community has provided a large amount of aid and support, this poor country, which is overpopulated and riddled with corruption, has never recovered from this disaster.

ref: The world's most destructive earthquake in 60 years
draft_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years
final_translation: The most destructive earthquake in the world in the past 60 years

src: 日本东北大地震（2011年）
ref: The Great Tohoku Earthquake in Japan (2011)
draft_translation: 2011 Japanese Northeast Earthquake
final_translation: 2011 Tohoku Earthquake

src: 2011年3月11日日本东北地方外海发生矩震级为9.0的大型逆冲区地震。
ref: On March 11, 2011, a large thrust zone earthquake with a moment magnitude of 9.0 occurred off the coast of Tohoku, Japan.
draft_translation: The March 11, 2011 earthquake off the coast of Japan's northeastern region was a large reverse fault earthquake with a moment magnitude of 9.0.
final_translation: The March 11, 2011 earthquake off the coast of Japan's northeast was a large thrust fault earthquake with a moment magnitude of 9.0.

src: 震中位于在宫城县首府仙台市以东的太平洋海域，震源深度测得数据为24千米，并且引发最大爬高40.1米的巨大海啸。
ref: The epicenter was located in the Pacific Ocean east of Sendai City, the capital of Miyagi Prefecture, and the depth of the quake was measured at 24 km, causing a huge tsunami with a maximum height of 40.1 meters.
draft_translation: The earthquake's epicenter was located in the Pacific Ocean east of the capital of Miyagi Prefecture, Sendai City, with a hypocenter depth of 24 kilometers, and it triggered a massive tsunami with a maximum run-up height of 40.1 meters.
final_translation: The earthquake's epicenter was located in the Pacific Ocean east of Sendai City, Miyagi Prefecture, with a hypocenter depth of 24 kilometers, and it triggered a massive tsunami with a maximum run-up height of 40.1 meters.

src: 这场地震是日本有观测纪录到以来第一个震级超过9的地震。
ref: The quake was the first earthquake with a magnitude greater than 9 in Japan's recorded history.
draft_translation: This earthquake is the first one with a magnitude exceeding 9 recorded in Japan's history.
final_translation: This earthquake is the first one with a magnitude exceeding 9 recorded in Japan's history.

src: 约有2.2万人在灾害丧生，大约40万座建筑被完全摧毁或倒塌。
ref: Some 22,000 people were killed in the disaster, and about 400,000 buildings were completely destroyed or collapsed.
draft_translation: About 22,000 people died in the disaster, and approximately 400,000 buildings were completely destroyed or collapsed.
final_translation: About 22,000 people died in the disaster, and approximately 400,000 buildings were completely destroyed or collapsed.

src: 福岛第一核电站受地震海啸影响发生泄漏事故。
ref: The Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant suffered a leak due to the earthquake and tsunami.
draft_translation: Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant experienced a leakage incident due to the impact of an earthquake and tsunami.
final_translation: Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant experienced a leakage incident due to the impact of an earthquake and tsunami.

src: 这次事故在国际核事件分级表（INES）中被分类为最严重的7级。
ref: This accident was classified as the highest level, level 7, on the International Nuclear and Radiological Event Scale (INES).
draft_translation: This accident was classified as the most severe level 7 on the International Nuclear Event Scale (INES).
final_translation: This accident was classified as level 7 on the International Nuclear Event Scale (INES).

src: 福岛核事故导致在全世界都测量到微量辐射性物质，包括碘-131、铯-137（半衰期为30年）在内。
ref: The Fukushima nuclear accident resulted in trace amounts of radioactive substances being detected worldwide, including iodine-131 and cesium-137 (with a half-life of 30 years).
draft_translation: The Fukushima nuclear accident caused trace amounts of radioactive substances to be measured worldwide, including iodine-131 and cesium-137 (with a half-life of 30 years).
final_translation: The Fukushima nuclear accident caused trace amounts of radioactive substances to be measured worldwide, including iodine-131 and cesium-137 (with a half-life of 30 years).

src: 大量放射性同位素因此核事故释入太平洋。
ref: As a result of the nuclear accident, a significant amount of radioactive isotopes was released into the Pacific Ocean.
draft_translation: A large amount of radioactive isotopes were therefore released into the Pacific Ocean by the nuclear accident.
final_translation: A large amount of radioactive isotopes were thus released into the Pacific Ocean by the nuclear accident.

src: 根据联合国的统计，在土叙两国灾区，目前至少有87万人急需食物。
ref: According to United Nations statistics, in the disaster-stricken areas of Turkey and Syria, at least 870,000 people are currently in urgent need of food.
draft_translation: According to UN statistics, at least 870,000 people in the disaster areas of Turkey and Syria currently urgently need food.
final_translation: According to UN statistics, at least 870,000 people in the disaster areas of Turkey and Syria currently urgently need food.

src: 仅仅在叙利亚，就有多达530万人因为地震而失去家园。
ref: In Syria alone, as many as 530 million people lost their homes because of the earthquake.
draft_translation: In Syria alone, more than 5.3 million people have been displaced due to the earthquake.
final_translation: In Syria alone, more than 5.3 million people have been displaced due to the earthquake.

src: 世界粮食计划署（WFP）呼吁拨款7700万美元，为土耳其和叙利亚因为地震而流离失所的灾民提供食物。
ref: The World Food Programme (WFP) has called for $77 million in funding to provide food assistance to the displaced populations in Turkey and Syria affected by the earthquake.
draft_translation: The World Food Programme (WFP) calls for a donation of 77 million dollars to provide food for displaced civilians in Turkey and Syria affected by the earthquake.
final_translation: The World Food Programme (WFP) calls for funds of 77 million dollars to provide food for displaced people in Turkey and Syria affected by the earthquake.

src: 目前灾区气温低至零下，很多灾民没有住所。
ref: Currently, the temperatures in the affected areas have dropped to below freezing, and many displaced people do not have proper shelter.
draft_translation: The current temperature in the disaster area is as low as below zero, and many disaster victims have no shelter.
final_translation: The current temperature in the disaster area is as low as below zero, and many disaster victims have no shelter.

src: 土耳其政府分发了大量的热餐、帐篷和毯子，但是这些物资仍然难以送达很多急需帮助的人。
ref: The Turkish government has distributed large quantities of hot meals, tents, and blankets, but these supplies are still struggling to reach many people in dire need.
draft_translation: The Turkish government has distributed a large number of hot meals, tents, and blankets, but these supplies still find it difficult to reach many people in urgent need.
final_translation: The Turkish government has distributed a large number of hot meals, tents, and blankets, but these supplies still have difficulty reaching many people in need.

src: 而在深陷内战泥潭长达12年之久的叙利亚，地震则使民众的苦难处境雪上加霜。
ref: In Syria, which has been mired in civil war for 12 years, the earthquake has made the suffering of the people worse.
draft_translation: The earthquake has added to the suffering of the people in Syria, a country that has been trapped in a civil war for 12 years.
final_translation: The earthquake has added to the suffering of the people in Syria, a country that has been trapped in a civil war for 12 years.

src: 在地震发生后的四天内，世界粮食计划署已经向土耳其和叙利亚的11.5万人提供了食物救济。
ref: Within four days after the earthquake, the World Food Programme has provided food assistance to 115,000 people in Turkey and Syria.
draft_translation: The World Food Programme has provided food aid to 115,000 people in Turkey and Syria within four days of the earthquake.
final_translation: The World Food Programme has provided food aid to 115,000 people in Turkey and Syria within four days of the earthquake.

src: 世界卫生组织（WHO）则送去了72吨用于外伤处理和紧急手术的医药物资。
ref: The World Health Organization (WHO) has delivered 72 tons of medical supplies for trauma care and emergency surgeries.
draft_translation: The World Health Organization (WHO) sent 72 tons of medical supplies for trauma care and emergency surgery.
final_translation: The World Health Organization (WHO) dispatched 72 tons of medical supplies for trauma care and emergency surgery.

src: （美联社、路透社等）
ref: (Associated Press, Reuters)
draft_translation: (Associated Press, Reuters, etc.)
final_translation: (Associated Press, Reuters, etc.)

src: 任何不当行为都将导致追偿，并受到刑事追究。
ref: Any improper behavior will result in compensation and may be subject to criminal prosecution.
draft_translation: Any improper conduct will result in compensation and be subject to criminal liability.
final_translation: Any improper conduct will result in compensation and be subject to criminal liability.

src: NEWS GOV-MO: 警情通告：司警局呼吁市民提防假冒电讯公司诈骗短讯
ref: NEWS GOV-MO: Alert: SFPD urges citizens to beware of fraudulent SMS messages from fake telecommunication companies
draft_translation: News Gov-MO: Alert: The Police Bureau urges citizens to be cautious of fraudulent short messages from telecom companies
final_translation: News Gov-MO: Alert: The Police Bureau urges citizens to be cautious of fraudulent text messages from telecom companies

src: 近日司警局接获多宗电信诈骗案，不法分子假冒本澳电讯公司向事主发送附有网站连结的诈骗短信，以积分到期须尽快换领奖赏为饵，诱骗事主登入虚假网站进行兑换。
ref: Recently, the Police Department received a number of telecommunications fraud cases, the criminals faked the Macao Telecommunications Company to send fraud text messages attached to the victim,they need to redeem the reward as soon as possible before the points expired, deceiving the victim to log in to the false website for exchange.
draft_translation: The police department has received multiple reports of telecom fraud cases recently. Unscrupulous individuals have impersonated the Macau Telecommunications Company and sent fraudulent text messages to victims, containing website links. They lure victims into logging into fake websites to exchange points by claiming that the points are about to expire and must be redeemed promptly.
final_translation: The police department has received multiple reports of telecom fraud recently. Unscrupulous individuals impersonated the Macau Telecommunications Company and sent fraudulent text messages to victims, containing website links. They lured victims into logging into fake websites to redeem points by claiming their points were about to expire and needed immediate redemption.

src: 事主按指示输入信用卡资料及验证码，随即收到金融机构通知信用卡出现不明消费记录，怀疑信用卡资料经上述网站被盗取。
ref: The subject entered his credit card information and verification code as instructed, and then received a notification from his financial institution that his credit card had unidentified purchase records, suspecting that his credit card information had been stolen through the above website.
draft_translation: The account holder entered the credit card details and verification code as instructed. Soon afterward, they received a notification from the financial institution about an unknown consumption record on their credit card, suspecting that the credit card information had been stolen through the aforementioned website.
final_translation: The user entered the credit card details and verification code as instructed. Soon afterward, they received a notification from the financial institution about an unknown transaction record on their credit card, suspecting that the credit card information had been stolen through the aforementioned website.

src: 经查，证实相关电讯公司并无发出上述短讯。
ref: Upon investigation, it has been confirmed that the mentioned telecommunications companies did not send out the aforementioned text messages.
draft_translation: After investigation, it has been confirmed that the relevant telecommunications company did not send the above short message.
final_translation: After investigation, it has been confirmed that the relevant telecommunications company did not send the aforementioned short message.

src: 司警局呼吁市民，如接获类似手机短讯须提高警惕，切勿登入短讯所载网站连结或提供任何个人资料；若被要求提供信用卡资料、帐户交易密码、交易验证码，更要加倍谨慎，防止信用卡被盗刷。
ref: The SFPD urges the public to be vigilant if they receive similar cell phone text messages and not to access the website links contained in the text messages or provide any personal information; if they are asked to provide credit card information, account transaction passwords, transaction verification codes, they should be doubly cautious to prevent credit card theft.
draft_translation: The police bureau urges citizens to remain vigilant if they receive similar SMS messages. Do not click on the links in the messages or provide any personal information. If asked to provide credit card details, account transaction passwords, or transaction verification codes, be especially cautious to prevent credit card theft.
final_translation: The police bureau urges citizens to remain vigilant if they receive similar SMS messages. Do not click on the links in the messages or provide any personal information. If asked to provide credit card details, account transaction passwords, or transaction verification codes, be especially cautious to prevent credit card theft.

src: 防骗提示：
ref: Anti-fraud tips:
draft_translation: Anti-fraud reminder:
final_translation: Anti fraud reminder:

src: 1. 多关注网络安全资讯，提高个人防范意识；
ref: 1. Pay more attention to network security information and improve personal awareness of prevention;
draft_translation: 1. Pay more attention to cybersecurity information and enhance personal awareness of prevention;
final_translation: 1. Pay more attention to network security information and increase personal awareness of prevention;

src: 2. 切勿随便登入来历不明的网站并在网站内登记个人及信用卡资料，以防遭人盗用；
ref: 2. Do not log on to websites of unknown origin and register your personal and credit card information on the websites to prevent fraudulent use;
draft_translation: Do not log in to websites of unknown origin and register personal and credit card information on them, to prevent theft;
final_translation: Do not log in to websites of unknown origin and register personal and credit card information on them, to prevent theft;

src: 3. 警惕假冒网站及钓鱼网站，时刻留意网站网址是否与官方网站完全相符；
ref: 3. Be wary of fake websites and phishing websites, and always pay attention to whether the website URL is exactly the same as the official website;
draft_translation: Be cautious of fake websites and phishing sites, and always check whether the website URL is exactly the same as the official website;
final_translation: Be cautious of fake websites and phishing sites, and always check whether the website URL is exactly the same as the official website;

src: 4. 为手机、移动装置或电脑安装防毒软件，并定期更新；
ref: 4. Install anti-virus software for cell phones, mobile devices or computers, and update it regularly;
draft_translation: Install antivirus software on phones, mobile devices, or computers and update it regularly;
final_translation: Install antivirus software on phone, mobile devices, or computers and update it regularly;

src: 5. 怀疑遇到诈骗或其他犯罪时，应立即致电司警局防诈骗查询热线8800 7777或报案热线993求助。
ref: 5. If you suspect a fraud or other crime, you should immediately call the Divisional Police Fraud Enquiry Hotline at 8800 7777 or the Crime Reporting Hotline at 993 for assistance.
draft_translation: If you suspect you have encountered fraud or other crimes, contact the police department's anti-fraud inquiry hotline 8800 7777 or the reporting hotline 993 immediately.

src: NEWS GOV-MO: 香港大型考察团走访澳门旅游景点设施 吸引港客并拓展港澳“联线同游”
ref: NEWS GOV-MO: Hong Kong delegation visits Macau tourist attractions and facilities to attract Hong Kong tourists and expand the "joint tour" between Hong Kong and Macau
draft_translation: Hong Kong's large delegation visits Macau tourism attractions to attract Hong Kong tourists and expand the "joint tour" between Hong Kong and Macau
final_translation: Hong Kong's large delegation visits Macau tourism attractions to draw in Hong Kong tourists and expand the joint tour between Hong Kong and Macau

src: 旅游局组织由香港政府旅游部门、旅游业界及传媒代表组成超过100人的大型香港考察团到澳门，两天(10日及11日)的日程除了工作会议和业界洽谈，香港旅行社业界及传媒代表更分批走访澳门多个旅游景点、酒店及旅游相关设施，为香港市场引进最新的澳门旅游产品，同时促进两地文旅联动，共拓港澳“联线同游”市场。
ref: MGTO organized a large-scale Hong Kong delegation of over 100 people from the Hong Kong government tourism department, travel trade and media representatives to Macau,in addition to working meetings and trade negotiations, the two-day (10th and 11th) program included visits to a number of tourist attractions, hotels and tourism-related facilities in batches by Hong Kong travel trade and media representatives to introduce the latest Macau tourism products to the Hong Kong market, as well as to promote the linkage of cultural tourism between the two places to jointly develop the "joint tour" market of Hong Kong and Macau.
draft_translation: The tourism bureau organized a large group of more than 100 people, consisting of representatives from the Hong Kong government's tourism department, the tourism industry, and the media, to visit Macau. The two-day itinerary (on the 10th and 11th) included meetings and industry discussions. Hong Kong travel agencies and media representatives also visited multiple tourist attractions, hotels, and tourism-related facilities in Macau in batches. This aimed to introduce the latest Macau tourism products to the Hong Kong market and promote cultural and tourism cooperation between the two places, jointly expanding the "linked travel" market in Hong Kong and Macau.
final_translation: The Hong Kong Tourism Board organized a large group of more than 100 people, including representatives from the Hong Kong government's tourism department, the tourism industry, and the media, for a two-day visit to Macau (October 10th and 11th). The itinerary featured meetings and industry discussions, with Hong Kong tourism industry and media representatives visiting multiple tourist attractions, hotels, and tourism-related facilities in batches. This aimed to introduce Macau's latest tourism products to the Hong Kong market and promote cross-border cultural and tourism cooperation, jointly expanding the "linked travel" market in Hong Kong and Macau.

src: 亲临考察引入澳门旅游新玩法
ref: Visiting Macau for on-site inspections to introduce new tourism experiences
draft_translation: On-site inspection introduces new gaming styles for Macau tourism
final_translation: A visit introduces new games for Macau's tourism

src: 是次香港百人大型考察团包括香港政府旅游相关部门领导主管、60多位来自旅行社及港澳跨境交通营运商的代表以及约30位分别来自旅游杂志及报章的记者、旅游社交媒体、网络媒体代表及博客/网红等，亲临澳门交流考察，了解澳门最新旅游资源，香港业界及媒体将澳门旅游的新玩法带给香港居民以至访港旅客，藉香港交通枢纽的优势，拓展港澳“联线同游”市场。
ref: The 100-member Hong Kong delegation included leaders of tourism-related departments of the Hong Kong Government, more than 60 representatives from travel agencies and cross-border transport operators in Hong Kong and Macau, as well as about 30 journalists from travel magazines and newspapers, travel social media, online media representatives and bloggers/weblebrities, etc ,they visited Macau to learn about the latest tourism resources of Macau, and the Hong Kong industry and media brought new ways of Macau tourism to Hong Kong residents and tourists visiting Hong Kong, and took the advantage of Hong Kong's transportation hub to expand the market of "joint tour" between Hong Kong and Macau.
draft_translation: The Hong Kong large-scale group of 100 included leaders from Hong Kong's tourism administrative departments, more than 60 representatives from travel agencies and cross-border transportation operators in Hong Kong and Macau, and about 30 journalists from travel magazines and newspapers, as well as representatives from tourism social media, online media, blogs, and influencers. They visited Macau for exchange and study, to understand Macau's latest tourism resources. The Hong Kong tourism industry and media will bring Macau's new tourism experiences to Hong Kong residents and visitors to Hong Kong, leveraging the advantage of Hong Kong's transportation hubs to expand the "linked travel" market between Hong Kong and Macau.
final_translation: A large-scale group of 100 from Hong Kong included leaders from Hong Kong's tourism administrative departments, more than 60 representatives from travel agencies and cross-border transportation operators in Hong Kong and Macau, and about 30 journalists from travel magazines and newspapers, as well as representatives from tourism social media, online media, blogs, and influencers. They visited Macau for exchange and visit, to understand Macau's latest tourism resources. The Hong Kong tourism industry and media will bring Macau's new tourism experiences to Hong Kong residents and visitors, leveraging Hong Kong's transportation hubs to expand the "linked travel" market between Hong Kong and Macau.

src: 两天紧密行程 觅商机 增宣传
ref: Two-day intensive itinerary to seek business opportunities and increase publicity
draft_translation: Intensive two-day schedule to seek business opportunities and enhance promotion
final_translation: Two-day intensive schedule to seek business opportunities and boost promotional efforts

src: 考察团于昨今两天分组参观世界遗产“澳门历史城区”、体验澳门大赛车博物馆、“时空穿梭‧游历三巴” —— 大三巴牌坊沉浸式数字体验展、澳品荟、氹仔旧城区，以及多个大型度假村酒店及设施：上葡京、The Karl Lagerfeld、永利皇宫、美狮美高梅、摩珀斯、澳门伦敦人、澳门银河、新濠天地的Artelli多维艺术空间及澳门威尼斯人的teamLab超自然空间等。
ref: The delegation visited the World Heritage Site "Historic Centre of Macau", the Macau Grand Prix Museum, the "Time Warp" - an immersive digital experience at the Ruins of St. Paul's, the Ao Pinhe, the Taipa Old Town, as well as several major resorts and facilities: Grand Lisboa, The Karl Lagerfeld, Wynn Palace, MGM MACAU, The Mopars, The Londoner, Galaxy Macau, Artelli Multi-Dimensional Art Space at City of Dreams and teamLab Supernatural Space at The Venetian Macau
draft_translation: The delegation visited the World Heritage Site "Old City of Macau" in two days, experienced the Macau Grand Prix Museum, participated in the "Time Travel · Touring the Three Bao" immersive digital exhibition at the Big Buddha, visited the Macau Product Fair, the old district of Taipa, and various large resort hotels and facilities, including Sanya葡京, The Karl Lagerfeld,永利皇宫, MGM Grand, Moorea, Macau London, Macau Galaxy, New濠天地's Artelli multidimensional art space, and Macau Venetian's teamLab supernatural space.
final_translation: The delegation visited the World Heritage Site "Old City of Macau" over two days, visited the Macau Grand Prix Museum, participated in the "Time Travel · Touring the Three Bao" immersive digital exhibition at the Big Buddha Archway, visited the Macau Product Fair, the old district of Taipa, and various large resort hotels and facilities, including Sanya葡京, The Karl Lagerfeld,永利皇宫, MGM Grand, Moorea, Macau London, Macau Galaxy, New濠天地's Artelli multidimensional art space, and Macau Venetian's teamLab supernatural space.

src: 考察团成员透过参观澳门旅游设施、亲身体验澳门“旅游+”元素，将澳门旅游资源及游历经验分享给香港居民，整合澳门最新旅游产品推介及销售予香港居民。
ref: Through visiting Macau's tourism facilities and experiencing Macau's "Tourism+" elements, members of the delegation shared Macau's tourism resources and experiences with Hong Kong residents, and integrated Macau's latest tourism products for promotion and sale to Hong Kong residents.
draft_translation: The members of the delegation visited Macau's tourism facilities and experienced Macau's "tourism plus" elements firsthand, sharing Macau's tourism resources and travel experiences with Hong Kong residents. They also integrated the latest tourism products and promoted and sold them to Hong Kong residents.
final_translation: The members of the delegation visited Macau's tourism facilities and experienced Macau's "tourism-plus" elements firsthand, sharing Macau's tourism experiences with Hong Kong residents. They also promoted and sold the latest tourism products to Hong Kong residents.

src: 吸引香港旅客 拓展港澳“联线同游”
ref: Attract Hong Kong tourists to expand Hong Kong and Macao "joint line with the tour"
draft_translation: Attracting Hong Kong tourists to expand the "joint travel" initiative between Hong Kong and Macau
final_translation: Attracting Hong Kong tourists to expand the "joint travel" program between Hong Kong and Macau

src: 乘着通关复常的契机，旅游局铺开了香港市场的宣传攻势及推出各项优惠，其中包括推出了往返港澳交通票务优惠，以崭新的宣传片于线上线下平台投放广告等。
ref: Taking advantage of the return of customs clearance, MGTO launched a promotional campaign in the Hong Kong market and launched various discounts, including discounts on round-trip transportation tickets to Hong Kong and Macau, and advertising on online and offline platforms with brand-new promotional videos.
draft_translation: The tourism bureau has launched a promotional campaign and introduced various discounts in the Hong Kong market, taking advantage of the opportunity to resume normal operations. This includes the launch of travel and transportation discounts between Hong Kong and Macau, as well as the release of a new promotional video for advertising on both online and offline platforms.
final_translation: The Tourism Bureau has launched a promotional campaign and introduced various discounts in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, taking advantage of the opportunity to resume operations. This includes the launch of travel and transportation services discounts between Hong Kong and Macau, as well as the release of a new promotional video for advertising on both online and offline platforms.

src: 继上月邀请香港旅游业界领袖来澳交流考察及香港网红亲身体验澳门“旅游+”，这次再度组织香港旅游业界及传媒代表来澳考察，加大市场推广力度，吸引香港旅客来澳留宿消费，两地业界更洽商携手拓展港澳“联线同游”市场，共拓内地以至海外市场，促进两地旅游业复苏。
ref: Following last month's invitation to Hong Kong tourism industry leaders to Macau for exchanges and visits and Hong Kong netizens to experience Macau's "tourism +", this time again organized by the Hong Kong tourism industry and media representatives to visit Macau, increase marketing efforts to attract Hong Kong tourists to stay and spend in Macau, the two industries to discuss the development of Hong Kong and Macao "joint tour" market, to expand the mainland and overseas markets, to promote the recovery of tourism in both places.
draft_translation: The previous month, we invited Hong Kong tourism industry leaders to visit Australia for exchange and inspection, as well as Hong Kong influencers to experience Macau's "Tourism Plus." This time, we have again organized Hong Kong tourism industry and media representatives to visit Australia for inspection, strengthening market promotion efforts to attract Hong Kong tourists to stay and spend in Macau. The two sides have also discussed collaborating to expand the "linked tourism" market between Hong Kong and Macau, jointly exploring markets in mainland China and overseas, promoting the recovery of the tourism industries in both regions.
final_translation: Last month, we invited Hong Kong tourism industry leaders to visit Australia for exchange and study, as well as Hong Kong netizens to experience Macau's "Tourism Plus." This time, we have again organized Hong Kong tourism industry and media representatives to visit Australia for study, strengthening market promotion efforts to attract Hong Kong tourists to stay and spend in Macau. The two sides have also discussed collaborating to expand the "joint tourism" market between Hong Kong and Macau, jointly exploring markets in mainland China and overseas, promoting the recovery of the tourism industries in both regions.

src: 习近平回信勉励援中非中国医疗队队员 以仁心仁术造福当地人民 以实际行动讲好中国故事 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线
ref: Xi Jinping wrote back to encourage the members of the Chinese medical team to aid China and Africa to benefit the local people with benevolence and benevolence, and to tell the story of China with practical actions - News - Hunan Daily - Huasheng Online
draft_translation: President Xi Jinping writes back to encourage Chinese medical team members who are assisting in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, urging them to use their compassion and medical skills to benefit the local people and to tell the story of China through their actions.
final_translation: President Xi Jinping replies to encourage Chinese medical team members assisting in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, urging them to use their compassion and medical skills to benefit the local people and to tell the story of China through their actions.

src: 习近平回信勉励援中非中国医疗队队员 以仁心仁术造福当地人民 以实际行动讲好中国故事
ref: Xi Jinping wrote back to encourage China's medical team members to benefit local people with their benevolent hearts and skills and tell the Chinese story with practical actions
draft_translation: President Xi Jinping wrote a letter to encourage Chinese medical team members who are serving in the Democratic Republic of the Congo, urging them to use their compassion and medical skills to benefit the local people and to tell the story of China through their actions.

ref: 2023-02-11 13:09:10 [Source: Xinhua News Agency] [Editor in charge: Li Xufeng] Font: [Large Middle Small]
draft_translation: 2023-02-11 13:09:10 [Source: Xinhua News Agency] [Editor: Li Xufeng] Font: 【Large Medium Small】
final_translation: 2023-02-11 13:09:10 [Source: Xinhua News Agency] [Editor: Li Xufeng] Font: 【Large Medium Small】

src: 新华社北京2月10日电 中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席习近平2月9日给第19批援助中非共和国的中国医疗队队员回信，向他们以及广大援外医疗队员致以问候并提出殷切期望。
ref: BEIJING, February 10 (Xinhua) -- Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Communist Party of China (CPC) Central Committee, president of the country and chairman of the Central Military Commission, wrote back to the members of the 19th batch of Chinese medical team assisting the Central African Republic on February 9, sending greetings and raising high expectations to them and the general foreign aid medical staff.
draft_translation: Xinhua News, Beijing, February 10. President of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Xi Jinping, wrote a letter to the members of the 19th batch of Chinese medical teams assisting the Central African Republic on February 9, expressing greetings to them and to the vast number of overseas medical personnel and putting forward sincere expectations.
final_translation: Xinhua, Beijing, February 10. President of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, Xi Jinping, wrote a letter to the members of the 19th batch of Chinese medical teams assisting the Central African Republic on February 9, expressing greetings to them and to the vast majority of overseas medical personnel and stating sincere expectations.

src: 习近平在回信中说，你们在中非克服工作生活上的困难，用心服务当地民众，既是救死扶伤的白衣天使，也是传递情谊的友好使者。
ref: In his reply letter, Xi Jinping said that you overcame difficulties in work and life in Central Africa and served the local people wholeheartedly.
draft_translation: Xi Jinping said in his letter that your efforts to overcome difficulties in work and life and to serve the local people with care are both life-saving and healing white angels and friendly messengers who convey friendship.
final_translation: Xi Jinping said in his letter that you overcome difficulties in work and life in China-Africa and serve the local people with care, being both life-saving white angels and friendly messengers who convey friendship.

src: 今年是中国援外医疗队派遣60周年，谨向正在和曾经执行援外医疗任务的同志们致以诚挚的慰问。
ref: This year marks the 60th anniversary of the dispatch of China's foreign aid medical teams, and we would like to extend our sincere condolences to our comrades who are and have been on foreign aid medical missions.
draft_translation: This year marks the 60th anniversary of the dispatch of Chinese overseas medical teams. I extend sincere greetings to those who are currently and have previously carried out overseas medical missions.
final_translation: This year marks the 60th anniversary of the dispatch of Chinese overseas medical teams. We extend warm regards to those currently and previously undertaking overseas medical missions.

src: 习近平指出，中国人民热爱和平、珍视生命，援外医疗就是生动的体现。
ref: Xi Jinping pointed out that the Chinese people love peace and cherish life, and medical aid to foreign countries is a vivid embodiment.
draft_translation: Xi Jinping pointed out that the Chinese people love peace and value life, and overseas medical aid is a vivid example of this.
final_translation: Xi Jinping pointed out that the Chinese people love peace and value life, and overseas medical aid is a vivid example.

src: 希望你们不忘初心、牢记使命，大力弘扬不畏艰苦、甘于奉献、救死扶伤、大爱无疆的中国医疗队精神，以仁心仁术造福当地人民，以实际行动讲好中国故事，为推动构建人类卫生健康共同体作出更大贡献。
ref: I hope you will not forget your original intention, remember your mission, vigorously carry forward the spirit of the Chinese medical team, which is not afraid of hardship, willing to dedicate, saving lives and helping the injured, and making greater contributions to promoting the building of a human health community with practical actions to benefit the local people.
draft_translation: May you never forget your original aspirations and remember your missions. Strive to vigorously promote the spirit of the Chinese medical team, characterized by fearlessness in hardship, willingness to contribute, saving lives and healing the wounded, and boundless love. Use your medical skills and compassion to benefit the people of the local area, and through concrete actions, tell the story of China. Make greater contributions to promoting a community with a shared future in human health and well-being.
final_translation: May you never forget your original aspirations and missions. Vigorously promote the spirit of the Chinese medical team, characterized by fearlessness in hardship, willingness to contribute, saving lives and healing the wounded, and boundless love. Use your medical skills and compassion to benefit the people of the local area, and through concrete actions, tell China's story. Make greater contributions to promoting a community with a shared future in human health and well-being.

src: 援外医疗是我国援外工作的重要内容。
ref: Medical aid to foreign countries is an important part of China's foreign aid work.
draft_translation: Providing medical aid abroad is an important part of China's foreign aid work.
final_translation: Providing medical aid is a key component of China's foreign aid work.

src: 1963年，我国向阿尔及利亚派出第一支援外医疗队。
ref: In 1963, China sent the first medical team to Algeria to support foreign countries.
draft_translation: In 1963, our country sent its first overseas medical team to Algeria.
final_translation: In 1963, our country sent its first foreign medical team to Algeria.

src: 60年来，累计向非洲、亚洲、美洲、欧洲和大洋洲的76个国家和地区派遣医疗队员3万人次，诊治患者2.9亿人次，赢得国际社会广泛赞誉。
ref: Over the past 60 years, China has sent a total of 30,000 medical team members to 76 countries and regions in Africa, Asia, the Americas, Europe, and Oceania. These teams have provided medical services to 290 million patients, earning widespread praise from the international community.
draft_translation: Over the past 60 years, more than 30,000 medical staff have been sent to 76 countries and regions in Africa, Asia, the Americas, Europe, and Oceania, treating 290 million patients and winning widespread praise from the international community.
final_translation: Over the past 60 years, more than 30,000 medical personnel have been sent to 76 countries and regions in Africa, Asia, the Americas, Europe, and Oceania, treating 290 million patients and winning widespread praise from the international community.

src: 目前，援外医疗队在全球56个国家的115个医疗点工作，其中近一半在偏远艰苦地区。
ref: Currently, Chinese medical teams are working in 115 medical facilities in 56 countries around the world, with nearly half of them located in remote and challenging areas.
draft_translation: Currently, the overseas medical teams are working at 115 medical posts in 56 countries around the world, with nearly half of them located in remote and harsh areas.
final_translation: Currently, outward-bound medical teams operate at 115 medical stations in 56 countries worldwide, with nearly half situated in remote and arduous regions.

src: 近日，第19批援中非中国医疗队的11名队员给习近平总书记写信，汇报学习贯彻党的二十大精神、为当地民众提供医疗服务等情况，表达为推动构建人类卫生健康共同体贡献力量的决心。
ref: Recently, 11 members of the 19th batch of Chinese medical teams to aid China and Africa wrote a letter to General Secretary Xi Jinping, reporting on studying and implementing the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, providing medical services for local people, and expressing their contribution to promoting the construction of a human health community determination of strength.
draft_translation: The 11 members of the 19th batch of Chinese medical teams sent a letter to President Xi Jinping recently, reporting on their study and implementation of the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, their provision of medical services to local residents, and their determination to contribute to the construction of a community with a shared future in human health and well-being.
final_translation: The 11 members of the 19th batch Chinese medical team wrote to President Xi Jinping recently, reporting on their study and implementation of the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, their provision of medical services to local residents, and their determination to contribute to the construction of a community with a shared future in human health.

src: 新进中央委员会的委员、候补委员和省部级主要领导干部学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想和党的二十大精神研讨班结业 - 滚动新闻 - 湖南日报网 - 华声在线

final_translation: Graduation of the Study Session for Newly Elected Members and Alternate Members of the Central Committee and Provincial and Ministerial-Level Principal Officials on Learning and Implementing the Thought of Xi Jinping in the New Era and the Spirit of the 20th National Congress - Rolling News - Hunan Daily Network - Huasheng Online

src: 新进中央委员会的委员、候补委员和省部级主要领导干部学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想和党的二十大精神研讨班结业
ref: New members of the Central Committee, alternate members and major leading cadres at the provincial and ministerial levels to study and implement Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and the spirit of the 20th Party Congress completed the seminar
draft_translation: The concluding session of the study class for new members and alternate members of the Central Committee and provincial and ministerial level principal officials on studying and implementing the thought of Xi Jinping in the new era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China
final_translation: The conclusion of the study class for new members and alternate members of the Central Committee and provincial and ministerial level principal officials on studying Xi Jinping's thought in the new era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China

ref: 2023-02-11 13:07:20 [Source:Xinhua] [Editor:Li Shuofeng] Font:[Large Medium Small]
draft_translation: 2023-02-11 13:07:20 [Source: Xinhua News Agency] [Editor: Li Xufeng] Font: 【Large Medium Small】
final_translation: 2023-02-11 13:07:20 [Source: Xinhua] [Editor: Li Xufeng] Font: 'Large Medium Small'

src: 新华社北京2月10日电 新进中央委员会的委员、候补委员和省部级主要领导干部学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想和党的二十大精神研讨班10日下午在中央党校（国家行政学院）结业，中共中央政治局常委、中央书记处书记蔡奇出席结业式并作总结讲话。
ref: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 10th--New members, alternate members, and major leading cadres at the provincial and ministerial levels of the Central Committee study and implement Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics and the spirit of the 20th Party Congress on the afternoon of the 10th, the Central Party School ( National School of Administration), Cai Qi, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and secretary of the Central Secretariat, attended the closing ceremony and delivered a concluding speech.
draft_translation: The news agency Xinhua reported that on February 10, the study class for new members and alternate members of the Central Committee, as well as provincial and ministerial-level leading cadres, to learn and implement the thought of Xi Jinping in the new era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China concluded at the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance).中共中央 Political Bureau Standing Committee member and Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Cai Qi, attended the conclusion ceremony and delivered a summary speech.
final_translation: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 10 — A study group for new members and alternate members of the Central Committee, as well as provincial and ministerial-level leading cadres, to learn and implement the thought of Xi Jinping in the new era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China concluded at the Central Party School (National Academy of Governance).中共中央 Political Bureau Standing Committee member and Secretary of the Central Secretariat Cai Qi attended the closing ceremony and delivered a summary speech.

src: 他表示，要深入学习贯彻习近平总书记在研讨班开班式上的重要讲话精神，更加坚定拥护“两个确立”、坚决做到“两个维护”，增强本领、真抓实干，扎实推进中国式现代化各项工作，在全面建设社会主义现代化国家、全面推进中华民族伟大复兴中创造经得起历史、实践和人民检验的业绩。
ref: "He said that we should study and implement the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important speech at the opening ceremony of the seminar, more firmly support the ""two establishments"", resolutely achieve the ""two maintenance"", enhance the skills, real work, and solidly promote the work of Chinese modernization, in the comprehensive construction of a modern socialist country, the comprehensive promotion of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation to create a performance that can withstand the test of history, practice and the people."
draft_translation: He said that we should thoroughly study and implement the important speech by President Xi Jinping at the opening ceremony of the study session. We should more firmly uphold the "two establishments" and resolutely achieve the "two maintenances," enhance our capabilities, work hard and practically, and steadily advance all the work related to the modernization of China's development. We should create achievements that can stand the test of history, practice, and the people in the comprehensive building of a modern socialist country and the comprehensive promotion of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.
final_translation: He said that we should thoroughly study and implement the important speech by President Xi Jinping at the opening ceremony of the study group. We should more firmly uphold the "two确立s" and resolutely achieve the "two maintenances," enhance our capabilities, work hard and practically, and steadily advance all the work related to the modernization of China's development. We should create achievements that can stand the test of history, practice, and the people in the comprehensive building of a modern socialist country and the comprehensive promotion of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

src: 研讨班期间，全体学员以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，认真学习党的二十大精神和习近平总书记在研讨班开班式上的重要讲话，联系实际深入研讨交流，深化了对中国式现代化一系列重大理论和实践问题的认识，增强了在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下以中国式现代化全面推进中华民族伟大复兴的信心和决心，增强了履职尽责、做好工作、确保新时代新征程良好开局的责任感和使命感。
ref: During the seminar, all participants were guided by Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, earnestly studied the spirit of the 20th CPC National Congress and the important speech of General Secretary Xi Jinping at the opening ceremony of the seminar, deepened their understanding of a series of major theoretical and practical issues of Chinese-style modernization, enhanced their confidence and determination to comprehensively promote the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation with Chinese-style modernization under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, and strengthened their sense of responsibility and mission to perform their duties and responsibilities and do their work well to ensure a good start of the new journey in the new era.
draft_translation: The participants of the study session took习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想 as the guiding principle, carefully studied the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party and the important speech by President Xi Jinping at the opening ceremony of the study session. They deeply discussed and exchanged views in relation to their actual work, further enhancing their understanding of a series of major theoretical and practical issues concerning the Chinese path to modernization. They also strengthened their confidence and determination to advance the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation through the Chinese path to modernization under the strong leadership of the Central Committee of the Party with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core. They also enhanced their sense of responsibility and mission to fulfill their duties, do well in their work, and ensure a good start for a new era and new journey.
final_translation: During the study session, all participants took Xi Jinping's Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era as their guiding principle, thoroughly studying the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party and President Xi Jinping's important speech at the opening ceremony. They engaged in in-depth discussions and exchanges related to their actual work, further enhancing their understanding of key theoretical and practical issues concerning the Chinese path to modernization. They strengthened their confidence and determination to advance the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation through the Chinese path to modernization under the strong leadership of the Party with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core. They also enhanced their sense of responsibility and mission to fulfill their duties, perform their work effectively, and ensure a positive start for a new era and journey.

src: 结业式上，研讨班10名代表发言，汇报交流了学习收获。
ref: At the closing ceremony, 10 representatives from the seminar delivered speeches, sharing their learning achievements and experiences.
draft_translation: The 10 representatives of the study group gave speeches at the graduation ceremony, reporting and exchanging their learning experiences.
final_translation: The 10 representatives of the study group gave speeches at the graduation ceremony, sharing their learning experiences.

src: 蔡奇表示，学习贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想和党的二十大精神，既是当前和今后一个时期的首要政治任务，也是一项长期战略任务，要按照“全面学习、全面把握、全面落实”的要求，推动学习贯彻工作不断往深里走、往实里走、往心里走。
ref: Cai Qi said that the study and implementation of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and the spirit of the 20th Party Congress is not only the primary political task for the current and future period, but also a long-term strategic task, in accordance with the requirements of "comprehensive study, comprehensive grasp, comprehensive implementation", to promote the study and implementation of the work continues to go deeper, more practical, to the heart.
draft_translation: Cai Qi stated that thoroughly studying and implementing the thought of Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China is not only the primary political task for the current and future period but also a long-term strategic task. It is necessary to follow the requirements of "comprehensively studying, comprehensively grasping, and comprehensively implementing" to continuously promote the study and implementation work deeper, more practical, and more heartfelt.
final_translation: Cai Qi stated that thoroughly studying and implementing Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China is not only the primary political task for the current and future period but also a long-term strategic task. It is necessary to follow the requirements of "comprehensively studying, comprehensively grasping, and comprehensively implementing" to continuously advance the study and implementation work deeper, more practically, and more heartfelt.

src: 要更加深刻领悟“两个确立”的决定性意义，坚决维护习近平总书记的核心地位、维护党中央权威和集中统一领导，不断提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，始终在思想上政治上行动上同以习近平同志为核心的党中央保持高度一致。
ref: To deeply comprehend the decisive significance of the "two established", resolutely safeguard the core position of General Secretary Xi Jinping, safeguard the authority of the Party Central Committee and centralized unified leadership, and constantly improve political judgment, political comprehension, political implementation, always in the ideological and political action to maintain a high degree of consistency with the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core.
draft_translation: We need to have a deeper understanding of the decisive significance of upholding the two确立s, firmly maintain the core position of President Xi Jinping, and uphold the authority and centralized, unified leadership of the Central Committee of the CPC. We should continuously improve our political judgment, political understanding, and political execution ability, and always stay in high alignment with the Central Committee of the CPC with President Xi Jinping at its core in thought, politics, and action.
final_translation: We must deeply grasp the decisive significance of "the two确立s," firmly uphold President Xi Jinping's core position, and maintain the authority and centralized, unified leadership of the CPC Central Committee. We should continuously enhance our political judgment, political understanding, and political execution capabilities, always staying in high alignment with the CPC Central Committee with President Xi Jinping at its core in thought, politics, and action.

src: 要努力掌握好马克思主义理论这一看家本领，自觉用党的创新理论武装头脑、指导实践、推动工作，在深学、细悟、笃行上下功夫，真正学出坚定信念、学出绝对忠诚、学出使命担当。
ref: We should strive to master Marxist theory as a fundamental skills, consciously use the Party's innovative theory to arm the mind, guide practice, and promote work, in deep learning, understanding, and practice on the effort, and really learn a firm belief, learn absolute loyalty, and learn to take responsibility for the mission.
draft_translation: One must strive to master the theoretical achievements of Marxism, which is the fundamental skill, and consciously use the innovative theories of the Party to arm one's mind, guide practice, and promote work. One should focus on deep study, thorough understanding, and determined implementation, truly cultivating firm beliefs, absolute loyalty, and a sense of mission and responsibility through learning.
final_translation: One must strive to master the theoretical essence of Marxism, which is the fundamental ability, and consciously use the Party's innovative theories to arm one's mind, guide practice, and promote work. Focus on deep study, thorough understanding, and determined implementation, truly cultivating firm beliefs, absolute loyalty, and a sense of mission and responsibility.

src: 要以奋发有为的精神状态贯彻落实好党的二十大各项决策部署，扎实推进中国式现代化，撸起袖子加油干，扑下身子当好“施工队长”，一步一个脚印把蓝图变为现实。
ref: It is necessary to implement the decisions and deployments of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China with a vigorous and promising spirit, solidly promote Chinese-style modernization, roll up your sleeves and work harder, and throw yourself down to be a good "construction captain" step by step to turn the blueprint into reality.
draft_translation: We should thoroughly implement the various decisions and deployments of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China with a spirit of striving forward and being proactive, steadily advancing the modernization with Chinese characteristics. We should roll up our sleeves and work hard, take the initiative, and serve as capable "project managers" to turn the blueprint into reality step by step.
final_translation: We should thoroughly implement the various decisions and deployments of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China with a spirit of polish, determination, and proactivity, steadily advancing the modernization with Chinese characteristics. We should roll up our sleeves and work hard, take the lead, and serve as "project managers" to turn the blueprint into reality step by step.

src: 要牢记全面从严治党永远在路上、党的自我革命永远在路上，压紧压实全面从严治党政治责任，以党的政治建设为统领，深入推进新时代党的建设新的伟大工程。
ref: To bear in mind that the overall strict governance of the party is an ongoing process, and also the party's self-revolution is an ongoing process, pressing the political responsibility for the overall strict governance of the party, with the party's political construction as the leader, in-depth promotion of the new era of the party's construction of the new great project.
draft_translation: We must always remember that comprehensive strict governance of the Party is a long-term journey, and the self-revolution of the Party is also a long-term journey. We should firmly shoulder the political responsibility of comprehensive strict governance of the Party, with the political construction of the Party as the leading guide, and deeply advance the great project of building the Party in the new era.
final_translation: We must always remember that comprehensive strict governance of the Party is a long-term journey, and the Party's self-revolution is also a long-term journey. We should firmly safeguard the political responsibility of comprehensive strict governance of the Party, with the Party's political construction as the leading force, and deeply proceed with the great project of the Party's self-revolution in the new era.

src: 要增强推动高质量发展本领、服务群众本领、防范化解风险本领，大兴调查研究之风，坚决防止和克服形式主义、官僚主义。
ref: To enhance the ability to promote high-quality development, the ability to serve the masses, the ability to prevent and resolve risks, the wind of investigation and research, and resolutely prevent and overcome formalism and bureaucracy.
draft_translation: We need to enhance the ability to promote high-quality development, serve the people, and prevent and resolve risks. We should vigorously promote the style of investigation and research, and firmly prevent and overcome formalism and bureaucratism.
final_translation: We must strengthen our capacity to advance high-quality development, serve the people, and prevent and address risks. We should vigorously promote the practice of investigation and research, and firmly resist formalism and bureaucratism.

src: 石泰峰、李干杰、李书磊、陈文清、刘金国、王小洪出席结业式，陈希主持结业式。
ref: Shi Taifeng, Li Ganjie, Li Shulei, Chen Wenqing, Liu Jinguo, and Wang Xiaohong attended the graduation ceremony, with Chen Xi presiding over the ceremony.
draft_translation: The leaders Shi Taiping, Li Ganjie, Li Shulei, Chen Wenqing, Liu Jin guo, and Wang Xiaohong attended the graduation ceremony, which was hosted by Chen Xi.

src: Google AI聊天机器人“答错问题” 母公司股价蒸发千亿美元
ref: Google AI chatbot 'answers the wrong questions', parent company's stock price drops by $100 billion
draft_translation: Google AI chatbot "answers wrong questions" parent company's stock loses trillions of dollars

src: （综合11日电）
ref: (General 11)
draft_translation: (News 11 Comprehensive)
final_translation: Comprehensive 11 News

src: Google新推出的人工智能聊天机器人Bard出师不利，在宣传短片中“答错问题”，导致Google母公司Alphabet股价周三一度急挫8.9%，跌破100美元大关，市值蒸发1100亿美元（约4765亿令吉），截至周五闭市报94.57美元。
ref: Google's new artificial intelligence chat robot Bard got off to a bad start and "answered the wrong question" in the promotional video, causing Google's parent company Alphabet's stock price to plummet 8.9% on Wednesday, falling below the $100 mark, and its market value evaporated by $110 billion (approximately 4765 billion ringgit), at US$94.57 as of Friday’s close.
