draft_translation: The new AI chatbot Bard from Google has had a difficult start, as it "answered questions incorrectly" in its promotional video, causing the stock price of Alphabet, Google's parent company, to drop by as much as 8.9% on Wednesday, breaking below the $100 mark and losing $110 billion in market value (approximately $476.5 billion). As of Friday's closing price, it was reported at $94.57.
final_translation: The new AI chatbot Bard from Google has had a difficult start, as it "answered questions incorrectly" in its promotional video, causing the stock price of Alphabet, Google's parent company, to drop by as much as 8.9% on Wednesday, breaking below the $100 mark and losing $110 billion in market value (approximately 476.5 billion ringgit). The stock closed at $94.57 on Friday.

src: 市场担心Alphabet不及竞争对手微软。
ref: The market is concerned that Alphabet may not be able to compete with its rival, Microsoft.
draft_translation: The market is concerned that Alphabet will underperform its competitor Microsoft.
final_translation: The market is concerned that Alphabet will underperform its competitor Microsoft.

src: 根据《路透社》报道，google较早时在社交媒体发布AI聊天机器人Bard的宣传短片，片中有人询问Bard：“我可以告诉我9岁的孩子关于James Webb太空望远镜 (JWST) 的哪些新发现？
ref: According to Reuters, Google earlier released a promotional video for Bard, an AI chatbot, on social media in which Bard is asked, "What can I tell my 9-year-old about the new discoveries of the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST)?
draft_translation: According to a report by Reuters, Google had earlier released a promotional video for its AI chatbot Bard on social media, in which someone asked Bard: "What new discoveries about the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) can I tell my 9-year-old child?"
final_translation: According to a report by Reuters, Google had earlier released a promotional video for its AI chatbot Bard on social media, in which someone asked Bard: "What new discoveries about the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) can I tell my 9-year-old child?"

src: ”Bard在回答中提到该望远镜曾拍摄到太阳系外行星的第一张照片。
ref: In its response, Bard mentioned that the telescope had captured the first-ever photograph of an exoplanet outside our solar system."
draft_translation: The Bard mentioned that this telescope captured the first photo of an exoplanet.
final_translation: The AI mentioned that the telescope captured the first photo of an exoplanet.

src: 不过，根据美国国家航空航天局资料，太阳系外行星的第一张照片是由欧洲南方天文台的“甚大望远镜”于2004年所拍。
ref: However, according to data from NASA, the first photograph of an exoplanet outside our solar system was actually taken by the Very Large Telescope (VLT) of the European Southern Observatory in 2004.
draft_translation: However, according to NASA's data, the first photo of an exoplanet was taken by the Very Large Telescope of the European Southern Observatory in 2004.
final_translation: However, according to NASA's data, the first photo of an exoplanet was taken by the Very Large Telescope of the European Southern Observatory in 2004.

src: 《路透社》更以“Bard回答错误后Alphabet股价暴跌”为题报道。
ref: Reuters reported with the headline "Alphabet stock plunges after Bard gives incorrect answer."
draft_translation: The Reuters reported on the title "Alphabet's Stock Plummets After Bard Gives Wrong Answer".
final_translation: The Reuters reported under the title "Alphabet's Stock Plummets After Bard Gives a Wrong Answer".

src: 另一方面，Google指出，Bard的回应“突显了严格测试过程的重要性”，会把外部反馈与自己的内部测试结合起来，以确保Bard的回应“在质量、安全和真实信息的基础上达到高标准”。
ref: On the other hand, Google pointed out that Bard's response "highlighted the importance of rigorous testing processes" and stated that they would combine external feedback with their internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses "meet high standards in terms of quality, safety, and accurate information."
draft_translation: On the other hand, Google pointed out that Bard's response "highlighted the importance of rigorous testing processes," which will combine external feedback with its own internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses "meet high standards based on quality, safety, and factual information."
final_translation: On the other hand, Google pointed out that Bard's response "highlighted the importance of rigorous testing processes," which combines external feedback with its own internal testing to ensure that Bard's responses "meet high standards based on quality, safety, and accurate information."

src: 新加坡旅游业复苏强劲 入境旅客比2021年增长19倍
ref: Singapore tourism recovers strongly, arrivals up 19 times compared to 2021
draft_translation: The Singapore tourism industry is recovering strongly, with inbound tourists increasing 19 times compared to 2021.

src: （综合11日电）新加坡旅游局近日公布，预计2023年到访新加坡的国际旅客人次可达1200万至1400万，将带来约180亿至210亿新元的旅游收益；旅客人次和旅游收入将恢复到2019年新冠疫情前约67%至75%的水平；2024年旅游业实现全面复苏的可能性很大。
ref: (Comprehensive, 11th) The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that it is estimated that the number of international tourists visiting Singapore in 2023 will reach 12 million to 14 million, which will bring about 18 billion to 21 billion Singapore dollars in tourism revenue; the number of tourists and tourism revenue It will return to the level of about 67% to 75% before the new crown epidemic in 2019; the possibility of a full recovery of the tourism industry in 2024 is very high.
draft_translation: (Xinhua, Nov 11) The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that the number of international visitors to Singapore is expected to reach 12 to 14 million in 2023, bringing tourism revenue of about 18 billion to 21 billion Singapore dollars; the number of visitors and tourism revenue are expected to recover to approximately 67% to 75% of the levels before the pandemic in 2019; there is a high possibility that the tourism industry will fully recover in 2024.
final_translation: (Xinhua News Agency, November 11) The Singapore Tourism Board recently announced that the number of international visitors to Singapore is expected to reach 12 to 14 million in 2023, bringing tourism revenue of about 18 billion to 21 billion Singapore dollars; the number of visitors and tourism revenue are expected to recover to approximately 67% to 75% of the levels before the pandemic in 2019; there is a high possibility that the tourism industry will fully recover in 2024.

src: 2022年新加坡旅游市场逐步重新启动和恢复。
ref: In 2022, the Singapore tourism market will gradually restart and recover.
draft_translation: The Singapore tourism market gradually resumed and recovered in 2022.
final_translation: The Singapore tourism market gradually resumed and rebounded in 2022.

src: 新加坡旅游局最新发布的统计数据显示，2022年入境旅客从2021年的33.06万人次增长19倍，达到630万人次，超越旅游局早前预估的400万至600万人次，游客已经恢复至疫情前33%的水平。
ref: The latest statistics released by the Singapore Tourism Board show that arrivals in 2022 have increased 19-fold to 6.3 million from 330,600 in 2021, surpassing the Board's earlier estimate of 4 to 6 million, with visitors having recovered to 33% of their pre-epidemic levels.
draft_translation: The latest statistics released by the Singapore Tourist Authority show that the number of inbound tourists increased 19 times from 330,600 in 2021 to 6.3 million in 2022, surpassing the authority's earlier estimate of 4 to 6 million. Tourists have already recovered to 33% of pre-pandemic levels.
final_translation: The latest statistics released by the Singapore Tourism Authority show that the number of inbound tourists increased 19 times from 330,600 in 2021 to 6.3 million in 2022, surpassing the authority's earlier estimate of 4 to 6 million. Tourists have already recovered to 33% of pre-pandemic levels.

src: 2022年1月至9月，新加坡旅游收入共计89.6亿新元，预计2022年全年旅游收入可达138亿至143亿新元，比2021年的18.9亿新元增长6倍至7倍，已经恢复到2019年新冠疫情前约50%至52%的水平。
ref: From January to September 2022, Singapore's tourism revenue totaled 89.6 billion Singapore dollars, and is expected that the annual tourism revenue in 2022 will reach 138 billion to 143 billion Singapore dollars, an increase of 6 to 7 times compared with 189 billion Singapore dollars in 2021. Return to the level of about 50% to 52% before the new crown epidemic in 2019.
draft_translation: The total tourism revenue in Singapore from January to September 2022 was 8.96 billion Singapore dollars, with an estimated total tourism revenue for the entire year of 2022 reaching 13.8 to 14.3 billion Singapore dollars, a growth of 6 to 7 times compared to the 1.89 billion Singapore dollars in 2021. It has already recovered to about 50% to 52% of the level before the pandemic in 2019.
final_translation: The total tourism revenue in Singapore from January to September 2022 was 8.96 billion Singapore dollars, with an estimated total tourism revenue for the entire year of 2022 reaching 13.8 to 14.3 billion Singapore dollars, a growth of 6 to 7 times compared to 1.89 billion Singapore dollars in 2021. It has already recovered to about 50% to 52% of the level before the pandemic in 2019.

src: 新加坡政府多措并举，加速旅游业复苏。
ref: The Singapore government has implemented multiple measures to accelerate the recovery of the tourism industry.
draft_translation: Singapore's government is taking multiple measures to accelerate the recovery of the tourism industry.
final_translation: Singapore's government is taking multiple measures to accelerate the recovery of the tourism industry.

src: 2022年4月，政府宣布拨款近5亿新元用来刺激旅游业复苏。
ref: In April 2022, the government announced a funding of nearly SGD 500 million to stimulate the recovery of the tourism industry.
draft_translation: The government announced in April 2022 that it would allocate nearly 500 million new dollars to stimulate the recovery of the tourism industry.
final_translation: The government announced in April 2022 that it would allocate nearly 500 million New Zealand dollars to stimulate the recovery of the tourism industry.

src: 旅游局日前宣布，将计划在未来两年从这笔预算中拨出1.1亿新元，推出更多商业和休闲活动吸引旅客回流。
ref: The tourism bureau announced a few days ago its plan to allocate 110 million Singapore dollars from this budget over the next two years to launch more business and leisure activities in order to attract tourists back.
draft_translation: The tourism board announced recently that it plans to allocate 11 million new dollars from this budget over the next two years to launch more business and leisure activities to attract tourists back.
final_translation: The tourism authority announced recently that it plans to allocate 11 million Canadian dollars from this budget over the next two years to launch more business and leisure activities to attract tourists back.

src: 为了使健康养生成为新加坡的旅游亮点之一，新加坡旅游局在2022年11月23日发布了一份意向征集活动，计划在新加坡南部海岸开发一个健康养生景点。
ref: In order to make health and wellness one of the tourism highlights in Singapore, the Singapore Tourism Board released a call for expressions of interest on November 23, 2022, planning to develop a health and wellness attraction on the south coast of Singapore.
draft_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board launched an intent-seeking campaign on November 23, 2022, to make health and wellness a key attraction of tourism in Singapore, with plans to develop a health and wellness destination along the southern coast of Singapore.
final_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board launched a call for proposals on November 23, 2022, to make health and wellness a key attraction in the tourism sector, with plans to develop a health and wellness destination along the southern coast of Singapore.

src: 新加坡旅游局体育与康养旅游执行署长王凌丽说，近年来，越来越多的游客把身体健康放在各项考虑因素的首位。
ref: According to Wong Ling Li, the Executive Director of Sports and Wellness Tourism at the Singapore Tourism Board, in recent years, an increasing number of tourists prioritize their physical well-being as a key consideration factor.
draft_translation: Singapore Tourism Board Executive Director for Sports and Wellness Tourism, Wang Lingli, said that in recent years, an increasing number of tourists have placed their health and well-being at the top of their consideration factors.
final_translation: Singapore Tourism Board Executive Director of Sports and Wellness Tourism, Wang Lingli, said that in recent years, an increasing number of tourists have placed their health and well-being at the top of their priority considerations.

src: 在拥有滨海湾花园、滨海堤坝的滨海南区开发一个健康养生景点，有望为新加坡的旅游业和经济作出贡献，让游客在新加坡消费并逗留更久。
ref: The development of a health and wellness attraction in Marina South, with its Marina Bay Gardens and Marina Barrage, is expected to contribute to Singapore's tourism and economy, allowing visitors to spend and stay longer in Singapore.
draft_translation: Developing a health and wellness destination in the Marina Bay area, which includes Marina Bay Gardens and Marina Bay Promenade, has the potential to contribute to Singapore's tourism and economy by encouraging tourists to spend more time and money in the city.
final_translation: Developing a health and wellness destination in the Marina Bay Area, which includes Marina Bay Gardens and Marina Bay Promenade, has the potential to contribute to Singapore's tourism and economy by encouraging tourists to spend more time and money in the city.

src: 新加坡旅游局局长陈建隆表示，未来几年内，健康养生将成为新加坡旅游产品的重要组成部分。
ref: Singapore Tourism Board Director, Keith Tan, has stated that health and wellness will become an important component of Singapore's tourism offerings in the coming years.
draft_translation: Singapore Tourism Director Chen Jianlong stated that in the coming years, health and wellness will become an important component of Singapore's tourism products.
final_translation: Singapore Tourism Minister Chen Jianlong stated that in the coming years, health and wellness will become an important component of Singapore's tourism products.

src: 新冠疫情提升了公众对于身体和心理健康的认知和需求。
ref: The COVID-19 pandemic has heightened public awareness and demand for physical and mental health.
draft_translation: The novel coronavirus pandemic has raised public awareness and demand for physical and mental health.
final_translation: The novel coronavirus pandemic has raised public awareness and demand for physical and mental health.

src: 为此，过去两年旅游局一直向本地公众和国际游客推广健康养生项目。
ref: As a result, over the past two years, the tourism board has been promoting health and wellness initiatives to both local residents and international tourists.
draft_translation: The tourism board has been promoting health and wellness programs to the local public and international tourists for the past two years.
final_translation: The tourism board has been promoting health and wellness programs to the local public and international tourists for the past two years.

src: 2022年6月，新加坡旅游局举办了首届健康养生节，为公众提供了130多项各类健康活动和体验。
ref: In June 2022, the Singapore Tourism Board organized the first Health and Wellness Festival, offering the public over 130 different health activities and experiences.
draft_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board held the first Healthy Living Festival in June 2022, offering the public over 130 health-related activities and experiences.
final_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board held the first Healthy Living Festival in June 2022, offering the public over 130 health-related activities and experiences.

src: 新加坡将持续为游客提供新的旅行体验。
ref: Singapore will continue to provide new travel experiences for tourists.
draft_translation: Singapore will continue to offer new travel experiences for tourists.
final_translation: Singapore will continue to offer new travel experiences for tourists.

src: 除新开放的新加坡儿童博物馆、滨海湾花园的阿凡达世界、圣淘沙中央海滩市集、艺术科学博物馆新增的“探索新领域”展厅，以及夜间野生动物园新建的露天剧场外，旅游局将支持万态野生动物世界的飞禽公园等项目发展与更新，使新加坡成为具有吸引力的国际旅行地。
ref: In addition to the newly opened Singapore Children's Museum, Avatar World at Gardens by the Bay, Sentosa Central Beach Bazaar, ArtScience Museum's new "Explore New Frontiers" exhibition hall, and the new amphitheater at Night Safari, the Tourism Bureau will support the development and renewal of projects such as the bird park in Wantai Wildlife World has made Singapore an attractive international travel destination.
draft_translation: The Tourism Board will support the development and updates of projects such as the Avatar World at Gardens by the Bay, the Sentosa Central Beach Boardwalk, the newly added "Explore New Frontiers" exhibition at the National Museum of Singapore, and the open-air theater at the Night Safari, as well as the Bird Park at Wild Asia, to make Singapore an attractive destination for international travelers.
final_translation: The Tourism Board will support the development and updates of projects such as Avatar World at Gardens by the Bay, Sentosa Central Beach Boardwalk, the newly added "Explore New Frontiers" exhibition at the National Museum of Singapore, and the outdoor theater at Night Safari, as well as the Bird Park at Wild Asia, to make Singapore an attractive destination for international travelers.

src: 按照计划，新加坡将于2023年年内制定会议、会展与奖励旅游业可持续发展的相关行业标准，并着重改善废物处理和碳排放两大方面的问题，进一步优化旅游环境。
ref: According to the plan, Singapore will develop industry standards for the sustainable development of meetings, conventions and incentives tourism in 2023, and focus on improving two major aspects of waste disposal and carbon emissions to further optimize the tourism environment.
draft_translation: Singapore is planned to establish industry standards for the sustainable development of meetings, exhibitions, and reward tourism within the year 2023, with a focus on improving waste management and carbon emissions, further optimizing the tourism environment.
final_translation: Singapore will plan to establish industry standards for the sustainable development of meetings, exhibitions, and reward tourism within the year 2023, with a focus on improving waste management and carbon emissions, further optimizing the tourism environment.

src: 新加坡旅游业的复苏加快了航空业复苏。
ref: The recovery of Singapore's tourism industry has accelerated the recovery of the aviation industry.
draft_translation: The recovery of Singapore's tourism industry has accelerated the recovery of the aviation industry.
final_translation: The recovery of Singapore's tourism industry has accelerated the recovery of the aviation industry.

src: 数据显示，截至2022年12月18日，樟宜机场客流量强劲复苏，每天接待的乘客已多达15万人次，每周约100万人次，相当于新冠疫情前的75%左右，航空业员工在岗数量也已经恢复到疫情前约90%的水平。
ref: Data show that as of December 18, 2022, Changi Airport has seen a strong recovery in passenger traffic, receiving as many as 150,000 passengers per day and about one million per week, equivalent to about 75% of the pre-Sinkuan outbreak level, and the number of airline employees on the job has returned to about 90% of the pre-outbreak level.
draft_translation: The data shows that as of December 18, 2022, the passenger traffic at Changi Airport has strongly recovered. The airport welcomed as many as 150,000 passengers per day, totaling about 10 million passengers per week, which is approximately 75% of the level before the pandemic. The number of aviation industry employees on the job has also recovered to about 90% of the pre-pandemic level.
final_translation: The data shows that as of December 18, 2022, passenger traffic at Changi Airport has strongly recovered. The airport welcomed as many as 150,000 passengers per day, totaling about 1.05 million passengers per week, which is approximately 75% of the level before the pandemic. The number of aviation industry employees on the job has also recovered to about 90% of the pre-pandemic level.

src: 数据显示，2022年1月至10月新加坡已接待旅客2360万人次，相当于新冠疫情前的42%，起降航班17万架次，是疫情前的53%。
ref: The data shows that Singapore has received 23.6 million passengers from January to October 2022, equivalent to 42% of the pre-Singaporean epidemic level, with 170,000 flights landing and taking off, 53% of the pre-epidemic level
draft_translation: Data shows that from January to October 2022, Singapore received 23.6 million tourists, equivalent to 42% of pre-pandemic levels, and handled 1.7 million flight takeoffs and landings, equivalent to 53% of pre-pandemic levels.
final_translation: Data shows that from January to October 2022, Singapore received 23.6 million travelers, equivalent to 42% of pre-pandemic levels, and recorded 1.7 million flight takeoffs and landings, equivalent to 53% of pre-pandemic levels.

src: 旅游业快速复苏，也带动了住宿、交通、餐饮和购物等行业的复苏步伐。
ref: The rapid recovery of the tourism industry has also spurred the revival of other sectors such as accommodation, transportation, food and beverage, and retail.
draft_translation: The rapid recovery of the tourism industry has also spurred the recovery of industries such as accommodation, transportation, catering, and shopping.
final_translation: The rapid recovery of the tourism industry has also spurred the recovery of industries such as accommodation, transportation, catering, and shopping.

src: 新加坡政府和旅游业对中国市场寄予厚望。
ref: The Singapore government and tourism industry have high hopes for the Chinese market.
draft_translation: The Singapore government and tourism industry have high hopes for the Chinese market.
final_translation: The Singapore government and tourism industry have high hopes for the Chinese market.

src: 新加坡旅游局国际司助理局长柯淑丹说，中国旅行平台的一项调查显示，新加坡的安全指数位列全球前三，这也是新加坡深受中国游客喜爱的原因之一。
ref: Assistant Director of the International Division of the Singapore Tourism Board (STB), Ko Suk Tan, said a survey by China Travel Platform ranked Singapore among the top three countries in the world in terms of safety index, which is one of the reasons why Singapore is so popular among Chinese tourists.
draft_translation: Coc Suhu Dan, Assistant Director of the International Division of the Singapore Tourist Board, said that a survey by a Chinese travel platform shows that Singapore's safety index ranks among the top three globally, which is also one of the reasons why Singapore is popular among Chinese tourists.
final_translation: Koh Suhu Dan, Assistant Director of the International Department of the Singapore Tourism Board, said that a survey by a Chinese travel platform shows that Singapore's safety index ranks among the top three globally, which is also one of the reasons why Singapore is popular among Chinese tourists.

src: 新冠疫情前，中国每年有约360万人次到新加坡旅行度假。
ref: Before the COVID-19 pandemic, about 3.60 million people from China traveled to Singapore for vacation each year
draft_translation: Before the COVID-19 pandemic, about 3.6 million people traveled to Singapore for tourism and vacation in China each year.
final_translation: Before the COVID-19 pandemic, about 3.6 million people traveled to Singapore for tourism and vacation from China each year.

src: 随着中国放宽边境政策，预计今年中国游客人次可恢复至2019年的三成至六成。
ref: With China easing its border policies, it is expected that the number of Chinese tourist arrivals this year will recover to around 30% to 60% of the levels seen in 2019.
draft_translation: With China easing border policies, it is expected that the number of Chinese tourists this year will recover to 30% to 60% of the 2019 level.
final_translation: With China easing border policies, it is expected that the number of Chinese tourists this year will recover to about 30% to 60% of the 2019 figure.

src: 柯淑丹指出，接下来，旅游局将密切关注中国针对出境旅行政策进一步释放的信号，以应对游客需求的变化。
ref: Ke Shudan pointed out that next, the tourism bureau will pay close attention to the further signals released by China's outbound travel policy in order to respond to changes in tourist demand.
draft_translation: Ke Shudan pointed out that the tourism bureau will closely monitor the further signals released by China regarding outbound travel policies to respond to changes in tourist demand.
final_translation: Ke Shudan pointed out that the tourism bureau will closely monitor the further signals from China regarding outbound travel policies to respond to changes in tourist demand.

src: 新加坡旅游局除与携程等中国线上旅行平台、旅行社强化伙伴关系外，将针对中国境外游出现的新趋势，积极做好接待中国游客的准备。
ref: In addition to strengthening partnerships with Chinese online travel platforms and travel agencies such as Ctrip, the Singapore Tourism Board will actively prepare to receive Chinese tourists in response to emerging trends in outbound travel from China.
draft_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board will strengthen partnerships with Chinese online travel platforms and travel agencies such as Ctrip, and will actively prepare to welcome Chinese tourists in response to new trends in outbound travel for Chinese tourists.
final_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board will strengthen partnerships with Chinese online travel platforms and travel agencies such as Ctrip, and will actively prepare to welcome Chinese tourists in response to new trends in outbound travel.

src: 展望2023年旅游市场，新加坡旅游局充满信心，认为全球经济只要不出现显著衰退影响公众收入，以及不再有新的大面积致命疫情暴发等情况出现，旅游业复苏步伐将快于预期。
ref: Looking ahead to 2023, the Singapore Tourism Board is confident that tourism will recover at a faster than expected pace as long as the global economy does not experience a significant recession that affects public revenues, and as long as there are no new outbreaks of widespread deadly epidemics.
draft_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board is confident in looking ahead to the 2023 tourism market. It believes that the recovery of the tourism industry will be faster than expected as long as the global economy does not experience a significant recession that affects public income, and there are no new large-scale deadly pandemic outbreaks.
final_translation: The Singapore Tourism Board is confident about the 2023 tourism sector. It believes that the recovery of the tourism industry will be faster than expected as long as the global economy does not experience a significant recession affecting public income, and there are no new large-scale deadly pandemics.

src: 金正恩父女互动亲密 老婆遭冷落一旁
ref: Kim Jong-un's father and daughter interact intimately, but his wife is ignored
draft_translation: Kim Jong-un's father and daughter have a close interaction, while his wife is left aside.
final_translation: Kim Jong-un's father and daughter have a close interaction, while his wife is left aside.

src: （综合11日电）朝鲜8日晚间举行建军节第75周年阅兵仪式，领导人金正恩的女儿金主爱不仅出席，还与父亲一同站上主席台。
ref: "(General 11) - North Korea held a military parade on the 75th anniversary of Army Day on the evening of the 8th, and leader Kim Jong-un's daughter Kim Jong-ae not only attended but also stood on the podium together with her father."
draft_translation: (Xinhua, Nov. 11) On the evening of August 8, North Korea held a military parade to mark the 75th anniversary of the founding of its People's Army. Not only did Kim Jong-un's daughter, Kim Jai-ae, attend, but she also stood on the main platform with her father.
final_translation: (Xinhua, November 11) On the evening of August 8, North Korea held a military parade to mark the 75th anniversary of the founding of its People's Army. Not only did Kim Jong-un's daughter, Kim Jai-ae, attend, but she also stood on the podium with her father.

src: 朝鲜官媒9日公布影片，金主爱依偎在父亲身边，数次温情对视、讲悄悄话，她用双手轻捧老爸的脸颊，甚至摸著父亲胸口，父女互动画面播送至举国上下。
ref: The official media of the DPRK released a video on the 9th, the main love of Kim nestled next to her father, several times warm look at each other, whispering, she gently cupped her father's cheeks with both hands, and even touched his chest, father-daughter interaction images broadcast to the whole country.
draft_translation: The North Korean state media released the video on the 9th. Jin Zun Ai leaned against her father's side, having several warm glances and whispering to him. She gently捧 her father's face with both hands and even touched her father's chest. The father-daughter interaction was broadcast nationwide.
final_translation: The North Korean state media released the video on the 9th. Jin Zhu Ai cuddled next to her father, having several warm glances and whispering to him. She gently捧 her father's face with both hands and even touched her father's chest. The father-daughter interaction was broadcast nationwide.

src: 然而，第一夫人李雪主只能退到一旁。
ref: However, the First Lady, Ri Sol-ju, could only step aside.
draft_translation: However, First Lady Li Xuezhong can only step back to the side.
final_translation: However, First Lady Li Xuezhong must step back.

src: 综合韩国“朝鲜新闻”等报导，金正恩、李雪主夫妇7日带著女儿金主爱出席晚宴的官方合照中，金主爱不仅罕见坐在父母正中间C位，在隔日晚间建军节第75周年阅兵仪式上，她还与金正恩一起登上主席台。
ref: Based on South Korean "North Korea News" and other reports, in the official group photo of Kim Jong-un and Li Xuezhu with their daughter Kim Joo-ae attending the dinner on the 7th, Kim Joo-ae is not only rarely sitting in the Center seat between her parents, but also on the 75th anniversary of the Army Day the next night at the military parade, she also stood on the rostrum with Kim Jong-un.
draft_translation: According to reports from South Korea's "Chosun News" and others, in the official photo of Kim Jong-un and Lee Soo-jung on the seventh day, with their daughter Kim Joo-ae attending a banquet, Kim Joo-ae not only rarely sat in the center C position among her parents, but on the following night during the 75th anniversary of the Army Day parade, she also joined Kim Jong-un on the main stage.

src: 朝鲜官媒“朝鲜中央电视台”事后释出阅兵式影片，曝光了更多父女情深的画面。
ref: After the military parade, the official North Korean media, the "Korean Central Television," released a video showing more intimate moments between Kim Jong-un and his daughter.
draft_translation: The official media of North Korea, "North Korean Central Television," released the parade footage afterward, revealing more touching scenes of father-daughter affection.
final_translation: The official media of North Korea, "North Korean Central Television," released parade footage afterward, revealing more moving scenes of father-daughter bonds.

src: 金正恩在主席台上数次与女儿对望，两人脸上的笑容从未退去，还互相在耳边讲悄悄话，金主爱一度以双手捧起老爸的两颊，金正恩也以灿笑回应。
ref: Kim Jong-un looked at his daughter several times on the podium, the smiles on their faces never faded, and they whispered in each other's ears at one point, Kim Joo-ae cupped his father's cheeks with both hands, and Kim Jong-un responded with a bright smile.
draft_translation: Kim Jong-un several times looked at his daughter on the stage, and the two of them never lost their smiles. They also whispered to each other in each other's ears. Kim Jang-ai once held her father's cheeks with both hands, and Kim Jong-un responded with a bright smile.
final_translation: Kim Jong-un several times looked at his daughter on the stage, and the two of them never lost their smiles. They also whispered to each other in each other's ears. Kim Jang-ai once cupped her father's cheeks with both hands, and Kim Jong-un responded with a bright smile.

src: 其他官媒画面也显示，金主爱与金正恩坐在室内沙发椅上时，用手不断摸著父亲的脸；她与父亲挽著手走路时，一边用手摸在金正恩的胸口。
ref: Other official media footage also shows Kim Jong-ae touching her father's face with her hand while sitting on a sofa chair in the room with Kim Jong-un; she touches her hand on Kim Jong-un's chest while walking arm-in-arm with her father.
draft_translation: Other official media footage also shows that Kim Jong-nam, the money lender, was sitting on an indoor sofa when he continuously touched his father's face; when she walked with her father, she kept touching his chest with her hands.
final_translation: Other official media footage also shows that Kim Jong-nam, the money lender, was sitting on an indoor sofa when she continuously touched her father's face; when she walked with her father, she kept touching his chest with her hands.

src: 而第一夫人李雪主全程只能走在后头或是坐在一旁，总是距离丈夫和女儿有几步之差。
ref: The first lady, Li Xuezhu, could only walk behind or sit aside, always a few steps away from her husband and daughter.
draft_translation: The First Lady, Li Xuezhong, could only walk at the back or sit aside, always a few steps away from her husband and daughter.
final_translation: The First Lady, Li Xue Zhu, could only walk at the back or sit aside, always a few steps away from her husband and daughter.

src: 韩国媒体指出，金主爱自去年11月18日试射火星17飞弹首次在公开露脸以来，3个月以来曝光机率越来越高，至今已是第5度出现于正式场合。
ref: The South Korean media pointed out that since Kim Joo-ae made his first public appearance on November 18 last year during the test launch of the Mars-17 missile, the exposure rate has increased over the past three months, and has now appeared on official occasions for the fifth time.
draft_translation: The South Korean media pointed out that Kim Joon-ae has been increasingly exposed since her first public appearance on November 18 last year when she tested the Hwasong-17 missile. Over the past three months, she has appeared at formal events five times.
final_translation: The South Korean media pointed out that Kim Joon-ae has been increasingly visible since her first public appearance on November 18 last year when she tested the Hwasong-17 missile. Over the past three months, she has appeared at official events five times.

src: 朝鲜官媒提及金主爱时使用了最亲爱的子弟、尊贵的子弟等极高尊称，也播出金主爱在看台上俯瞰阅兵行进时反覆高喊誓死拥护白头血统的片段。
ref: The official media of the DPRK referred to Kim Jong-ae with high honorific titles such as dearest son and honored son, and also broadcast a clip of Kim Jong-ae repeatedly shouting his pledge to uphold the white head bloodline while overlooking the parade march from the stands.
draft_translation: The official media of North Korea used the highest titles such as "dear son" and "honorable son" when mentioning Kim Jong-nam. They also broadcasted footage of Kim Jong-nam shouting repeatedly "I will die defending the white bloodline" from the stand while watching the military parade.
final_translation: The official media of North Korea used the most esteemed titles such as "dear son" and "honorable son" when referring to Kim Jong-nam. They also broadcasted footage of Kim Jong-nam repeatedly shouting "I will die defending the white bloodline" from the platform while watching the military parade.

src: 这些迹象让外界怀疑金主爱是否已经被内定为金氏政权的继承人，《华盛顿邮报》分析认为“这是金正恩把中学年纪的女儿推上接班人地位的讯号”，不过也有观点认为，这样的判断仍为时过早，在金正恩膝下有儿子的情况中，仍保有各种可能性。
ref: The Washington Post analyzed that "this is a sign that Kim Jong-un is putting his middle-school-aged daughter in the position of successor," but some believe that it is still too early to tell, as there are still various possibilities for Kim Jong-un to have a son at his side.
draft_translation: These signs have led the outside world to suspect that Kim Jong Un may have already been designated as the successor to the Kim regime. The Washington Post analyzed that "this is a signal for Kim Jong Un to push his teenage daughter into a position of succession." However, there are also views that such a judgment is still premature. With Kim Jong Un having a son, there are still various possibilities.
final_translation: These signs have led the external world to suspect that Kim Jong Un has been designated as the successor to the Kim dynasty. The Washington Post analyzed that "this is a signal that Kim Jong Un is pushing his teenage daughter into a position of succession." However, there are also views that such a judgment is still premature. With Kim Jong Un having a son, there are still various possibilities.

src: 重阳问答︱如何看待美国1月非农就业数据大超预期及未来趋势 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
ref: Chongyang Q&A ︱ How do you think the US January non-farm payrolls data greatly exceeded expectations and future trends -
draft_translation: Understanding the US January non-farm payrolls data that significantly exceeded expectations and future trends - Economic Observation Network - A professional financial news website
final_translation: How to View the US January Non-Farm Payrolls Data That Significantly Exceeded Expectations and Future Trends - Economic Observation Network - A Professional Financial News Website

src: Q：请问重阳投资，如何看待美国1月非农就业数据大超预期及未来趋势？
ref: Q: May I ask Chongyang Investment, what do you think of the US non-agricultural employment data in January exceeding expectations and the future trend?
draft_translation: Q: How does Chongyang Investment view the US January non-farm payroll data, which significantly exceeded expectations, and its future trends?
final_translation: Q: How does Chongyang Investment view the US January non-farm payroll data, which significantly exceeded expectations, and its future trends?

src: A：2月3日美国劳工部公布2023年1月非农就业数据，新增非农就业51.7万人，大幅高于市场预期的18.9万人；失业率降至3.4%，为近50年以来的最低位；时薪同比增速4.4%，环比增速0.3%，略有放缓。
ref: A: On February 3, the U.S. Department of Labor released January 2023 nonfarm payrolls data, adding 517,000 new nonfarm jobs, significantly higher than market expectations of 189,000; the unemployment rate fell to 3.4%, the lowest in nearly 50 years; hourly earnings grew at a slightly slower rate of 4.4% year-over-year and 0.3% year-over-year.
draft_translation: A: The U.S. Department of Labor released the January 2023 non-farm payrolls data on February 3, showing an addition of 517,000 non-farm jobs, significantly higher than the market's expected 189,000; the unemployment rate fell to 3.4%, the lowest level in nearly 50 years; hourly wages grew by 4.4% year-over-year and 0.3% month-over-month, showing a slight slowdown.
final_translation: A: The U.S. Department of Labor released the January 2023 non-farm payrolls data on February 3, showing an addition of 517,000 non-farm jobs, significantly higher than the market's expected 189,000; the unemployment rate fell to 3.4%, the lowest level in nearly 50 years; hourly wages grew by 4.4% year-over-year and 0.3% month-over-month, showing a slight slowdown.

src: 从总量上来看，本次数据存在很多一次性和技术性因素的扰动，比如罢工返岗的教职工、调查统计口径的修正、季调因子的更新，后续可能将有所修正（参考2022年1月新增非农由50.4万人下修至36.4万人），非农就业或不像数据体现的那样强劲。
ref: In terms of overall figures, this data may be influenced by several one-time and technical factors, such as the return of striking teachers to work, revisions in survey statistical methods, and updates in seasonal adjustment factors. There could be subsequent revisions to the data (as seen in January 2022 when the initial figure of 504,000 new non-farm jobs was later revised down to 364,000 jobs). Therefore, the non-farm employment situation may not be as robust as the data initially suggests.
draft_translation: The data shows that there are many one-time and technical factors affecting the overall figures, such as the return of staff members who were on strike, adjustments in the survey methodology, and updates to the seasonal adjustment factors. Subsequent revisions may occur (refer to the example of the January 2022 non-farm payrolls, which were revised from 504,000 to 364,000). Therefore, non-farm employment may not be as strong as the data suggests.
final_translation: The overall data indicates that there are numerous one-time and technical factors affecting the figures, such as staff returning to work after strikes, adjustments in survey methodologies, and updates to seasonal adjustment factors. Subsequent revisions may occur (e.g., January 2022 non-farm payrolls were revised from 504,000 to 364,000). Therefore, non-farm employment may not be as strong as the data suggests.

src: 从结构上来看，高科技企业裁员影响仍在，但占比较低；高接触性服务业如休闲酒店、教育保健等新增就业大幅回升，数据显示服务业劳动力缺口仍存。
ref: From the structural point of view, the impact of layoffs in high-tech enterprises is still there, but it accounts for a lower percentage; new employment in high-touch services such as leisure and hotel, education and health care has rebounded sharply, and the data shows that there is still a labor gap in the service industry.
draft_translation: From a structural perspective, the impact of layoffs in high-tech enterprises is still present, but the proportion is relatively low; in contrast, sectors with high contact such as leisure hotels and education and healthcare have seen a significant rebound in new job creation. The data shows that there is still a labor shortage in the service sector.
final_translation: From a structural perspective, the impact of layoffs in high-tech enterprises remains, but the proportion is relatively low; in contrast, high-contact sectors such as leisure hotels and services, as well as education and healthcare, have seen a significant rebound in new job creation. Data shows that the service sector still faces labor shortages.

src: 结合同样大超预期的服务业PMI、岗位空缺和劳动力缺口数据的回升和消费信贷数据的强势，我们判断经过极端天气和节假日后美国服务业迎来了快速修复。
ref: Combined with the rebound in service industry PMI, job vacancies, and labor gap data, which also exceeded expectations, and the strength of consumer credit data, we judge that the US service industry has ushered in a quick recovery after extreme weather and holidays.
draft_translation: Combining the rebound of service sector PMI, job vacancies, and labor shortages, as well as the strong performance of consumer credit data, we judge that after the extreme weather and holidays, the U.S. services sector has entered a rapid recovery phase.
final_translation: Combining the rebound of service sector PMI, job vacancies, and labor shortage, as well as the strong performance of consumer credit data, we judge that after the extreme weather and holidays, the U.S. services sector has entered a rapid recovery phase.

src: 我们认为，在不经过衰退的情况下美国就业市场的供需紧张难以改善。
ref: We believe that the tight supply and demand in the US job market will hardly improve without going through a recession.
draft_translation: We believe that it is difficult to alleviate the tightness in the U.S. job market without a downturn.
final_translation: We believe that it would be difficult to ease the strain on the U.S. job market without a downturn.

src: 目前美国劳动力市场尚有500余万的供给缺口，而劳动参与率上行缓慢，尤其是25-54岁劳动参与率已经接近疫情前高点。
ref: There is still a supply gap of more than 5 million in the US labor market, and the labor force participation rate is moving slowly upward, especially for 25-54 year olds, which is already near its pre-epidemic high.
draft_translation: The US labor market currently has a supply gap of over 5 million, and the labor participation rate is rising slowly, especially the labor participation rate of those aged 25-54 has already approached the pre-pandemic high point.
final_translation: The US labor market currently has a supply gap of over 5 million, and the labor participation rate is rising slowly, especially the labor participation rate of those aged 25-54 has already approached the pre-pandemic high point.

src: 除此之外，由于美国居民超额储蓄和消费信贷的强势，消费需求的强劲将促使紧缩政策对就业市场的影响进一步滞后。
ref: In addition, due to the strength of excess savings of American residents and consumer credit, strong consumer demand will further lag the impact of tightening policies on the job market.
draft_translation: In addition, due to the strong savings and consumption credit of American residents, the strong demand will further delay the impact of tight policies on the job market.
final_translation: In addition, due to the strong savings and consumption credit of American residents, the robust demand will further delay the impact of tight policies on the job market.

src: 美国就业市场供需持续紧张将是2023年美国经济的底色。
ref: The ongoing tightness in the US job market's supply and demand will be a prevailing characteristic of the US economy in 2023.
draft_translation: The continued tightness of the U.S. job market supply and demand will be the hallmark of the U.S. economy in 2023.

src: 叠加目前临近加息结束，通胀预期不断反复，我们对薪资增速的持续下降并不乐观。
ref: Considering the impending end of interest rate hikes and the continuous fluctuations in inflation expectations, we are not optimistic about the sustained decline in wage growth.
draft_translation: Currently, the hiking cycle is approaching its end, and inflation expectations are repeatedly fluctuating. We are not optimistic about the continued decline in wage growth.
final_translation: Currently, the rate hike cycle is approaching its end, and inflation expectations are fluctuating. We are not optimistic about the continued decline in wage growth.

src: 本次数据公布前，美国股债汇市场对于美联储加息路径的预期过于乐观。
ref: Prior to the release of this data, the US stock, bond, and currency markets had overly optimistic expectations regarding the Federal Reserve's path of interest rate hikes.
draft_translation: Before the release of this data, the expectations of the U.S. stock, bond, and currency markets regarding the Federal Reserve's interest rate path were overly optimistic.
final_translation: Before the release of this data, market expectations of the U.S. stock, bond, and currency markets regarding the Federal Reserve's interest rate trajectory were overly optimistic.

src: 随着通胀数据的持续改善，美联储在缩短加息步伐的同时还不断维系着市场通胀预期脆弱的平衡，但市场对于美联储偏向鹰派的表述视而不见，不仅预期提前停止加息，还预期年末两次降息。
ref: As inflation data continues to improve, the Fed has continued to maintain the fragile balance of market inflation expectations while shortening the pace of rate hikes, but the market has turned a blind eye to the Fed's hawkish statements, expecting not only an early halt to rate hikes, but also two year-end rate cuts.
draft_translation: With the continuous improvement of inflation data, the Federal Reserve is slowing its hiking pace while maintaining the fragile balance of market inflation expectations. However, market participants ignore the Fed's pro-cyclical statements, expecting not only an early cessation of rate hikes but also two rate cuts by year-end.
final_translation: With the continuous improvement of inflation data, the Federal Reserve is slowing its hiking pace while maintaining the fragile balance of market inflation expectations. However, market ignores the Fed's hawkish statements, expecting not only an early cessation of rate hikes but also two rate cuts by year-end.

src: 在劳动力市场供需紧张，紧缩政策影响不明的情况下，我们认为美联储年末对于加息的指引是相对合理的，市场极端预期的调整和交易的拥挤或将对市场产生一定伤害。
ref: In the case of tight labor market supply and demand, the impact of tightening policy is unknown, we believe that the Fed's year-end guidance on rate hikes is relatively reasonable, the adjustment of extreme market expectations and the crowded trading may cause some harm to the market.
draft_translation: In the context of tight labor market supply and demand and the uncertain impact of tightening policies, we believe that the Federal Reserve's guidance on rate hikes at the end of the year is relatively reasonable. Market extreme expectations and trading congestion may pose certain harm to the market.
final_translation: In the context of tight labor market supply and demand and the uncertain impact of tightening policies, we believe that the Federal Reserve's guidance on rate hikes at the end of the year is relatively reasonable. Market extreme expectations and trading congestion may pose certain harm to the market.

src: 尽管如此，薪资增速的顽固难改当前通胀快速下降的趋势，随着M2数据同比转负以及各个CPI分项领先指标的逐渐转好，自10月份以来美国CPI数据已经转向快速下降阶段，薪资增速的顽固仅会对以后的通胀数据形成托底，当前的市场预期难以证伪，在下一期通胀数据公布后市场或进入新一轮博弈。
ref: Nevertheless, the stubbornness of payroll growth is difficult to change the current trend of rapid decline in inflation, with M2 data turning negative year-on-year and the gradual improvement of each CPI sub-leading indicators, since October the US CPI data has turned to a rapid decline in the phase, the stubbornness of payroll growth will only form the bottom of future inflation data, the current market expectations are difficult to falsify, the market may enter a new round of gaming after the next release of inflation data.
draft_translation: Despite this, the stubborn persistence of wage growth has not been able to reverse the rapid decline in current inflation trends. With the M2 data turning negative year-on-year and the gradual improvement of various leading indicators of CPI, since October the US CPI data has entered a phase of rapid decline. The stubborn persistence of wage growth will only serve as a floor for future inflation data. Current market expectations are difficult to disprove, and after the next round of inflation data is released, the market may enter a new round of speculation.
final_translation: Despite this, the stubborn persistence of wage growth has not been able to reverse the rapid decline in current inflation trends. With M2 data turning negative year-on-year and the gradual improvement of various CPI leading indicators, US CPI data has entered a phase of rapid decline since October. The stubborn persistence of wage growth will only provide support for future inflation data. Current market expectations are difficult to disprove, and after the next round of inflation data is released, the market may enter a new round of dynamics.

src: 杉杉创始人郑永刚因突发心脏疾病过世 曾带领中国服装第一股转型 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
ref: "Founder of Sugo Zheng Yonggang passed away due to sudden heart disease, once led the transformation of China's first garment stock - Economic Observation Network - Professional financial news website”
draft_translation: Founder of Sishan, Zheng Yonggang, passed away suddenly due to a sudden heart disease. He once led China's first clothing stock to transform.
final_translation: Founder of Sishan Group, Zheng Yonggang, passed away suddenly due to a sudden heart disease. He once led China's first clothing stock to transform.

src: 经济观察网 记者 郑淯心 2月11日，认证主体为杉杉控股有限公司（以下简称“杉杉控股 ” ） 的微信公众号发布讣告，杉杉企业创始人、杉杉控股董事局主席郑永刚因突发心脏疾病救治无效，于2023年2月10日去世，享年65岁。
ref: Economic Observer Network reporter Zheng Yuxin on February 11, announced through a WeChat official account affiliated with Suning Holdings Group Limited (hereinafter referred to as "Suning Holdings") that Suning's founder and Chairman of the Board of Suning Holdings, Zheng Yonggang, passed away on February 10, 2023, at the age of 65, due to the ineffectiveness of emergency treatment for a sudden heart disease.
draft_translation: On February 11th, the WeChat official account of Ssangyong Holding Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Ssangyong Holding") issued a notice. The founder of Ssangyong Enterprise and the chairman of the Board of Directors of Ssangyong Holding, Zheng Yonggang, passed away on February 10th, 2023, due to sudden cardiac disease, at the age of 65.
final_translation: On February 11, the WeChat official account of Shanshan Holding Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Shanshan Holding") issued a notice. The founder of Shanshan Enterprise and chairman of Shanshan Holding, Zheng Yonggang, passed away on February 10, 2023, due to sudden cardiac disease, at the age of 65.

src: 上世纪80年代，郑永刚担任国营棉纺厂的厂长，随着调任，1989年郑永刚成为杉杉股份的前身宁波云港服装总厂的厂长。
ref: In the 1980s, Zheng Yonggang served as the director of the state-run cotton spinning factory. With the transfer, Zheng Yonggang became the director of Ningbo Yungang Garment General Factory, the predecessor of Sugo Corporation, in 1989
draft_translation: In the 1980s, Zheng Yonggang served as the plant manager of a state-owned cotton mill. When he was transferred, in 1989 he became the plant manager of the predecessor of Shanshan Co., Ltd., Ningbo Yungang Textile Factory.
final_translation: In the 1980s, Zheng Yonggang served as the plant manager of a state-owned cotton mill. After being transferred, he became the factory manager of the predecessor of Shanshan Group, Ltd., Ningbo Yungang Textile Factory in 1989.

src: 2022年12月，在第二十届中国企业领袖年会暨第二十二届中国企业未来之星年会上，郑永刚在演讲中称，在上世纪90年代的中国西服市场，杉杉品牌的市占率曾高达37 % 。
ref: In December 2022, during the 20th China Enterprise Leaders Annual Conference and the 22nd China Enterprise Future Stars Annual Conference, Zheng Yonggang stated in his speech that in the Chinese suit market of the 1990s, Suning brand had a market share of up to 37%.
draft_translation: In December 2022, at the 20th China Enterprise Leaders' Conference and the 22nd China Enterprise Future Stars' Conference, Zheng Yonggang mentioned in his speech that in the Chinese men's suit market in the 1990s, the market share of Shanshan brand reached as high as 37%.
final_translation: In December 2022, at the 20th China Enterprise Leaders' Conference and the 22nd China Enterprise Future Stars Conference, Zheng Yonggang stated in his speech that in the Chinese men's suit market during the 1990s, the Shanshan brand's market share reached as high as 37%.

src: 1996年杉杉股份（600884.SH）上市，成为中国服装业第一家上市公司。
ref: In 1996, Sansun (600884.SH) went public, becoming the first listed company in China's garment industry.
draft_translation: Shanshan Group (600884.SH) went public in 1996, becoming the first listed company in the Chinese apparel industry.
final_translation: Shanshan (600884.SH) went public in 1996, becoming the first listed company in the Chinese apparel industry.

src: 就在服装业务如日中天时，杉杉集团却开始转型，因为郑永刚意识到 ， “ 一旦市场放开，中国品牌自然会形成一个梯队式品牌市场，杉杉西服想一直独领风骚，长期成为国人的国服的可能性不大 ” 。
ref: While the garment business was booming, the Sugo Group began to transform because Zheng realized that "once the market is liberalized, Chinese brands will naturally form an echelon brand market, and it is unlikely that Sugo suits will always lead the way and become the national costume of the country in the long run.
draft_translation: Just when the fashion business was at its peak, Sanshan Group began to transform. Zheng Yonggang realized that "once the market opened up, Chinese brands would naturally form a tiered brand market, and it would be unlikely for Sanshan suits to continue leading the trend and remain the national clothing for the Chinese people in the long term."
final_translation: Just when the fashion industry was at its peak, Sanshan Group began to transform. Zheng Yonggang realized that "once the market opened up, Chinese brands would naturally form a tiered brand market, and it would be unlikely for Sanshan suits to continue leading the trend and remain the national clothing for the Chinese people in the long term."

src: 1999年，杉杉开始研究企业转型，郑永刚回忆当年 ， “ 我们来到上海，寻求到底转型做什么，专门找了很多专家学者，连续不断地开一些诸葛亮会、务虚研讨会。
ref: In 1999, Sugo began to study the transformation of the enterprise, Zheng Yonggang recalled that year, "we came to Shanghai to seek what to do in the end transformation, specifically to find a lot of experts and scholars, and continuously held some Zhuge Liang meetings, retreat seminars.
draft_translation: In 1999, Shang Shang began researching corporate transformation. Zheng Yonggang recalled that year, "When we arrived in Shanghai, we sought out the question of what kind of transformation we should pursue. We specifically invited many experts and scholars, holding continuous 'Zhuge Liang meetings' and abstract discussion seminars."
final_translation: In 1999, Shang Shang began researching corporate transformation. Zheng Yonggang recalled that year, "When we arrived in Shanghai, we sought out what kind of transformation we should pursue. We specifically invited many experts and scholars, holding continuous 'Zhuge Liang meetings' and abstract discussion seminars."

src: 最后，我们设定了两个大的战略方向。
ref: In the end, we set two major strategic directions.
draft_translation: Finally, we have set two major strategic directions.
final_translation: Finally, we set two major strategic directions.

src: 第一个方向是新能源新材料，另外一个是大健康有未来 ” 。
ref: The first direction was new energy and new materials, and the other was the future of the health industry.
draft_translation: The first direction is new energy and new materials, and the other is big health, which has a bright future.
final_translation: The first direction is new energy and new materials, and the other is the health industry, which has a promising future.

src: 战略方向确定后，杉杉开始寻找合作，那时候鞍山热能院为鞍钢配套的炭素研究所在做国家863课题，科研经费不够，于是杉杉和鞍山热能院碳素研究所签署合作协议，共同推动国家863课题“中间相炭微球”项目产业化，从事负极材料的研发、生产和销售，在国内实现负极材料的商用推广。
ref: After the strategic direction was determined, Sugo started to look for cooperation, and at that time, the Carbon Research Institute of Anshan Thermal Energy Institute was doing the national 863 project for Anshan Iron and Steel, and the research funds were not enough, so Sugo and the Carbon Research Institute of Anshan Thermal Energy Institute signed a cooperation agreement to jointly promote the industrialization of the national 863 project "intermediate phase carbon microspheres" and engage in the research and development, production and sales of negative electrode materials, so as to realize the commercial promotion of negative electrode materials in China.
draft_translation: After the strategic direction was determined, Shangshan began to seek partnerships. At that time, Anshan Thermal Energy Institute was conducting a national 863 project for the graphite research institute of Ansteel. The research funding was insufficient, so Shangshan signed a cooperation agreement with the carbonaceous materials research institute of Anshan Thermal Energy Institute to jointly promote the industrialization of the national 863 project "Intermediate Phase Carbon Microspheres." They engaged in the research, development, production, and sales of anode materials, achieving the commercial promotion of anode materials domestically.
final_translation: After the strategic direction was determined, Shangshan began seeking partnerships. At that time, the Anshan Thermal Energy Institute's graphite research institute was conducting a national 863 project for Ansteel. Due to insufficient research funding, Shangshan signed a cooperation agreement with the Anshan Thermal Energy Institute's carbon materials research institute to jointly advance the industrialization of the national 863 project "Intermediate Phase Carbon Microspheres." They engaged in the research, development, production, and sales of anode materials, achieving domestic commercialization of anode materials.

src: 2001年，杉杉股份实现中间相炭微球的规模化生产，开始国产化替代，取代日本成为国内中间相炭微球主要供应商。
ref: In 2001, Suning Corporation achieved large-scale production of intermediate phase carbon microspheres and began domestic substitution, replacing Japan as the main supplier of intermediate phase carbon microspheres in the domestic market.
draft_translation: In 2001, Ssangyong Shares achieved the scaled production of mesophase carbon microspheres, marking the beginning of domestic substitution, and replaced Japan as the main supplier of mesophase carbon microspheres domestically.
final_translation: In 2001, Sangshin Shares achieved scaled production of mesophase carbon microspheres, marking the beginning of domestic substitution and replacing Japan as the main domestic supplier of mesophase carbon microspheres.

src: 这是中国第一家锂离子电池负极材料生产企业，实现了锂离子电池负极材料国产化。
ref: Indeed, this made Suning Corporation the first Chinese production enterprise for lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials, thus achieving the localization of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials in China.
draft_translation: This is the first lithium-ion battery negative electrode material production enterprise in China, achieving the nationalization of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials.
final_translation: This is the first lithium-ion battery negative electrode material production enterprise in China, achieving the domestic production of lithium-ion battery negative electrode materials.

src: 随着锂电池的应用迅速普及，杉杉股份的锂电池业务开始逐步发展，2007年锂电材料业务被写入了杉杉股份的主营业务，服装业务营收占比逐年减少，直至2013年，杉杉股份的锂电材料业务收入全面超过服装业务。
ref: With the rapid popularity of the application of lithium batteries, the lithium battery business of Sugo began to develop gradually and In 2007, the lithium materials business was written into the main business of Sugo, and the revenue share of the garment business decreased year by year until 2013, the revenue of the lithium materials business of Sugo fully exceeded that of the garment business.
draft_translation: With the rapid popularization of lithium batteries, Shanshan Shares' lithium battery business began to develop step by step. In 2007, the lithium battery materials business was written into Shanshan Shares' main business. The revenue share of the clothing business has been decreasing year by year, until 2013, when the revenue of Shanshan Shares' lithium battery materials business completely surpassed that of the clothing business.
final_translation: With the rapid adoption of lithium batteries, Shanshan's lithium battery business began to develop gradually. In 2007, the lithium battery materials business was incorporated into Shanshan's core business. The revenue share of the clothing business has been declining annually, until 2013, when Shanshan's lithium battery materials business revenue completely surpassed that of the clothing business.

src: 2021年2月，杉杉股份成功并购LG化学偏光片业务，进军LCD偏光片市场，并成立偏光片企业杉金光电，该领域技术含量比较高，杉杉的主要的竞争对手都是世界500强，如韩国三星、日本的住友化学、日东电工。
ref: In February 2021, Sugo successfully acquired LG Chemical's polarizer business, entered the LCD polarizer market, and established the polarizer enterprise Sugo Gold Optoelectronics, which is a relatively high technology field, and Sugo's main competitors are the world's top 500, such as South Korea's Samsung, Japan's Sumitomo Chemical, Nitto Denko.
draft_translation: In February 2021, Ssangyong Group successfully acquired LG Chem's polarizer business, entering the LCD polarizer market and establishing Ssangjin Optoelectronics, a company specializing in polarizers. This field has a high technical content, and Ssangyong's main competitors are global 500 companies such as Samsung of South Korea, Sumitomo Chemical and Nikko Electric of Japan.
final_translation: In February 2021, Ssangyong Group successfully acquired LG Chem's polarizer business, entering the LCD polarizer market and establishing Ssangjin Optoelectronics. This field has high technical content, and Ssangyong's main competitors include global 500 companies such as Samsung of South Korea, Sumitomo Chemical, and Nikko Electric of Japan.

src: 郑永刚曾分享过投后管理的心得 ， “ 中国的民营企业收购国际上的一些高科技企业，成功概率比较低，为什么那些收购会失败？
ref: Zheng Yonggang has shared his insights on post-investment management, "The probability of success of Chinese private companies acquiring some international high-tech companies is relatively low, why those acquisitions will fail?
draft_translation: Zheng Yonggang has shared his insights on post-investment management, "The success rate of Chinese private enterprises acquiring some high-tech companies abroad is relatively low. Why do those acquisitions fail?"

src: 因为大家都会去考虑，我花了那么多钱，我得去派人管对吧，这是通常会做的一个行为 ” ， 然而郑永刚则不同，杉杉收购成功的那一天，郑永刚就到杉金光电当众宣布，杉杉作为杉金的大股东，决定实施一企两制，除了郑永刚担任董事长，杉杉企业的人不派到杉金，采取授权经营的方式，原有的分配制度、企业文化、各项管理等模式不变。
ref: Because everyone will go to consider, I spent so much money, I have to send people to manage, right, which is usually done an act ", however, Zheng Yonggang is different, the day of the successful acquisition of Sugo, Zheng Yonggang went to Sugo Gold Optoelectronics announced in public, Sugo as the majority shareholder of Sugo Gold, decided to implement a two-enterprise system, in addition to Zheng Yonggang as chairman, Sugo enterprise people are not sent to Sugo Gold, to adopt the way of authorized operation, the original distribution system, corporate culture, the management model remains unchanged.
draft_translation: "Because everyone will consider it, I have spent so much money, I should send people to manage it, right? This is a usual action," however, Zheng Yonggang is different. On the day of the successful acquisition of Sasan, Zheng Yonggang announced in front of the public that Sasan would implement a "one enterprise, two systems" policy. As a major shareholder of Sasan, Sasan would decide to implement this policy. Except for Zheng Yonggang serving as chairman, no personnel from Sasan Enterprise would be sent to Sasan. Instead, they would operate through authorization. The original distribution system, corporate culture, and various management models would remain unchanged.
final_translation: "Because everyone will take it into account, I've spent so much money, so I should send people to manage it, right? This is a common practice," however, Zheng Yonggang is different. On the day of the successful acquisition of Sasan, Zheng Yonggang announced publicly that Sasan would implement the "one enterprise, two systems" policy. As a major shareholder of Sasan, Sasan decided to adopt this policy. Except for Zheng Yonggang serving as chairman, no personnel from Sasan would be sent to Sasan. Instead, authorization management would be used. The original distribution system, corporate culture, and management models would remain unchanged.

src: ICC鑫椤资讯发布2022年负极数据显示，杉杉负极2022年出货量突破20万吨，同比增幅100 % ， 市场份额达16 % ， 人造石墨负极材料出货量蝉联榜首。
ref: ICC Xinfern information released 2022 negative electrode data shows that the shipment of Sugo negative electrode in 2022 exceeded 200,000 tons, with a year-on-year increase of 100 % and a market share of 16 %, and the shipment of artificial graphite negative electrode material topped the list.
draft_translation: ICC Xinluo Information released the 2022 negative electrode data, showing that Shanshan Negative Electrode's shipment volume in 2022 exceeded 2 million tons, with a year-on-year growth of 100%, and its market share reached 16%. The shipment volume of artificial graphite negative electrode materials has remained number one.
final_translation: ICC Xinluo News released the 2022 negative electrode data, showing that Shanshan Negative Electrode's 2022 shipment volume exceeded 200,000 tons, with a year-on-year growth of 100%, and its market share reached 16%. The shipment volume of artificial graphite negative electrode materials has remained number one.

src: 在偏光片业务方面，Yano Research统计显示，公司旗下杉金光电2022年全球市场份额达到29 % ， 预计2023年市场份额将达到32 % ， 持续位列全球第一。
ref: In the polarizer business, according to Yano Research, the company's Sugene Optoelectronics will reach a global market share of 29% in 2022 and is expected to reach 32% in 2023, continuing to rank first in the world.
draft_translation: According to Yano Research's statistics in the polarizer business, the company's Shangjin Optoelectronics achieved a global market share of 29% in 2022, and is expected to reach 32% in 2023, maintaining its position as the global leader.
final_translation: According to Yano Research's statistics in the polarizer business, the company's Shangjin Optoelectronics achieved a global market share of 29% in 2022, and is expected to reach 32% in 2023, maintaining its position as the global leader.

src: 2022年前三季度，杉杉股份的营收为158.41亿元，净利润为23.13亿元，2月10日，杉杉股份的股价为19.24元/股，总市值为436亿元。
ref: On the first three quarters of 2022, Shanshan Corporation revenue was 15.841 billion yuan, and its net profit was 2.313 billion yuan, and on February 10, Shanshan Corporation share price was 19.24 yuan per share, with a total market value of 43.6 billion yuan
draft_translation: The revenue of Ssangyong Shares for the first three quarters of 2022 was 15.841 billion yuan, with a net profit of 2.313 billion yuan. On February 10th, the stock price of Ssangyong Shares was 19.24 yuan per share, with a total market capitalization of 43.6 billion yuan.
final_translation: The revenue of Sang Sang Shares for the first three quarters of 2022 was 15.841 billion yuan, with a net profit of 2.313 billion yuan. On February 10th, the stock price of Sang Sang Shares was 19.24 yuan per share, with a total market capitalization of 43.6 billion yuan.

src: 2月9日，杉杉股份在互动平台表示，2022年底，公司石墨化有效产能约10万吨，眉山项目的石墨化产能尚在爬坡中。
ref: On February 9, Suning Corporation stated on an interactive platform that by the end of 2022, the company's effective graphite capacity was approximately 100,000 tons, and the graphite capacity of the Meishan project was still ramping up.
draft_translation: On February 9th, Shangshan Shares stated on its interactive platform that as of the end of 2022, the company's graphite production capacity was approximately 100,000 tons, and the graphite production capacity of the Meishan project is still in the process of increasing.

src: 万得显示，目前郑永刚仍为杉杉股份的董事长和实际控制人。
ref: According to Wind Information, Zheng Yonggang is still listed as the Chairman and actual controller of Suning Corporation.
draft_translation: Wan De shows that Zheng Yonggang is still the chairman and actual controller of Ssangyong Shares.
final_translation: WanDe indicates that Zheng Yonggang remains the chairman and actual controller of Sang Sang Shares.

src: 天眼查显示，郑永刚持有杉杉控股有限公司的总股权比例是40.1 % 。
ref: According to the SkyEye search, Zheng Yonggang holds 40.1 % of the total equity of Sugo Holdings Co.
draft_translation: The Tianyancha shows that Zheng Yonggang holds 40.1% of the total shares in Ssangyong Holding Co., Ltd.

src: 杉杉股份的总经理为李智华，1968年生，历任东莞市杉杉电池材料有限公司,宁波杉杉新材料科技有限公司,湖南杉杉能源科技有限公司董事长,宁波杉杉股份有限公司副总经理。
ref: The general manager of Shanshan Co Ltd is Li Zhihua, was born in 1968,he has successively served as the chairman of Dongguan Shanshan Battery Materials Co Ltd, Ningbo Shanshan New Material Technology Co Ltd, Hunan Shanshan Energy Technology Co Ltd, and deputy general manager of Ningbo Shanshan Co Ltd.
draft_translation: The general manager of Shanshan Co., Ltd. is Li Zhihua, born in 1968. He has served as the chairman of Shanshan Battery Materials Co., Ltd. in Dongguan, Shanshan New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. in Ningbo, Shanshan Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in Hunan, and vice president of Ningbo Shanshan Co., Ltd.
final_translation: The general manager of Shanshan Co., Ltd. is Li Zhihua, born in 1968. He has served as chairman of Shanshan Battery Materials Co., Ltd. in Dongguan, Shanshan New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. in Ningbo, Shanshan Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in Hunan, and vice president of Ningbo Shanshan Co., Ltd.

src: 杉杉股份2月10日在投资者互动平台表示，本公司高级管理人员与本公司实际控制人不存在亲属关系。
ref: Suning Corporation stated on February 10 on the investor interaction platform that there is no familial relationship between the senior management personnel and the actual controller of the company.
draft_translation: The senior management of Shishan Co., Ltd. stated on February 10 on the investor interaction platform that there is no familial relationship between the company's senior management and its actual controller.

src: “基金E账户”来了：证监会授权开发 投资者名下所有基金实现归集和查询 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
ref: "Fund E Account" is here: China Securities Regulatory Commission authorizes the development of all funds under the investor's name to achieve collection and query - Economic Observation Network - Professional Financial News Website
draft_translation: "Fund E Account" Arrives: CSRC Authorizes Development to Enable Aggregation and Inquiry of All Funds under Investor's Name - Economic Observation Network - Professional Financial News Website
final_translation: "Fund E Account" Launches: CSRC Authorizes the Development of All Funds under Investor's Name to Enable Aggregation and Inquiry - Economic Observation Network - Professional Financial News Website

src: 经济观察网 记者 陈姗 基金购买渠道繁杂导致账户信息归集不易？
ref: Economic Observer reporter Chen Shan, Is it difficult to collect account information due to the complicated purchase channels of funds?
draft_translation: Economic Observation Network journalist Chen Shan: Is it difficult to aggregate account information due to the complex purchasing channels of funds?
final_translation: Economic Observation Network journalist Chen Shan: Is it difficult to aggregate account information due to the complex purchase channels of funds?

src: 总是遗忘“小金库”？
ref: Always forgetting about the "small treasury"?
draft_translation: Always forgetting the "small treasury"?
final_translation: Always forgetting about the "hidden fund"?

src: 基民的这些问题即将得到解决。
ref: The issues faced by fund investors are about to be resolved.
draft_translation: The issues of the base people will soon be resolved.
final_translation: The issues of the base citizens will soon be resolved.

src: 2月10日，证监会公告称，“基金E账户”APP在各手机应用商店上架并开展公开试运行。
ref: On February 10, the China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC) announced that the "Fund E-account" app has been made available on various mobile app stores and is undergoing public trial operation.
draft_translation: The China Securities Regulatory Commission announced on February 10th that the "Fund E Account" APP has been launched on various mobile app stores and is now undergoing a public trial operation.

src: 据介绍，“基金E账户”为个人投资者提供公募基金账户及份额信息的“一站式”查询服务，旨在解决广大中小投资者遗忘账户、查询繁琐等行业服务痛点。
ref: According to the introduction, "Fund E Account" provides individual investors with a "one-stop" inquiry service for public fund account and share information, aiming to solve the majority of small and medium-sized investors forget account, cumbersome inquiries and other industry service pain points.
draft_translation: The "Fund E Account" is introduced to provide a one-stop service for individual investors to query public fund accounts and share information, aiming to address industry service pain points such as investors forgetting their accounts and the inconvenience of querying.
final_translation: The "Fund E Account" is introduced to provide a one-stop service for individual investors to query public fund accounts and share details, aiming to address industry service pain points such as investors forgetting their account and the inconvenience of querying.

src: 据Wind数据显示，截至2022年底，国内共有公募基金管理人156家，管理基金规模约26万亿元；公募基金份额登记机构167家，公募基金销售机构411家。
ref: According to Wind data, by the end of 2022, there were 156 public fund managers in China, managing a fund size of about 26 trillion yuan; 167 public fund share registrars and 411 public fund sales institutions.
draft_translation: According to data from Wind, as of the end of 2022, there were 156 domestic fund management companies for public offering funds, managing a total fund scale of about 26 trillion yuan; there were 167 institutions responsible for registering public offering fund shares, and 411 sales institutions for public offering funds.
final_translation: According to Wind data, as of the end of 2022, there were 156 domestic public offering fund management companies with total assets under management of about 26 trillion yuan; 167 share registration institutions, and 411 sales institutions for public offering funds.

src: 各份额登记机构账户体系相互独立，缺乏行业统一的查询渠道。
ref: Each share registration institution has its own independent account system, and there is a lack of industry-wide unified channels for querying information.
draft_translation: The account systems of various registration and settlement institutions are independent of each other, and there is a lack of a unified industry query channel.
final_translation: The account systems of various registration and settlement institutions are independent of each other, and there is a lack of a unified industry query channel.

src: 有行业人士表示，2021年末我国基金投资者超过7.2亿人，也就是说，全国有一半人都投资了基金产品。
ref: Some people in the industry said that by the end of 2021, there will be more than 720 million fund investors in my country. This means that half of the people in the country have invested in fund products.
draft_translation: Some industry professionals stated that by the end of 2021, the number of fund investors in our country exceeded 720 million, meaning that half of the population had invested in fund products.
final_translation: Some industry professionals stated that by the end of 2021, the number of fund investors in China exceeded 720 million, meaning that half of the population invested in fund products.

src: 此前，投资者需要通过不同销售机构查询购买情况，而通过“基金E账户”可以查询所有销售渠道购买的情况，持有基金情况一目了然。
ref: Previously, investors had to check their purchases through different sales institutions, but through "Fund E Account", they can check their purchases from all sales channels and see their fund holdings at a glance.
draft_translation: Previously, investors had to check their purchase records through different sales institutions. With the "Fund E Account," they can check purchase records from all sales channels, and their fund holdings are clearly visible.
final_translation: Previously, investors had to check their purchase information through different sales institutions. With the Fund E Account, they can check purchase information from all sales channels, and their fund holdings are clearly visible.

src: “基金E账户”APP是什么？
ref: What is the "Fund E Account" APP?
draft_translation: What is the "Fund E Account" app?
final_translation: What is the "Fund E Account" App?

src: 据相关文件介绍，“基金E账户”APP 是中国结算经中国证监会批准开发建设的公募基金行业门户手机应用，可为投资者提供全市场公募基金产品场外份额持有情况的一站式查询。
ref: According to relevant documents, the "Fund E-account" app is a mobile application developed and constructed by China Securities Depository and Clearing Corporation Limited (ChinaClear) with the approval of the China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC).
draft_translation: The "Fund E Account" APP, introduced in relevant documents, is a mobile application developed by China Securities Settlement Corporation with approval from the China Securities Regulatory Commission. It serves as a portal for the public fund industry and provides investors with a one-stop query for the holdings of all market public fund products outside the exchange.
final_translation: The "Fund E Account" App, as described in relevant documents, is a mobile application developed by China Securities Depository and Clearing Corporation (CSDC) with approval from the China Securities Regulatory Commission. It serves as a portal for the public fund industry, offering investors a one-stop query of holdings for all market public fund products outside the exchange.

src: 投资者可以通过“基金E账户”方便、快捷地掌握自己通过全市场各销售渠道购买的各基金管理人旗下公募基金产品场外份额的持有情况，全面提升查询效率。
ref: Through "Fund E Account", investors can easily and quickly grasp their holdings of OTC shares of each fund manager's public fund products purchased through various sales channels in the market, thus enhancing the overall efficiency of inquiries.
draft_translation: Investors can conveniently and efficiently track the holdings of their offline shares in publicly offered fund products from various fund management companies through the "Fund E Account," across all channels of the entire market, significantly improving query efficiency.
final_translation: Investors can conveniently and efficiently track their holdings of offline shares in publicly offered fund products from various fund management companies through the "Fund E Account," across all channels of the entire market, significantly improving query efficiency.

src: 具体来说，投资者可以通过“基金E账户”查询到的信息包括：在全市场各公募基金管理人处开立的基金账户信息、在公募基金销售机构处开立的交易账户信息以及持有的包括公开募集证券投资基金以及证券公司设立管理的投资者人数不受200人限制的集合资产管理计划等产品的场外份额持有情况。
ref: Specifically, investors can use the "Fund E-account" app to access various information, including their fund account information opened with fund management companies across the entire market, transaction account information opened with public fund sales institutions, and holdings of off-exchange shares of publicly offered securities investment funds, as well as collective asset management plans that are not limited to 200 investors and managed by securities firms.
draft_translation: The specific information that investors can query through the "Fund E Account" includes: fund account information opened at all public fund management institutions across the market, transaction account information opened at public fund sales institutions, as well as the holdings of off-exchange shares of products such as publicly offered securities investment funds and collective asset management plans established and managed by securities companies, where the number of investors is not restricted to 200 people.
final_translation: The specific information that investors can query through the "Fund E Account" includes: fund account information opened at all public fund management institutions across the market, transaction account information opened at public fund sales institutions, as well as the holdings of off-exchange shares of products such as publicly offered securities investment funds and collective asset management plans established and managed by securities companies, where the number of investors is not restricted to 200 people.

src: 上海证券基金评价研究中心业务负责人刘亦千向经济观察网记者表示，投资者可以通过“基金E账户”App一站式获知其所有的场外公募基金持有情况，帮助其找回“被遗忘的资产”，更重要的是为客户实现了综合基金投资情况的全账户信息归集，帮助客户更及时、准确、完整的掌握自身投资情况，从而更好地优化自身的基金组合配置，更好地规划自身的财务安排。
ref: Liu Yichan, business leader of Shanghai Securities Fund Evaluation and Research Center, told the Economic Observer that investors can get one-stop information about all their OTC public fund holdings through the "Fund E Account" app, which helps them find their "forgotten assets", and more importantly, it realizes comprehensive fund investment information collection for customers, which helps them grasp their investment situation more timely, accurately and completely, so that they can better optimize their fund portfolio allocation and better plan their financial arrangements.
