final_translation: Waste management ignores customer needs. When placing an order, the delivery time is 19:00-22:00.

src: 因家里有术后卧床不方便的老人在，所以只有晚上可以方便收件。
ref: Mail delivery is only practical at night since some elderly individuals find it uncomfortable to stay in bed after surgery.
draft_translation: Because there is an elderly person who is bedridden after surgery at home, it is only convenient to receive packages in the evening.
final_translation: Because there is an elderly person who has been bedridden after surgery at home, it is only convenient to receive packages in the evening.

src: 结果竟然中午12点就直接上门送了，也不事先电话告知。
ref: Surprisingly, the outcome is delivered without prior telephone communication at 12:00 noon, immediately to the door.
draft_translation: The result is that they came directly to the door at noon without prior phone notification.
final_translation: The result was that they arrived directly at the door at noon without prior phone notification.

src: 如果配送时间是你们快递员随心所欲的想几点就几点送，何必假惺惺弄个时间让客户选择？
ref: Why bother making a time for the consumer to choose if the delivery time is that your courier may deliver it whenever he wants?
draft_translation: If the delivery time is up to the courier to decide whenever they want to deliver, why bother pretending to set a time for customers to choose?
final_translation: If the delivery time is up to the courier to decide whenever they want to deliver, why bother setting a time for customers to choose?

src: 如果自己的物流没办法保证服务的，那就干脆不要做电商了！
ref: Don't undertake any e-commerce if your own logistics can't ensure the service!
draft_translation: If your logistics can't guarantee service, then just don't do e-commerce!
final_translation: If your logistics can't guarantee service, then just don't do e-commerce!

src: 让一个身上3处伤口的老人下床开门收快递还要找零钱付费！
ref: Allow an elderly man with 3 wounds to get out of bed and open the door for the messenger, and then he must locate change to for the cost!

final_translation: Let an elderly person with three wounds get up to open the door, get a package, and pay with change!

src: 明明订单上有联系电话！
ref: Clearly, the order includes a phone number!
draft_translation: Clearly, the order has a contact phone number!
final_translation: Clearly, the order has a contact number!

src: 从头到底也没有人来电话联系一下给个解释！

final_translation: No one called at all from start to finish, and no one gave an explanation!

src: 卓越网所谓的投诉客服就是一帮子外地人在那里装样子，敷衍你的投诉然后给你一个所谓的答复。
ref: A bunch of imposters that pose as employees at Excellence dot com so-called complaint customer care will quickly listen to your issue before offering you a purported solution.
draft_translation: The so-called complaint customer service of Zhuo Yao Network is just a bunch of people from outside pretending, being indifferent to your complaints and giving you a so-called response.
final_translation: The so-called complaint customer service of Zhuo Yao Network is merely a group of outsiders pretending to be helpful while being indifferent to your complaints and offering a so-called response.

src: 不会有任何改变或者补偿！
ref: There will be no modification or payment!
draft_translation: There will be no changes or compensation!
final_translation: There will be no changes or compensation!

src: 之前也是遇到这样子了类似配送时间不对的问题也就忍了，但这次无法忍受，太过分了！
ref: Similar issues have occurred before, and I was able to tolerate them, such as an incorrect delivery date, but this time it is too much for me to handle!
draft_translation: I've encountered similar issues before with incorrect delivery times, but I've just tolerated them. This time, however, I can't bear it anymore. It's just too much!
final_translation: I've encountered similar issues before with incorrect delivery times, but I've merely tolerated them. This time, however, I can't bear it anymore. It's too much!

src: 新书买的预售到货后竟然封面和封底是反的，这样子明显得质量问题就这样子闭眼把书发给顾客了？
ref: You shipped the book to the client while still not paying attention to the fact that the back cover and front cover of the new book were sideways when it came after the pre-sale?
draft_translation: The pre-sale book's cover and back cover are reversed after it arrives, which is obviously a quality issue. How can you just send the book to the customer like that?
final_translation: The pre-sale book's cover and back cover are reversed after it arrives, which is obviously a quality issue. How could you just send the book to the customer like that?

src: 留言差评也不会有人来联系你。
ref: No one will contact you if you leave a negative comment.

final_translation: Negative reviews in the comments will not result in anyone contacting you.

src: 卓越这些年，越来越差，根本没有服务质量可言！

src: 不会再在卓越上花一毛钱。
ref: No more money will be spent on Excellence.

final_translation: I won't spend a penny on excellence anymore.

src: 图片质量实在不能接受
ref: The visual quality is quite poor

final_translation: The image quality is truly unacceptable.

src: 作为“古地图集”这样的标题，本书在图片的选择、排版、印刷上实在令人难以接受，有些图片甚至有马赛克，模糊到无法辨识。
ref: The photo selection, formatting, and printing in this book are truly awful given the title "Ancient Atlas", Some images even contain mosaics, but they are so blurry that it is impossible to tell what they are.
draft_translation: The book's selection of images, layout, and printing are truly unacceptable as the title "Ancient Map Collection." Some images are even blurred to the point of being unrecognizable, with some covered in mosaic.
final_translation: The book's selection of images, layout, and printing are truly unacceptable as the title of "Ancient Map Collection." Some images are even blurred to the point of being unrecognizable, with some covered in mosaics.

src: 即便本书不是专业的地图册，即便是小画幅插图，也应该对得起目录中祖先留下来的洋洋大观的中古文献资料！
ref: The exquisite medieval manuscripts left by the ancestors in the catalog should be worthy of this book, even though it is not a professional atlas and only a small-format image!
draft_translation: Even if this book is not a professional atlas and is just a small-scale illustration, it should be worthy of the vast collection of medieval literary materials passed down by our ancestors in the directory!
final_translation: Even if this book is not a professional atlas and is merely a small-scale illustration, it should be worthy of the vast collection of medieval literary materials passed down by our ancestors in the list!

src: （况且很多图片是可以从相关行业资源中获取清晰的原始文件的），用这样的图片来拼凑图书与不使用图片有何差别？
ref: (In addition, numerous images can be acquired from sources relevant to the industry in clean original formats), what distinguishes the use of such images in book construction from the absence of images?
draft_translation: (Moreover, many images can be obtained from relevant industry resources as clear original files), what is the difference between using such images to assemble a book and not using images?
final_translation: (Moreover, many images can be obtained from relevant industry resources as clear and high-quality original documents), what is the difference between using such images to compile a book and not using images?

src: ！我为这样的治学精神感到遗憾。
ref: ！ Such a scholastic spirit makes me feel sad.
draft_translation: I am regretful about such a scholarly spirit.
final_translation: I regret such a scholarly spirit.

src: 文字方面不予评价，方家各有分辨。
ref: There is no commentary on the text, because every family is unique.
draft_translation: Comments on the text are not made; experts have their own interpretations.
final_translation: No comments are given on the text; each expert has their own way of interpreting.

src: 整体2星。
ref: 2 stars altogether.
draft_translation: Two stars in total.
final_translation: Two stars in total.

src: 高二的时候看的这本书当时只是抱着无聊看看玩的心态，感觉这样的书自己应该不会沉迷吧，毕竟起点的网文以往还是不太吸引我的。
ref: In my sophomore year of high school, I read this novel, to pass the time, I read and played games, I believe that I shouldn't be so dependent on a book, after all, I had previously found Qidian's web articles to be somewhat unappealing.
draft_translation: The book I read in the second year of high school was just read out of boredom and for fun. I thought I wouldn't get addicted to such books, after all. The web novels from the starting point used to be less appealing to me anyway.
final_translation: The book I read in the second year of high school was just read out of boredom and for fun. I thought I wouldn't get addicted to such books, after all. The web novels from the starting point used to be less appealing to me anyway.

src: 然后...就掉坑里了。
ref: Subsequently...it fell into the pit.
draft_translation: Then... he fell into the pit.
final_translation: Then... he dropped into the hole.

src: 按着这个剧情来说，整本书都是比较轻松愉快的，前部分叶修还在网游里的时候，即使是公会之间勾心斗角，也因为往往被叶神狗血，搞得一点也不沉重。
ref: This premise makes it seem like the entire book is rather carefree and joyful, because of Ye Xiu's blood in the first half, while Ye Xiu was still playing the online game, even the guild intrigue was not overly intense.
draft_translation: The plot suggests that the entire book is relatively light and cheerful. Even when the guilds are scheming against each other in the early parts, it is often undermined by the "leaf god" (a term used to refer to the protagonist's exceptional skills), making the situation seem somewhat absurd and not serious at all.
final_translation: According to this plot, the entire book is relatively light-hearted. Even when guilds are scheming against one another in the early sections, the protagonist's exceptional skills (referred to as the "leaf god") often counteract the tension, making the situation absurdly light-hearted and not serious at all.

src: 至于到了比赛的部分，写出了时代的变迁新旧交替的一点点心酸之感（可能是我多愁善感）。
ref: Regarding the competition portion, I wrote about the passage of time and the juxtaposition of the old and modern with a hint of melancholy (maybe I am sentimental).
draft_translation: As for the competitive part, it conveys a bit of the bittersweet feeling of the times changing and the old giving way to the new (perhaps I am just easily moved).
final_translation: As for the part of the competition, it conveys a bit of the bittersweet feeling of the times changing and the old giving way to the new (perhaps I am just easily touched).

src: 看整部书花了我高二许多学习时间，可是就是停不下来。
ref: I read the entire book in my second year of high school, which required a lot of study time, but I couldn't put it down.
draft_translation: Reading the whole book took up a lot of study time during my senior year, but I couldn't stop myself.
final_translation: Reading the whole book took up a lot of my study time during my second year of high school, but I couldn't help myself.

src: 全职对人物和感情线的描写让人十分惊艳，有的人物只是偶尔带过，也会给人留下很深的影响，像比较重点描写的角色叶修黄少天苏沐橙都有大量的粉丝，而不在写作中心的角色例如江波涛楚云秀等等也十分找人喜欢，在一个电竞的爽文中竟然让人找不到一个让人讨厌至极的人物，这是全职在人物描写上的成功。
ref: The character and emotional lines described in Full-time are truly wonderful, Some characters, who are only sporadically introduced, have a profound effect on the audience, for instance, Ye Xiu, Huang Shaotian, and Su Mucheng have a lot of followers since they are more concentrated characters, even the characters that are not part of the writing core, such Jiang Botao and Chu Yunxiu, are endearing, nobody can discover a particularly grating character in a cool piece on e-sports, this character description is a complete success.
draft_translation: The portrayal of characters and relationships in "Full-time" is truly impressive. Even characters who are only briefly mentioned can leave a deep impression on readers. For example, key characters like Yuexiu, Huang Shatian, and Su Mucheng have a large number of fans. Even secondary characters such as Jiang Botao and Chu Yunxiu are also very likable. In an esports novel that is supposed to be thrilling, it's rare to find a character that is truly detestable. This is a successful achievement in the character development of "Full-time".
final_translation: The portrayal of characters and relationships in "Full-time" is truly impressive. Even characters who are only briefly mentioned can leave a deep impression on readers. For example, key characters like Yuexiu, Huang Shatian, and Su Mucheng have a large number of fans. Even secondary characters such as Jiang Botao and Chu Yunxiu are also very likable. In an esports novel, it's rare to find a character that is truly detestable. This is a successful achievement in the character development of "Full-time".

src: 而在感情线上，全职也没有一般网文所令人诟病的后宫佳丽三千万要么美女要么腐的毛病，全文所有人的感情，都有一个共同的地方就是他们喜欢着荣耀这个游戏，并且大都想要堂堂正正的胜利。
ref: Regarding the emotional line, there aren't any of the 30 million harem beauties who are decried in common web publications, either they are gorgeous or they are evil, everyone's feelings are expressed in the complete language, and they all share the desire to triumph honorably and enjoy the game of glory.
draft_translation: In terms of the emotional lines, full-time characters do not have the common criticisms found in general net novels, such as the "three million beautiful women" or the "corrupt" tendencies. The emotional aspects of the entire story share a common feature: everyone loves the game "Glory," and most of them desire to win honorably and fairly.
final_translation: In terms of romantic relationships, full-time players avoid the common criticisms associated with general net novels, such as the "three million beautiful women" or "corrupt" tropes. The common feature of all characters is their love for the game "Glory," with most aiming to win honorably and through fair means.

src: 小计量有却没有什么大阴谋，每个人看上去都那么单纯可爱。
ref: Everyone seems so innocent and adorable, and there are just little conspiracies.
draft_translation: There is no great conspiracy in small measurements, and everyone looks so simple and endearing.
final_translation: There is no great conspiracy in small matters, and everyone looks so innocent and cute.

src: 这或许也是为什么全职没有什么令人讨厌的角色。
ref: There might not be any unpleasant full-time jobs for this reason.
draft_translation: This might also be why there are no unpleasant characters in full-time roles.
final_translation: This might also be why there are no unpleasant people in full-time roles.

src: 全职的IP很大，也归功于此。
ref: This is due in large part to full-time IPs.
draft_translation: The full-time IP is very large, and this is also thanks to it.

src: 撇开网文这个文化现象不谈，全职不失为一本不错的书。
ref: Full-time is still a terrific book even when the cultural phenomena of internet writing is disregarded.
draft_translation: Setting aside the cultural phenomenon of online novels, "Full-Time" is certainly a good book.
final_translation: Setting aside the cultural phenomenon of online fiction, "Full-Time" is certainly a good book.

src: 多少他真的会给人提供一些热血，一点点感动。
ref: He will essentially give a tiny touch and some hot blood.
draft_translation: He really does give people some passion and a little bit of touching moments.
final_translation: He really gives people some passion and a touch of emotional moments.

src: 今年4月份全职要动漫化。
ref: In April of this year, animation will be full-time.
draft_translation: This full-time position will be anime-ified in April this year.
final_translation: The full-time position will be anime-style in April.

src: 其实想要买齐这套书很久了，碍于永远钱包不够厚都没狠下心下手，然后想要买的时候就发现，tb上简直是假货猖獗，其实全职最近出了另一个版本，封面图吧我自己是蛮喜欢的，但还是打算先买老的版本，所以就在亚马逊上看了看，一次性买下来了一套。
ref: In fact, I've wanted to acquire this collection of books for a while, but I've put it off since my wallet isn't thick enough, then, when I went to purchase it, I discovered that there were many fakes on tb, in truth, the cover image was just released in a different version by the full-time, I visited Amazon and ordered a set all at once because I personally really enjoy it but still intend to purchase the older version first.
draft_translation: I've actually wanted to buy the entire set for a long time, but I've never been able to afford it because my wallet is always too thin. Then, when I decided to buy it, I found out that Taobao is full of counterfeit products. Actually, the full-time version has come out with another edition. The cover image is something I really like, but I still plan to buy the older version first. So I checked Amazon and bought the entire set at once.

src: 接下来简单说一下货的情况。
ref: Let's now briefly discuss the state of the products.
draft_translation: Next, let's briefly talk about the goods.
final_translation: Next, let's briefly talk about the goods.

src: ●第四本的塑封没有，但书是新的。
ref: ●The fourth book doesn't have a plastic cover, but it is brand-new.
draft_translation: The fourth one is not sealed, but the book is new.
final_translation: The fourth book is not plastic sealed, but the book is new.

src: ●第十七本塑封是在但是被打开了，书的质感也很奇怪感觉没有其他的硬。
ref: ●The seventeenth book is still in its plastic packaging, but it has been opened, its texture is also quite odd, and it is not as hard as the others.
draft_translation: The seventeenth boxed book was opened, and the texture of the book feels strange, as if it's not the same as the others.
final_translation: The seventeenth plastic-sealed book was opened, and the texture of the book feels strange, as if it's not the same as the other.

src: ●第23本和第十七本情况一样，但是也比第十七本硬，但十分的旧。
ref: ●The 23rd book is identical to the 17th book, however, it is older and harsher than the 17th book.
draft_translation: The 23rd book is similar to the 17th one, but it is harder than the 17th one, yet it is very old.
final_translation: The 23rd book is similar to the 17th one, but it is harder than the 17th one, but it is very old.

src: ●个别几本书的出版社不同好像第23和17就是同一个出版社，和其他的不同。
ref: ●Individual novels are published by various companies, in contrast to the others, it appears that the 23rd and 17th are published by the same company.
draft_translation: The publisher of a few individual books is different; for example, books 23 and 17 are from the same publisher, while others are different.
final_translation: The publisher of a few individual books is different; for example, book 23 and 17 are from the same publisher, while others are different.

src: ●整体来讲还算满意，24本很大一箱，很满足。
ref: ●Overall, I'm happy with the outcome, a sizable box contains 24 books, and I am pleased with my purchase.
draft_translation: I am generally satisfied. Twenty-four books in a large box is quite satisfying.
final_translation: I am quite satisfied. Twenty-four books in a large box are quite satisfying.

src: 落寞的小狮子
ref: The abandoned lion cub
draft_translation: A lonely little lion
final_translation: A lonely little lion

src: 拿到书的时候，以为会像是《失落的一角》那么简单，结果文字还很多哎！
ref: I assumed the book would be as straightforward as "The Lost Corner" when I first acquired it, but there are actually a lot of words!
draft_translation: When I got the book, I thought it would be as simple as "The Missing Piece," but the text is still quite long!
final_translation: When I received the book, I thought it would be as simple as "The Missing One," but the text is still quite lengthy!

src: 先后念了三次，才给小朋友念完这本书，一只会开枪的小狮子，爱吃果汁软糖的小狮子。
ref: I had to read this book to the kids three times before I was done, A small lion that is proficient with a firearm, a small lion who adores marshmallows.
draft_translation: I read the book three times in succession, finally being able to read it to the child. It's a little lion that can shoot guns and a little lion that loves fruit candy.
final_translation: I read the book three times in a row before finally reading it to the children. It's a little lion that can shoot guns and a little lion that loves fruit candy.

src: 当看到狮子吃掉猎人这个情节的时候，心里略有不适，现代都市人对于被动物吃掉这样的安排有点接受不了。
ref: I was a little uneasy when I saw the plot about the lion eating the hunter, Animals eating humans is an arrangement that modern urbanites cannot support.
draft_translation: When I saw the scene where the lion eats the hunter, I felt a bit uncomfortable. Modern city dwellers find it hard to accept the arrangement where they are eaten by animals.
final_translation: When I saw the scene where the lion eats the hunter, I felt a bit uncomfortable. Modern city dwellers find it hard to accept the arrangement where they are eaten by animals.

src: 看到最后，这个在人类社会成功了的小狮子，迷失了自己，他已经不是完全的狮子，也不是完全的人。
ref: This tiny lion who thrived in human civilization ultimately lost himself, Both a whole lion and a full man, he is no longer.
draft_translation: In the end, this little lion who had succeeded in human society lost himself. He was no longer a complete lion or a complete human.
final_translation: In the end, this little lion who had succeeded in human society lost himself. He was no longer a complete lion or a complete human.

src: 最后，只有小狮子的背影，不知道他去哪儿了。
ref: In the end, all that was left was the small lion's back, and I have no idea what happened to him.
draft_translation: The last thing left is the silhouette of the little lion, unsure of where he has gone.
final_translation: The last thing left is the silhouette of the little lion, unsure where he has gone.

src: 可能多年以后，这个小狮子的形象还留在长大了的小朋友的印象中，在某一天不经意的时候被想起，或许对她会有触动或是启发。
ref: Maybe the grown-up kids will still remember this small lion years from now, and if she is unintentionally reminded of it one day, it might move or inspire her.
draft_translation: Perhaps many years later, the image of this little lion will still remain in the memory of the child who has grown up. On some day, it might be accidentally recalled, perhaps touching or inspiring her.
final_translation: Perhaps many years later, the image of this little lion will still remain in the memory of the child who has grown up. On some day, it might be recalled, perhaps touching or inspiring her.

src: 性价比很高的作品集
ref: Portfolio that is economical
draft_translation: A portfolio with high value for money
final_translation: A portfolio with high value for money

src: 1、以前还不知道TASCHEN，最近买了不少他们的书，原因就是太强悍，不论是选题还是制作本身。
ref: 1, I wasn't familiar with TASCHEN previously, but recently I bought a lot of their books, This is because they are simply too effective, whether it's the choice of topics or the quality of the production.
draft_translation: 1. I didn't know about TASCHEN before, but I've bought a lot of their books recently. The reason is that they are really strong, whether in their selection of topics or in the production itself.
final_translation: 1. I didn't know about TASCHEN before, but I've bought a lot of their books recently. The reason is that they are really strong, whether in their selection of topics or in the production itself.

src: 本作先后出过3个版本，最大的版本和那本米开朗基罗全集一样，都是接近50厘米长34厘米宽的；中版本大概是36厘米长23厘米宽；而这版是最小，而且配有书盒的两册书版。
ref: This piece of work has undergone 3 revisions, The three sizes are: the largest, which is roughly 50 cm long and 34 cm wide, the medium, which is roughly 36 cm long and 23 cm wide, and the smallest, which is this version, A book box for two volumes is also included.
draft_translation: This edition has gone through three versions. The largest one is almost 50 centimeters long and 34 centimeters wide, the same size as Michelangelo's complete works. The medium version is about 36 centimeters long and 23 centimeters wide. This edition is the smallest one and comes in a book case for two volumes.
final_translation: This edition has gone through three versions. The largest one is almost 50 centimeters long and 34 centimeters wide, the same size as Michelangelo's complete collection. The medium version is about 36 centimeters long and 23 centimeters wide. This edition is the smallest one and comes in a book case for two volumes.

src: 个人觉得还可以接受，一来价格便宜，且700多页分成两本，作为平装本也较好翻阅；二来是不同于米开朗基罗全集那本，画作占了主体，达芬奇这本黑白手稿占了大部分，对于预算有限的、非美术专业读者而言，这版作为欣赏画作和手稿的性价比是最高的。
ref: Personally, I believe it to be appropriate, First off, it's inexpensive, and it comes in two paperback volumes with a combined total of more than 700 pages, It differs from Michelangelo's full works, which are primarily made up of paintings, in two ways, the majority of Da Vinci's manuscripts are in black and white, this edition is the most affordable for readers with tight budgets and non-art majors to appreciate paintings and writings.
draft_translation: The personal opinion is that it is acceptable. First, the price is affordable, and the 700-plus pages are divided into two volumes, making it easier to browse as a paperback. Second, unlike the complete works of Michelangelo, where the paintings take the main role, this volume of Da Vinci is mostly composed of black-and-white manuscripts. For readers with limited budgets who are not specialized in art, this edition offers the best value for appreciating paintings and manuscripts.

src: 2、绘画部分的解说很棒，有构图分析、草稿分析和历史背景（比如最后的晚餐），但不知道是印刷还是书尺寸问题，有些阴影部分县的太深了，看不清细节，有点遗憾。
ref: 2, The painting section explanation is excellent, including composition analysis, draft analysis, and historical context (such as the Last Supper), but I'm not sure if it's the printing or the book's size, The details cannot be properly seen because of certain too-dark shadows, pity.
draft_translation: The explanation for the painting section is excellent, including composition analysis, sketch analysis, and historical context (such as The Last Supper). However, I'm not sure if it's a printing or book size issue, but some of the shadow areas are too dark, making it difficult to see the details, which is a bit disappointing.
final_translation: The explanation for the painting section is excellent, including composition analysis, sketch analysis, and historical context (such as The Last Supper). However, I'm not sure if it's a printing or book size issue, but some of the shadow areas are too dark, making it difficult to see the details, which is a bit disappointing.

src: 3、对比米开朗基罗的手稿，达芬奇的手稿内容就丰富的多。

src: 前者已经是天才了，后者涉猎之广、成就之高，不足以天才来形容。

src: 1. 在 3 月 29 号，通过预购途径使用 31 元购买了此书，显示 3 月 31 号会推送到设备上，此时亚马逊官网上还无法预览该书（因为还未发布）；
ref: 1. I bought the book for 31 yuan through the pre-order channel on March 29, and it says it would be delivered to my device on March 31, the book cannot be previewed on Amazon's official website at this moment (since it has not yet been released);
draft_translation: On March 29th, the book was purchased through a pre-order using 31 yuan, and it shows that it will be pushed to the device on March 31st. At that time, the book cannot be previewed on the Amazon website (since it has not been released yet).
final_translation: On March 29th, the book was purchased through a pre-order for 31 yuan, indicating it will be delivered to the device on March 31st. At that time, the book could not be previewed on the Amazon website (as it had not yet been released).

src: 2. 3 月 31 号推送到设备上的书，内容是空白，只有敬请期待，而亚马逊上该书电子版降价到了 18 元；
ref: 2. The price of the book's electronic version on Amazon has been lowered to 18 yuan, and the content of the book that was pushed to the device on March 31 is blank;
draft_translation: The book pushed to the device on March 31st is blank, containing only "敬请期待" (please wait), while the e-book version on Amazon has been discounted to 18 yuan.
final_translation: The book sent to the device on March 31st is empty, containing only "Coming soon," while the e-book version on Amazon has been discounted to 18 yuan.

src: 3. 这两天反复尝试将设备上的下载的空白的书进行删除，再次同步，都无法获取到包含实际内容的电子版《商业的本质》，但是看到亚马逊官网已经可以预览该书。
ref: 3. I have tried several times over the past two days to remove the downloaded blank book from the device and synchronize it again, but I am unable to download "The Essence of Business" in its entirety, however, I can see that the book can be previewed on Amazon's official website.
draft_translation: 3. I have repeatedly tried to delete the blank book downloaded on the device and resynchronize, but I still cannot obtain the electronic version of "The Essence of Business" that contains actual content. However, I can preview the book on the Amazon official website.
final_translation: 3. I have repeatedly tried to delete the empty book downloaded on the device and resynchronize, but I still cannot obtain the electronic version of "The Essence of Business" that contains actual content. However, I can preview the book on the Amazon official website.

src: 目前我有几点感想

final_translation: I have a few impressions right now.

src: 1. 价格的问题其实并不是最重要的，关键是现在怎么将kindle上空白的书换成有实际内容的书，而不是永远下载下来都是“敬请期待”

draft_translation: The issue of price is actually not the most important one. The key is how to replace the blank books on Kindle with those that actually have content, rather than always downloading "Coming Soon" books.
final_translation: The issue of price is actually not the most important. The key is how to replace the empty books on Kindle with ones that have real content, rather than always downloading "Coming Soon" titles.

src: 2. 预购的书以后应该不会再买了，毕竟万一跳票，再下载一本空内容的书，手续看起来非常复杂；
ref: 2. The book that was preordered shouldn't be purchased again in the future, after all, the process appears to be exceedingly difficult if the ticket is bypassed, followed by the download of a book with no content;
draft_translation: Pre-purchased books should no longer be bought in the future, as it would be very complicated to download another book with empty content in case of a delay;
final_translation: Pre-purchased books should no longer be bought in the future, as it would be very complicated to download another blank book if the book is delayed;

src: 3. 希望亚马逊给到一个可以反馈此类问题的正常渠道，当对电子书下载、或者使用提出疑义的时候可以有地方反馈（工单、线上客服都可以，可以参考微软官方商城是怎么做的）
ref: 3. I'm hoping that Amazon will make a regular channel available for input on these problems, there will be a place to provide feedback when there are questions concerning the download or use of e-books (you can refer to Microsoft's official mall for instructions on how to do so through work orders or online customer care, both of which are appropriate)
draft_translation: 3. Hope Amazon provides a normal channel for feedback on such issues. When there are doubts about downloading or using e-books, there should be a place to feedback (such as a ticket system or online customer service). It can refer to how Microsoft's official store does it.

src: 不是很推荐阅读
ref: Reading is not highly advised

src: 很久前读的，恰巧看见了凭记忆写点读后感吧。
ref: I happened to notice it because I read about it a long time ago, so I'll just write from memory.
draft_translation: I read it a long time ago, and I happened to see it. Let me write down some thoughts based on my memory.
final_translation: I read it a long time ago and came across it. Let me write down some thoughts from memory.

src: 这本书与其说是短篇小说集，不如说是生活中关于爱情的碎片收集。
ref: This book is more of a collection of fragments about love in life than it is a compilation of short stories.
draft_translation: This book is more a collection of fragments about love in life than a collection of short stories.
final_translation: This book is more a collection of fragments about love in life than a collection of short stories.

src: 本书的笔调极其平淡，是那种白开水一样的平淡，遣词造句对简约追求到了极致，情节也是像夏日午后的大街一样，寂静平淡。
ref: The plot of this novel is as quiet and flat as a street in the middle of a summer afternoon, the tone of the book is similar to that of plain water, and the words and sentences used strive for the utmost simplicity.
draft_translation: The tone of this book is extremely plain, like plain water, and the language is simplified to its absolute essence. The plot is as quiet and ordinary as the streets on a summer afternoon.
final_translation: The tone of this book is extremely plain, like plain water, and the language is simplified to its extreme simplicity. The plot is as quiet and ordinary as the streets on a summer afternoon.

src: 每一个短篇都是平凡生活中的一小段时间的剪影，没有开头，没有结局。
ref: Each short narrative is a snapshot of a moment in everyday life that has no beginning or end.
draft_translation: Each short story is a glimpse of a small moment from ordinary life, with no beginning and no end.
final_translation: Each short story is a brief glimpse of ordinary life, with no beginning and no end.

src: 最后收集在一起，冠名《当我们谈论爱情时我们在谈论什么》。
ref: In the end, they were compiled under the heading "What We Talk About When We Talk About Love."
draft_translation: The final collection is named "When We Talk About Love, What Are We Talking About?"
final_translation: The final compilation is named "When We Talk About Love, What Are We Talking About?"

src: 我想，这个小说集，以及它的标题，像是一种行为艺术，作者想表达的是，爱情不止是舞台上的悲欢离合，都市传说中的海枯石烂，也不只是你侬我侬的如胶似漆，爱情不止是以上也不应该被以上代表，爱情也是平淡如水的生活，枯燥无味的日复一日，也有对生活的无措，现实的逃避，未来的茫然。
ref: I consider the title of this anthology of novels to be a type of performance art, the author aims to convey that love is more than only the emotions experienced on stage, the rocks and dry sea in urban tales, and the bond that binds you and I together, not only should the aforementioned not be seen as a representation of love, but also of a life that is dull day in and day out, as plain as water, with a loss of life, denial of reality, and uncertainty about the future.
draft_translation: The novel collection and its title seem like a form of performance art. The author wants to express that love is not just the tragic and romantic scenes on stage, the eternal vows in urban legends, or the sweet and clingy affection of "you and I." Love is not limited to these, and it should not be represented by them. Love is also the simple and ordinary life, the monotonous day after day, as well as the helplessness in facing life, the escape from reality, and the confusion about the future.
final_translation: The novel collection and its title resemble a form of performance art. The author aims to convey that love is not merely the tragic and romantic scenes on stage, the eternal promises in urban legends, or the tender and intimate bond of "you and I." Love transcends these, and should not be confined to them. It also encompasses the simple and ordinary life, the monotonous day after day, as well as the helplessness in confronting life, the escape from reality, and the uncertainty of the future.

src: 阅读这本书时你脑海里可能回想起你身旁吵架的夫妻，认识的人的索然无味的婚姻，以及不如意的感情。
ref: While you read this book, images of the quarreling couples around you, the uninteresting marriages of individuals you know, and the unsatisfying relationships can be running through your head.
draft_translation: When you read this book, you may imagine the arguing couple next to you, the dull marriages of people you know, and unsatisfying relationships.
final_translation: When you read this book, you may recall the arguing couple next to you, the dull marriages of people you know, and unsatisfying relationships.

src: 这正是我不推荐阅读的原因，从审美的角度上讲，本书的文笔和情节都索然无味，除非你的生活惊涛骇浪或者甜蜜得如生活在糖果城堡，否则你得阅读时的感觉就是见怪不怪和无聊。
ref: Since the writing and plot of this book are dull from an artistic standpoint, I do not advocate reading it, unless your life is difficult or sweet, like living in a candy castle, you will feel uncomfortable when you are forced to read it, not strange and dull.
draft_translation: This is precisely the reason I don't recommend reading this book. From an aesthetic perspective, the writing and plot are dull and uninteresting. Unless your life is full of dramatic upheavals or as sweet as living in a candy castle, the feeling you get while reading it would be one of indifference and boredom.
final_translation: This is precisely the reason I don't recommend reading this book. From an aesthetic perspective, the writing and plot are boring. Unless your life is filled with dramatic upheavals or as sweet as living in a candy castle, the reading experience would feel indifferent and boring.

src: 而从思想深度上，日常情节并没有让人眼前一亮或者扩展一个人的思路和视野（这点不同于马尔克斯的《霍乱时期的爱情》），短暂的片段也没有探讨任何问题，比如是什么样的错误导致了爱情的失败？
ref: In contrast to Marquez's "Love in the Time of Cholera," the daily narratives did not engage viewers or broaden their perspectives in terms of depth of thought, and the brief clips did not address any issues, such as What type of error caused the failure of love?
draft_translation: In terms of ideological depth, the everyday plot does not impress the eye or expand one's thinking and perspective (a point different from Maupassant's "The Tale of the Heir"). The brief scenes do not explore any issues, such as what kind of mistakes led to the failure of love?
final_translation: In terms of ideological depth, the everyday plot fails to captivate or expand a person's thinking and perspective (a point differing from Maupassant's "The Story of the Heir"). The brief scenes do not address any issues, such as what kind of mistakes led to the failure of love?

src: 主角婚姻的破裂来源于那些原因？
ref: What led to the marriage of the main character's failure?
draft_translation: The breakdown of the main character's marriage is due to various reasons.
final_translation: The breakdown of the main character's marriage is due to various reasons.

src: 所以我不推荐阅读这本书，读不读都没什么太大意义。
ref: Because this book doesn't make much sense whether you read it or not, I do not suggest reading it.
draft_translation: So I don't recommend reading this book; whether you read it or not, it doesn't really make much difference.
final_translation: So I don't recommend reading this book; whether you read it or not, it doesn't really make much difference.

src: 作者的想法更多地通过技巧和体裁表达而不是故事情节，也是本书阅读体验比较差的原因。

draft_translation: The author's ideas are more expressed through techniques and genres rather than the plot, which is also the reason why the reading experience of this book is somewhat poor.
final_translation: The author's ideas are more conveyed through techniques and styles rather than the plot, which is also why the book's reading experience is poor.

final_translation: Suitable for skimming, not for close reading.

final_translation: The book has good logic, but the content is not rich enough.

src: 解释了很多销售理论是什么、为什么,但在怎么办方面却很薄弱,只是指出了方向但是没有给出具体的做法。
ref: It provides an explanation of what and why numerous sales philosophies exist, However, it is lacking in practical advice, it does not offer any concrete solutions; it only indicates the direction.
draft_translation: Many sales theories have been explained in terms of what they are and why they are important, but the part about "how to do it" is weak. It only points out the direction but does not provide specific methods or actions.
final_translation: Many sales theories have been explained in terms of what they are and why they are important, but the section about "how to do it" is weak. It only points out the direction but does not provide specific methods or actions.

final_translation: Provide examples of both domestic and international figures, including well-known entrepreneurs or salespeople and less-known individuals.

src: 在顾客还是客户的称谓上变来变去。

final_translation: The title is still "customer," but it becomes "client" in the body of the text.

final_translation: The e-book also has issues such as misspelled words, missing punctuation, and numbering errors.

src: 总之,这本书作为理论入门是个不错的选择,但对于已经从事销售工作想要提高销售水平的人就不太适用了。

final_translation: In summary, this book is a good choice as an introduction to theory, but it is not suitable for those who are already working in sales and want to improve their sales skills.

src: 快速了解互联网金融的导读书
ref: Understand the Internet financial guidebook quickly
draft_translation: A quick guide to reading about internet finance
final_translation: A Quick Guide to Understanding Internet Finance

src: 这本书很浅，可以说只是一个入门课，可以帮助大家快速了解互联网金融的全貌，但要深入了解，还是要按图索骥，自己去深挖。
ref: This book is quite brief, you could say that it serves only as an introduction to Internet finance, if you want to grasp it in depth, however, you will still need to follow the road map and do some independent research.
draft_translation: This book is quite superficial and can be considered an introductory course, helping everyone quickly understand the overall picture of internet finance. However, to gain a deeper understanding, one must follow the map and dig further on their own.
final_translation: This book is quite basic and can be considered an introduction, helping people quickly grasp the overall picture of internet finance. However, to gain a deeper understanding, one must follow the map and dig deeper on their own.

src: 且成书时间较早，后来的支付宝微信借补贴大战培养用户习惯的内容还没提及，如今的第三方支付份额只怕已不是书中所说的占比这么小了吧。
ref: Because the book was written earlier, it does not include information about Alipay and WeChat's subsidy war to shape user habits, the third-party payment share in use today is most likely not as low as the book claimed.
draft_translation: The book was written relatively early, and the later content about Alipay and WeChat's competition in the lending subsidy market, which aimed to cultivate user habits, is not mentioned. Now, the market share of third-party payments may not be as small as what is described in the book.
final_translation: The book was written relatively early, and the content about Alipay and WeChat's competition in the subsidy market, which aimed to cultivate user habits, is not mentioned. Now, the market share of third-party payments may not be as small as what is described in the book.

src: 现在好多人外出吃饭都是带个手机就好，商家也因为银行流水太高的原因，弃用银联了。
ref: Because the book was written earlier, it does not include information about Alipay and WeChat's subsidy war to shape user habits, the third-party payment share in use today is most likely not as low as the book claimed.
draft_translation: Now many people just bring a phone when dining out, and merchants have stopped using UnionPay because of high bank transaction volumes.
final_translation: These days, many people bring a phone when dining out, and merchants have stopped using UnionPay due to high bank transaction volumes.

src: 但还是非常感谢作者写出这本入门书，看得出作者起码有多年的金融观察经验，对国内外的金融发展史都十分熟悉，所以才能写成如此通俗易懂的内容。
ref: However, I am quite appreciative to the author for penning this introduction, it is evident that the author has at least years of experience in financial observation and is well-versed in both domestic and international financial development history, as evidenced by the fact that he is able to produce such comprehensible information.
draft_translation: But I still greatly appreciate the author for writing this introductory book. It's clear that the author has years of experience in financial observation and is very familiar with the development history of finance both domestically and internationally, which is why the content can be so easily understood.
final_translation: But I still greatly appreciate the author for writing this introductory book. It's clear that the author has years of experience in financial observation and is very familiar with the development history of finance both domestically and internationally, which is why the content can be so easily understood.

src: 写高大空很容易，难的是写的通俗易懂。
ref: Tall and meaningless writing is simple to do, but writing in an understandable manner is difficult.
draft_translation: It's easy to write something grand and lofty, but difficult is to write in a way that is simple and easy to understand.
final_translation: It's easy to write something impressive, but difficult to write in a simple and easy-to-understand manner.

src: 欣赏你，更想让你知道！
ref: I value you and wish to tell you more!
draft_translation: I appreciate you, but I want you to know it more!
final_translation: I appreciate you, but I want you to know how much I appreciate you!

src: 决定一个人工作满意度的第一要素不是薪水高低，而是在工作中是否得到了足够重视和赏识。
ref: Not the amount of pay, but rather whether or not a person feels valued and given enough attention at work, is the primary determinant of job happiness.
draft_translation: The first factor that determines a person's job satisfaction is not the level of salary, but whether they are given enough attention and recognition in their work.
final_translation: The first factor that determines a person's job satisfaction is not the level of salary, but whether they are given enough attention and recognition in their work.

src: 根据马斯洛需求层次理论，在人的基本生存需要得到满足后，最迫切的就是心理需要的满足——希望被理解、被肯定、被赏识。
ref: Maslow's hierarchy of needs theory states that when people's basic needs for survival are met, it is imperative to meet their psychological needs-- in order to feel understood, validated, and valued.
draft_translation: According to Maslow's hierarchy of needs theory, after basic survival needs are met, the most urgent need is the satisfaction of psychological needs—feeling understood, appreciated, and recognized.
final_translation: According to Maslow's hierarchy of needs theory, after basic survival needs are met, the most urgent need is the satisfaction of psychological needs—feeling understood, appreciated, and recognized.

src: 确实，对于国人来说，大部分是“爱你在心口难开”，即便是怀有爱、感激与赞赏也是默默放在心里不会说出来。
ref: In fact, the majority of Chinese people are "I love you hard to express" people who will keep their feelings of adoration, thanks, and appreciation to themselves and refrain from expressing them out loud.
draft_translation: Indeed, for the Chinese people, most of them feel "I love you but can't say it," even if they have love, gratitude, and admiration, they keep it silently in their hearts and don't express it outwardly.
final_translation: Indeed, for Chinese people, most experience "I love you but can't say it," even with love, gratitude, and admiration, they keep it to themselves and don't express it outwardly.

src: 作者在本书中阐述了五种赞赏的语言：肯定的言辞、精心时刻、服务的行为、称心的礼物、身体接触。
ref: The author of this book explains the five languages of appreciation: physical touch, words of affirmation, acts of service, quality time, and desirable gifts.
draft_translation: The author presents five languages of appreciation in this book: words of affirmation, meaningful moments, acts of service, thoughtful gifts, and physical touch.
final_translation: The author presents five languages of appreciation in this book: words of affirmation, thoughtful moments, acts of service, satisfying gifts, and physical touch.

src: 我觉得重要的不是你知道赞赏的五种语言到底是什么，而是你能随时随地发自内心地用这五种语言去赞赏，去感恩身边的人，不管是家人，朋友还是同事。
ref: Not knowing the five languages of appreciation, in my opinion, is more significant than being able to express appreciation and gratitude to those around you whenever and wherever you are, whether they be close friends, family members, or coworkers.
draft_translation: I think what's important is not that you know exactly what the five languages of appreciation are, but that you can use these five languages sincerely and at any time to appreciate and be grateful for the people around you, whether they are family, friends, or colleagues.
final_translation: I think what's important is not that you know exactly what the five languages of appreciation are, but that you can use these five languages sincerely and at any time to appreciate and be grateful for the people around you, whether they are family, friends, or colleagues.

src: 其实越是亲密的人越需要赞赏和感恩，这样我们的生活才会变得更加美好。
ref: In fact, the closer individuals are to us, the more we need to show them respect and appreciation for them, in order for our lives to improve.
draft_translation: Actually, the closer the relationship, the more we need to appreciate and be grateful, which will make our lives more beautiful.
final_translation: Actually, the closer the relationship, the more we need to value and be grateful, which will make our lives better.

src: 学会赞赏，企业也能在一定程度上挽留住人才，降低辞职率。
ref: Recognize your worth so that you can help businesses keep people on board longer and cut down on turnover.
draft_translation: Learning to appreciate employees can help companies retain talent to a certain extent and reduce turnover rates.
final_translation: Learning to appreciate employees can help companies retain talent to a certain extent and reduce turnover rates.

src: 感谢译者给我们带来了精彩的国外的思想和世界。
ref: We are grateful to the translator for introducing us to such amazing foreign ideas and cultures.
draft_translation: Thank you for bringing us excellent ideas from abroad and the world.
final_translation: Thank you for your excellent work in bringing us outstanding ideas from abroad and global perspectives.

src: 由于中西方文化背景等原因，语言之间或多或少会存在差异，如果有机会能看到作者原版相信会收获更多。
ref: There are more or less linguistic distinctions,, because of factors like the cultural backgrounds of Chinese and Western people, I think you will learn more if you have the chance to see the author's original work.
draft_translation: Due to differences in cultural backgrounds between the East and West, languages will have some differences. If we have the opportunity to see the original work, we would gain more insights.
final_translation: Due to differences in cultural backgrounds between the East and West, languages will have some differences. If we have the opportunity to see the original work, we would gain more insights.

src: 再次谢谢作者和译者以及编辑们的辛勤劳动！
ref: Once more, I'd want to thank the authors, translators, and editors for their labor of love!
draft_translation: Once again, thank you to the author, translators, and editors for their hard work!
final_translation: Once again, thank you to the author, translators, and editors for their hard work!

src: 疑为伪劣商品，请亚马逊严格审核
ref: Please conduct a thorough review, of suspected counterfeit goods by Amazon
draft_translation: It is suspected to be substandard goods, please Amazon strictly review
final_translation: It may be low-quality goods, please have Amazon strictly review

src: 质量超级差，包装松垮，没有分量，甚至不如路边地摊产品，没有克重，没有条码，十袋包装也是松松垮垮，完全不是合格产品的特征；是亚马逊最糟糕的购物体验，已经申请退货；完全属于质量问题；建议商家擦亮眼睛，拒绝劣质货；补充：又买了心相印，超市23元/10卷，加了几张对比照片，进一步验证了该产品的伪劣，为了给消费者更明确的参考，避免经济损失和进一步的心情不快！
ref: The quality is extremely poor, the packaging is loose, there is no weight, it is not even as good as street stall products, there is no weight, there is no barcode, and the ten-bag packaging is also loose, which is not a characteristic of qualified products at all; it is the worst shopping experience I have ever had on Amazon, and I have requested a return, it is entirely a quality issue; traders should retain an open mind and shun substandard goods, supplement: I purchased a heart-to-heart, 23 yuan/10 roll from a supermarket and attached a few comparison photographs to confirm the product's authenticity, clearer references to avoid financial loss and more dissatisfaction!
draft_translation: The quality is extremely poor, the packaging is loose and not substantial, with no weight or barcode. It's even worse than products from street vendors. The ten-pack packaging is also loose and not up to standard, completely not the characteristics of a qualified product. This is the worst shopping experience on Amazon; I have already applied for a return. It is definitely a quality issue. I suggest merchants pay close attention and refuse substandard goods. Supplement: I bought another Heartprint (Heartprint is a brand name, possibly referring to a paper product), which costs 23 yuan for 10 rolls in the supermarket. I added a few comparison photos to further verify the product's substandard quality. To provide consumers with a clearer reference and avoid economic losses and further dissatisfaction, I have shared this information.
final_translation: The quality is extremely poor, the packaging is loose and lacks weight, with no barcode. It's even worse than products from street vendors. The ten-pack packaging is also loose and not up to quality standards, completely failing to meet the characteristics of a qualified product. This is the worst shopping experience on Amazon; I have already applied for a return. It is definitely a quality issue. I suggest merchants pay close attention and refuse substandard goods. Supplement: I bought another Heartprint, which costs 23 yuan for 10 rolls in the supermarket. I added a few comparison photos to further verify the product's substandard quality. To provide consumers with a clearer reference and avoid economic losses and further dissatisfaction, I have shared this information.

src: 再度期望亚马逊能够一丝不苟，严把商品源头。

final_translation: Once again, we hope Amazon can be meticulous and strictly control the source of goods.

final_translation: 2. There is a strong odor. Even after charging for just 10 minutes, you can already smell the strong smell of burning plastic.

src: 收到快递一看上面写着电商版就知道又掉坑里了，比超市买的小了好些，应该是M，跟商品介绍上面的图片包装不一样，所谓新版吧。
ref: I knew it had fallen down the hole once more when I opened the express delivery and saw the e-commerce version, compared to the supermarket version, it was smaller, it ought to be M, in contrast to the product introduction picture, the package is different, the allegedly new version, the so-named new edition.
draft_translation: The moment I received the parcel, I could tell it was the e-commerce version, so I knew I had fallen into another trap. It's a bit smaller than what I bought in the supermarket. It should be a M size, and the packaging is different from the image shown in the product description. That's what they call the "new version."
final_translation: The moment I received the parcel, I could tell it was the e-commerce version, so I knew I had fallen into a pitfall. It's a bit smaller than what I bought in the supermarket. It should be a M size, and the packaging differs from the image in the product description. That's what they call the "new version."

src: 三颗星是怪自己马虎没看清楚商品规格，你卖M码电商版我没意见，你货不对版是几个意思？
ref: I only gave it three stars because I was careless and didn't carefully read the product details, I have no issue with you offering the M-size online version for sale, what does it signify that the edition of your product is incorrect?
draft_translation: The three stars are because I was careless and didn't check the product specifications carefully. You selling M-sized e-commerce version is okay, but if the product doesn't match the description, what does that mean?
final_translation: The three stars are because I was careless and didn't check the product specifications carefully. You selling the M-sized e-commerce version is acceptable, but if the product doesn't match the description, what does that mean?

final_translation: The e-commerce scene is deceptive; perhaps it's better to just go to the supermarket and purchase it.

src: 小孩很不喜欢牙膏的味道，每次都说辣，也许用别的词形容才更贴切，小孩的词库里暂时只有这个词。
ref: The kid doesn't particularly enjoy the flavor of toothpaste, and always claims it's spicy, perhaps a different word would be more suited to describe it, currently the child's vocabulary consists of just this one word.

final_translation: I bought it during a promotion, so it was really cheap. Therefore, I don't feel like leaving a bad review. Four stars, but I won't buy it again.

src: 瓶子外包装上还有一层塑料膜像图片上描述的一样，快递也很快，拍下第二天就来了。

final_translation: The outer packaging of the bottle has a layer of plastic film, just as described in the picture. The delivery was fast; the package arrived the day after I placed the order.

src: 糟心的一次购物体验
ref: A poor shopping encounter
draft_translation: A disappointing shopping experience
final_translation: A disappointing shopping experience

src: 黑五的时候下的单，结果等了好久都没收到，后面一查询，包裹早已被签收，问了身边的同事都说没有帮签收，赶紧联系快递公司，却说要寄件方才能发起查询，联系了亚马逊客服，又等了十多天，终于搞清楚是快递被误投给别人了，又几番周转才终于取回快递，外包装已经被拆，商品还算是完整，也不知道被用过没有，总之挺糟心的
ref: I ordered on Black Friday, but despite waiting a long time, I never got the item, the box had already been signed for when I checked it later, my coworkers denied signing for it when I questioned them about it, I called the courier service right away, but they told the sender should make the inquiry, over ten days passed after I contacted Amazon customer service, the messenger was inadvertently sent to someone else, I finally realized, I eventually recovered the courier after a few rounds, the product is still intact despite the removal of the outer packing, I'm not sure if it was ever used, No, it's still fairly horrible
draft_translation: I placed an order during Black Friday, but I waited for a long time and didn't receive it. Later, when I checked, the package had already been delivered. When I asked my colleagues around me, they all said they hadn't helped with the delivery. I then contacted the courier company, but they said I needed the sender's information to initiate the query. After contacting Amazon customer service, I waited another ten days before finally figuring out that the package had been mistakenly delivered to someone else. After several rounds of back and forth, I finally retrieved the package. The outer packaging had already been opened, and the product was still intact, but I don't know if it had been used. Overall, it was really frustrating.
final_translation: I placed an order during Black Friday, but I waited for a long time and didn't receive it. Later, when I checked, the package had already been delivered. When I asked my colleagues, they all said they hadn't helped with the signature. I then contacted the courier service, but they said I needed the sender's information to initiate a query. After contacting Amazon customer service, I waited another ten days before finally figuring out that the package had been mistakenly delivered to someone else. After several rounds of back and forth, I finally retrieved the package. The outer packaging had already been opened, and the product was still intact, but I don't know if it had been used. Overall, it was really frustrating.

src: 错误的配图

src: 我以为自己能够收到图1这样的耳机，没想到却收到了图2这样的耳机，图物不一致也就算了，耳机左右声音大小不一又是什么意思？
