final_translation: I thought I would receive the earphones shown in Figure 1, but instead I got the ones in Figure 2. It's one thing if the product doesn't match the image, but why are the left and right earphones producing different volumes?

src: 虽然名称都是一样的，但还是希望大家能够小心注意，另外还请亚马逊负责人及时更换正确的配图，万分感谢。
ref: Despite the fact that the names are the same, I still hope that everyone will pay attention, to add, I also request that the Amazon administrator quickly replaces the appropriate image, I appreciate you.
draft_translation: Although the names are the same, please everyone be careful, and also please ask the Amazon responsible person to promptly replace the correct images. Thank you very much.
final_translation: Although the names are the same, please be careful, everyone. Also, please ask the Amazon responsible person to promptly replace the correct images. Thank you very much.

src: 操作系统一般般
ref: Moderate operating system
draft_translation: Operating system is average.
final_translation: Operating system is average.

src: 用了一段时间，总体来说画面还可以，感觉不出什么差别来，就是这个系统让人看着纠结，开机时间明显有点慢，也没法进行很好的设置，再带的软件更是不用评论了，响应速度那就更一般了，和同事家的比起来那不是一个数量级的。
ref: After using it for a while, I can't really see the difference, but overall the picture is not horrible, however this system makes people look jumbled, boots up slowly, I can't make proper settings, and the software I bring is not required, when compared to my colleagues' responses, the response time is not significantly slower after commenting.
draft_translation: After using it for a while, the overall picture is acceptable, and I don't feel like there are significant differences. The system itself looks a bit confusing, the boot time is noticeably slow, and it's not possible to set it up well. The bundled software is definitely not worth commenting on, and the response speed is even worse. Compared to my colleague's, it's not even in the same ballpark.
final_translation: After using it for a while, the overall picture is acceptable, and I don't feel like there are significant differences. The system itself looks a bit confusing, the boot time is noticeably slow, and it's not possible to set it up well. The bundled software is definitely not worth mentioning, and the response speed is even worse. Compared to my colleague's, it's not even in the same league.

src: 看评论说很人性化的设计，我没有找到哪里人性化，遥控器这个常用的上下左右，返回键设计的位置实在是不敢恭维。
ref: Although it is described as having a very user-friendly design in the comments, I couldn't discover any examples of a human-friendly design, Up, down, left, and right are the often utilized remote control directions, and the back button's placement is actually not very attractive.
draft_translation: The comments say it has a humanized design, but I haven't found any places where it is truly humanized. The position of the directional buttons (up, down, left, right) and the back button on the remote control is really disappointing.
final_translation: The comments mention a user-friendly design, but I haven't found any truly user-friendly aspects. The placement of the directional buttons (up, down, left, right) and the back button on the remote control is truly disappointing.

src: 所以呢，就当个电视吧，再外加电视盒之类的用吧。
ref: So, just utilize it as a TV, and use a TV box or something similar.
draft_translation: So, just use it as a TV, and also use it with a TV box or something like that.
final_translation: So, just use it as a TV, and use it along with a TV box or something like that.

src: 降价太厉害了
ref: The price cut is too substantial
draft_translation: The price has dropped too much.
final_translation: The price has fallen too much.

src: 降价太厉害了，一百多入现在99！
ref: More than 100 yuan is now only 99, a too-strong price reduction!
draft_translation: The price drop is too drastic, it was over 100 yuan before, now it's just 99!
final_translation: The price drop is too drastic, it was over 100 yuan before, now it's just 99!

src: 在亚马逊积累了很多未评价的订单，所以我统一用复制的一段话作为评价内容。
ref: I have a ton of unreviewed orders on Amazon, so I use a paraphrased passage as the evaluation content.
draft_translation: I have a lot of orders on Amazon that haven't been reviewed, so I use the same paragraph for all of them as the review content.
final_translation: I have a lot of unreviewed orders on Amazon, so I use the same paragraph as the review content.

src: 如果我用这段话来评价，说明这款产品至少85分以上。
ref: If I evaluate based on this section, it indicates that the product has at least 85 points or higher.
draft_translation: If I use this statement to evaluate it, it indicates that the product is at least 85 points or above.
final_translation: If I use this text to evaluate it, it indicates the product scores at least 85 or more.

src: 而比较差的产品，我绝对不会偷懒到复制粘贴评价，这样其他消费者在购买的时候会作为参考，而商家也会因此改进商品质量。
ref: If a product is subpar, I will never be so lazy to copy and paste reviews so that future customers can use them as a guide when making a purchase and the seller can raise the standard of the product as a result.
draft_translation: As for worse products, I will never cut corners by copying and pasting reviews. This way, other consumers can refer to them when making purchases, and the merchants can also improve the quality of their products accordingly.
final_translation: As for products of poorer quality, I will never cut corners by copying and pasting reviews. This allows other consumers to refer to them when making purchases, and merchants can also improve the quality of their products accordingly.

src: 低价好线，不发烧就这个够了！
ref: If you don't have a fever, this is plenty given the low price and good line
draft_translation: Low-cost good wire, this is enough if it doesn't overheat!
final_translation: Affordable high-quality wire – it won't overheat, and this is enough!

src: 这么便宜的线，但是却应该是达到了hdmi认证标准的，亲身对比秒杀国内秋叶原这些狗屁玩意（价格都是贵一倍了），线身粗壮，也比较柔软，7米传输没有噪点，以后低价线认准倍思了！
ref: Despite being so inexpensive, the cable should have met the requirements for HDMI certification, the cable body is thick and supple, and the transmission across the 7-meter distance is noise-free when compared to domestic Akihabara rubbish (which costs twice as much), In the future, keep an eye out for Baseus' low price line!
draft_translation: Such a cheap cable, but it should have met the HDMI certification standards. When I personally compared it, it easily outperformed the so-called "Qiyeyuan" products in China (prices are all double). The cable is thick and flexible, and 7 meters of transmission has no noise. In the future, low-price cables should be trusted with Bipin!
final_translation: Such a cheap cable, but it should have met the HDMI certification standards. When I personally compared it, it easily outperformed Qiyeyuan products in China (prices are double). The cable is thick and flexible, and 7 meters of transmission has no noise. In the future, low-price cables should be trusted as Bipin!

src: 东西还可以，但是亚马逊的售后服务真的比其他网站差太多了
ref: Things are fine, but Amazon's customer service is significantly inferior to that of competing websites
draft_translation: The product is okay, but Amazon's after-sales service is really much worse than other websites.
final_translation: The product is okay, but Amazon's after-sales service is really much worse than other websites.

src: 下单后发现下错了，但是取消订单已经取消不了，网页联系在线客服一直显示错误链接，联系不上。
ref: I realized my error after I placed the order, but I am unable to cancel it, the incorrect link was always presented when I tried to contact the website's online customer support, so I was unable to do so.
draft_translation: After placing an order, it was found that the wrong item was ordered, but the order cannot be canceled. When trying to contact online customer service through the website, it always shows an error link and cannot be contacted.
final_translation: After placing an order, it was found that the wrong item was ordered, but the order cannot be canceled. When trying to contact online customer service through the website, it always shows an error link and cannot be contacted.

src: 到货后送货员给我打电话，我说我不要了，想取消订单的没取消成功，派送员就拿回去了，说先给我签收上，让我申请退货。
ref: The delivery person contacted me after the package had been delivered, and I informed him that I no longer wanted it, when I tried to cancel an order but it was not accepted, the delivery man carried it back and asked me to sign for it before letting me request for a return.
draft_translation: The delivery person called me after the goods arrived. I said I didn't want them anymore and tried to cancel the order, but the cancellation failed. Then the delivery person took the package back and said they would first have me sign for receipt, and then let me apply for a return.
final_translation: The delivery person called me after the goods arrived. I said I didn't want them anymore and tried to cancel the order, but the cancellation was unsuccessful. Then the delivery person took the package back and said they would have me sign for receipt first, then let me apply for a return.

src: 申请退货时才告知食品类一旦签收不能退货，没办法打电话给亚马逊客服，也是一样说法，签收不能退货。
ref: I was informed that after the food is signed for, it cannot be returned and that there is no way to contact Amazon customer service when I requested a refund, likewise, the sign cannot be exchanged in this situation.
draft_translation: When applying for a return, it is only then that the food category is informed that returns are not allowed after signing receipt. There's no way to call Amazon customer service, as they also say that returns are not allowed after signing receipt.
final_translation: When applying for a return, the food category is only informed that returns are not allowed after signing the receipt. There's no way to contact Amazon customer service, as they also state that returns are not allowed after signing the receipt.

src: 我以前在京东和苏宁都买过政策上不能退货的物品，包括牛奶、纸尿裤等，联系客服都给退了，而且京东的纸尿裤打开后味道太大联系客服照样给退了，到了你亚马逊就不行。
ref: I have purchased things from Jingdong and Suning, including milk and diapers, that are not returnable in accordance with the rules, when I contacted customer service, they were reimbursed, but Jingdong diapers were excessively pungent after they were opened, the customer support still responded after I called them, when you get to Amazon, you cannot do it.
draft_translation: I have bought items that cannot be returned according to the policy on JD.com and Suning.com before, including milk and diapers. I contacted customer service and they still processed the returns. Even when the diapers from JD.com had a strong smell after opening, customer service still handled the return. But it's different on Amazon.
final_translation: I have bought items that cannot be returned according to the policy on JD and Suning before, including milk and diapers. I contacted customer service and they still processed the returns. Even when the diapers from JD had a strong smell after opening, customer service still handled the return. But it's different on Amazon.

src: 规矩是死的，人是活的，联系你们客服，怎么处理的？
ref: Rules are no longer valid, people are still living, what should you do? Contact your customer service
draft_translation: Rules are dead, people are alive. Contact your customer service, how is it handled?
final_translation: Rules are dead, people are dynamic. Contact your customer service. How does customer service handle it?

src: 告诉我要么我自己收下，要么让派送员自己买下来，人家派送员本来就不容易了，我凭什么让人家掏钱买下不是自己购买的东西？
ref: Tell me I have the option of accepting it personally, or letting the courier make the purchase on his own, why should I let the courier pay for something I didn't buy when it is not easy for the courier?
draft_translation: I'll take it myself or let the delivery person buy it themselves. The delivery person is already hardworking, so why should I make them pay for something that isn't theirs to buy?
final_translation: Either I'll take it myself or let the delivery person buy it. The delivery person is already hardworking, so why should I make them pay for something that isn't theirs to buy?

src: 行，我也不退了，我自己收下了，但是必须给你们的服务打1分
ref: Okay, I accept it myself and will not want a refund, but I must give your service 1 point
draft_translation: Okay, I won't take it back. I'll keep it, but I have to rate your service as 1 star.
final_translation: Okay, I won't take it back. I'll take it myself, but I have to rate your service as 1 star.

src: 劝大家不要白花钱
ref: My advice to you is to avoid wasting money
draft_translation: Encourage everyone not to waste money
final_translation: Encourage everyone not to waste money

src: 首先满怀期待购买，觉得都乐品牌的应该不会差到哪里去吧，收到了以后看包装觉得还可以，个头还不错，但是有一盒基本上都是软软的，外表看是看不出来的，要手感，吃到嘴里完全没有味道，寡淡无味，咬开来果肉一圈是暗黄色就是坏了那种，好坏参着卖的，能吃的也就不到三分之一，劝大家不要买，也不便宜，质量太差了！
ref: I am eager to purchase it, first and foremost, the Dole brand shouldn't necessarily be awful, in my opinion, I examined the package when I first got it and deemed it adequate, the size is not bad, but there is a box that is essentially soft, which cannot be seen from the outside, to feel tasteless in the mouth after eating, bland and tasteless, the flesh surrounding the bite is dark yellow, that is the kind that is broken, good and bad are sold together, and less than one-third of the edible ones, I would advise against buying anything because it is extremely expensive and of poor quality
draft_translation: First, I was full of anticipation when I bought it, thinking that the Dahuale brand shouldn't be too bad. When I received it, the packaging was acceptable, and the size was decent. However, there was a box where almost all of them were soft, and you couldn't tell from the outside. You have to feel it. When you eat them, there's no taste at all, just bland and tasteless. When you bite into them, the fruit flesh around the edge is a dark yellow, which is bad. They are mixed with good and bad ones, and the ones that are edible make up no more than a third. I strongly advise everyone not to buy it. It's not cheap, and the quality is really poor!
final_translation: First, I was full of anticipation when I bought it, thinking that the Dahuale brand wouldn't be too bad. When I received it, the packaging was acceptable, and the size was decent. However, there was a box where almost all of them were soft, and you couldn't tell from the outside. You have to feel it. When you eat them, there's no taste at all, just bland and tasteless. When you bite into them, the fruit pulp around the rim is a dark yellow, which is spoiled. They are mixed with good and bad ones, and the edible ones make up no more than a third. I strongly advise everyone not to buy it. It's not cheap, and the quality is really poor!

src: 吃一堑长一智，以后再也不在电商买水果了！
ref: Never again purchase fruit through online commerce after making this mistake!
draft_translation: Learn from each setback, and from now on, I'll never buy fruits on e-commerce platforms again!
final_translation: Learn a lesson from a setback, and from now on, I'll never buy fruits on e-commerce platforms again!

src: 产品防伪标识在哪里
ref: Where is the security seal for the product
draft_translation: Where is the product anti-counterfeiting mark?
final_translation: Where is the product anti-counterfeit mark?

src: 瓶子底部一角凹陷的厉害，应该是经历过强烈的撞击才能导致的，从外包装袋看，感觉蹂躏的程度让人揪心，毕竟是食物类的包装太简单了，而且还是属于国际购的，还有没看到什么明显的防伪标识标志，开瓶非常轻松，关键是盖内的一层蜂蜜直接从里面冒出来了，有开口几乎是没有什么粘连性，外国产品都是这样的吗？
ref: The bottle's bottom corner is substantially dented, which should be the result of a powerful hit, from the outer packaging bag, it is alarming to see the extent of the damage, after all, despite the food's overly basic packaging, it is nevertheless sold abroad, have you noticed any blatant counterfeit prevention signs? The bottle is really simple to open, the crucial feature is that the honey layer in the top spills out right away, when there is an opening, adhesion is essentially nonexistent, are all imported goods the same?
draft_translation: The bottom corner of the bottle is significantly indented, which should have been caused by a strong impact. From the outer packaging, it looks like it's been severely damaged, which is worrying. It's strange that the packaging for food is so simple, especially since it's an international purchase. I also didn't see any obvious anti-counterfeit marks. Opening the bottle was very easy. The key thing is that the inner layer of honey came out directly from inside, and when it was opened, there was almost no stickiness. Is this the case for foreign products?
final_translation: The bottom corner of the bottle is significantly indented, which should have been caused by a strong impact. From the outer packaging, it looks like it's been severely damaged, which is worrying. It's strange that the packaging for food is so simple, especially since it's an international product. I also didn't see any obvious anti-counterfeit labels. Opening the bottle was very easy. The key thing is that the inner layer of honey came out directly from inside, and when it was opened, there was almost no stickiness. Is this the case for foreign products?

src: 生在中国的我有点不理解了。
ref: I'm confused, being Chinese by birth.
draft_translation: I, who was born in China, feel a bit confused.
final_translation: I, who was born in China, feel a bit confused.

src: 应该是正品吧？
ref: It ought to be authentic, right?
draft_translation: It should be genuine, right?
final_translation: It should be genuine, right?

src: 还有拍下时提示二十几号到，这个是14号收到的，我第一次在这里海外购，只是把自己的疑惑写下来，或许这都是正常的？
ref: When I shot the picture, there was also a notification indicating it would arrive on the 20th, on the 14th, I got this one, this is my first buy from abroad, I simply noted my reservations, perhaps this is typical?
draft_translation: There was a prompt saying it would arrive around the 20s, but I received it on the 14th. I'm new to overseas shopping here, so I just want to write down my doubts. Maybe everything is normal?
final_translation: There was a message indicating it would arrive around the 20th, but I received it on the 14th. I'm new to overseas shopping here, so I just try to write down my concerns. Maybe everything is normal?

src: 提货服务有待改进
ref: Improved pick-up service is required
draft_translation: The pickup service needs improvement.
final_translation: The pickup service needs improvement.

src: 我一共买了5份提货券，在提取时，第一次预约提取3份，结果只寄过来2份，经过多方沟通才确认是漏发、答应后需补发；第二次预约，刚好赶上休息日，网站和微信均无提示需要在工作日预约，造成了不必要的恐慌，建议以后改善。
ref: I purchased 5 delivery coupons in total, I had scheduled a time to pick up 3 coupons, but only 2 were delivered when I went to pick them up, after numerous communications, it was determined that they had been overlooked and that new copies of them were required, the second appointment arrived right on schedule, there was unnecessary worry produced because neither the website nor WeChat mentioned the need for an appointment on weekdays on the final rest day, it is advised to get better in the future.
draft_translation: I bought a total of 5 vouchers. When I went to collect them, the first time I scheduled to collect 3, but only 2 were sent. After communicating with multiple parties, it was confirmed that one was missing, and they promised to resend it. The second time I scheduled, it coincided with a rest day, and neither the website nor WeChat notified me that it needs to be scheduled on a workday, which caused unnecessary panic. I suggest that this issue be improved in the future.
final_translation: I bought a total of 5 vouchers. When I went to collect them, the first time I scheduled to collect 3, but only 2 were sent. After communicating with multiple parties, it was confirmed that one was missing, and they promised to resend it. The second time I scheduled, it coincided with a rest day, and neither the website nor WeChat notified me that it needs to be scheduled on a rest day, which caused unnecessary panic. I suggest that this issue be improved in the future.

src: 不错的购物
ref: Pleasant shopping
draft_translation: Good shopping
final_translation: Good shopping

src: 东西好评！
ref: Nice stuff!
draft_translation: Great product!
final_translation: Great product!

src: 还是比较相信亚马逊自营的东西，现在海外购以后很方便，从国外买回来物流时间比国内也就多几天，不得不说亚马逊海外购到国内的清关能力还是很强的，比走转运要快很多，所以现在很多东西都在海外购上买。
ref: I still have faith in Amazon's autonomous products, the shipping period is now only a few days longer than domestic ones, making it incredibly simple to purchase internationally, I must admit that Amazon still has excellent customs clearance capabilities for purchases made outside of China; this is quicker than transshipment, nowadays so many products are bought abroad, which is much faster.
draft_translation: I still trust Amazon's own products. Now that overseas shopping is convenient, it's easy to buy from abroad. The logistics time to bring items back to China is only a few days longer than domestic shipping. It's no exaggeration to say that Amazon's overseas shopping service has strong customs clearance capabilities when shipping to China, which is much faster than through a forwarding service. Therefore, many people now buy their items through Amazon overseas shopping.
final_translation: I still trust Amazon's own products. Since overseas shopping is easy, it's convenient to buy from abroad. The logistics time to bring items back to China is only a few days longer than domestic shipping. It's no exaggeration to say that Amazon's overseas shopping service has strong customs clearance capabilities when shipping to China, which is much faster than using a forwarding service. Therefore, many people now buy their items through Amazon overseas shopping.

src: 希望国内商品的质量和价格能够更好一些，很多东西都是国内产的，但是出去转一圈买回来比在国内还便宜，希望改进。
ref: I hope that domestic items' quality and cost can improve, even though many items are made domestically, buying them elsewhere rather than in China is more affordable, I want it to get better.
draft_translation: I hope the quality and price of domestic products can be improved. Many things are made domestically, but sometimes shopping abroad and buying them back is cheaper than buying them domestically. I hope there will be improvements in this area.
final_translation: I hope the quality and price of domestic products can be improved. Many items are made domestically, but purchasing them overseas is often cheaper. I hope for better quality and pricing.

src: 垃圾
ref: Rubbish
draft_translation: Trash
final_translation: Trash

src: 看到这样的包裹，试问大家:觉不觉得是路边的垃圾?
ref: I want to question everyone: Do you think this package by the side of the road is trash after seeing it?
draft_translation: Seeing such a package, I wonder if everyone feels it's just trash on the side of the road?
final_translation: Seeing such a package, I wonder if everyone feels it's ordinary trash on the side of the road?

src: 一个塑料易碎的包装，就用一个塑料袋从所谓的德国发过来，这样的包装是负责的吗?
ref: From the so-called Germany, a delicate plastic box is sent in a plastic bag, is a package like that accountable?
draft_translation: A plastic fragile packaging, just a plastic bag sent from所谓的 Germany, is this packaging responsible?
final_translation: A plastic fragile packaging, just a plastic bag sent from so-called Germany, is this packaging responsible?

src: 我看这样的包装是装垃圾一样的，购买这个产品，包装及其简陋，没有任何防止破损的措施，就一个简单的塑料袋包装，到手后，包裹完全变形了，里面的物品也有破损。
ref: This kind of packaging is, in my opinion, packing garbage, when I purchased this item, the packing was quite straightforward, there was nothing in place to stop harm, it was merely a plain plastic bag, when I received it, the contents of the shipment and the entire package were entirely ruined.
draft_translation: The packaging looks like it's for garbage. The product's packaging is very simple and lacks any protective measures to prevent damage. It's just wrapped in a simple plastic bag, and upon receiving it, the packaging is completely deformed, and the items inside are also damaged.
final_translation: The packaging resembles garbage. The product's packaging is extremely simple with no protective measures to prevent damage. It's just wrapped in a simple plastic bag, and upon arrival, the packaging is completely deformed, with the items inside also damaged.

src: 如果我只是碰到一个这样的，我认了，买了几个都是这样子，找亚马逊客服，客服就说可以退，但运费垫付，然后运费以礼品卡的形式返回给我。
ref: I will recognize it and purchase a number of these if I only come across one like it, when I contacted Amazon customer service, they informed me that the shipping price may be reimbursed but that it would first need to be paid and would then be given to me in the form of a gift card.
draft_translation: If I just happen to get one like this, I'm okay with it. But when I bought a few, they were all like this. I contacted Amazon customer service, and they said I could return them, but the shipping costs would be covered, and then the shipping costs would be returned to me as a gift card.
final_translation: If I just happen to get one like this, I accept it. However, when I bought several, they were all like this. I contacted Amazon customer service, and they said I could return them, but the shipping costs would be covered, and then the shipping costs would be returned to me as a gift card.

src: 我试问一下，我用现金支付运费，你们给我返礼品卡，这是要我自己买你们礼品卡就直说啊，还要自己把产品邮寄到德国仓库，这不是买个产品受罪啊!
ref: Let me ask you this: I pay the shipping charge in cash; will I receive a gift card in return, As a result, I will need to purchase your gift card on my own, I have to mail the item to the German warehouse, purchasing a thing is not illegal at all!
draft_translation: I asked, using cash to pay for the shipping fee, you give me a gift card. Why not just say that I need to buy the gift card myself? And I have to ship the product to the German warehouse. This isn't just buying a product, it's a hassle!
final_translation: I asked, "Why do you give me a gift card when I pay with cash? Why not just say that I need to buy the gift card myself? I also have to ship the product to the German warehouse. This isn't just buying a product—it's a hassle!"

src: 而我一直跟客服说，出现这样的问题是谁的责任，客服却半句不说是他们的责任，连半句责任都不敢担当，这样的售后服务还有什么保障呢? 一句话:认栽!但我估计我这个评价，亚马逊都不会给公布的机会，直接回删除!
ref: I have been asking the customer support who is accountable for the issue, but they have refused to acknowledge any responsibility and will not even accept it for a single word, what kind of warranty is offered for this type of post-purchase support? Planted! However, I anticipate that Amazon won't allow me a chance to publish my evaluation, so I'll just erase it
draft_translation: And I have always been telling the customer service that it's someone's fault when such a problem occurs. But the customer service didn't even say it was their responsibility, dared not take any responsibility at all. What kind of after-sales service is this? One sentence: Give up! But I think this evaluation will never be published by Amazon; they will just delete it directly!
final_translation: And I have constantly told customer service that it's someone's fault when such a problem occurs. But the customer service didn't even admit it was their responsibility, dared not take any accountability. What kind of after-sales service is this? One sentence: Give up! But I think this evaluation will never be published by Amazon; they will just delete it directly!

src: 质量很好5星，物流很差
ref: Excellent quality, 5 stars but very subpar logistics
draft_translation: The quality is excellent, 5 stars, but the logistics are poor.
final_translation: The quality is excellent, 5 stars, but the logistics are poor.

src: 1，质量很好，秒杀的，价格适中，物超所值。
ref: 1, The price is excellent, the quality is really good, and the cost is reasonable.
draft_translation: 1, the quality is very good, it's a steal, the price is reasonable, and it's worth the money.
final_translation: 1, the quality is very good, a steal, the price is reasonable, and it's worth the money.

src: 2，结实、用料足、焊点牢固、表面处理得当、颜色很好。
ref: 2, Sturdy construction, ample material, solid solder joints, appropriate surface finishing, and attractive color.
draft_translation: 2, sturdy, well-made, strong welds, proper surface treatment, and good color.
final_translation: 2, sturdy, thick material, strong welds, proper surface treatment, and good color.

src: 3，物流是硬伤，3号下的单，11号到的。
ref: 3, The logistics are inefficient, the order was placed on March 3 and was delivered on April 11.
draft_translation: The third one is a problem with logistics. The order was placed on the 3rd and arrived on the 11th.
final_translation: The third item has a logistics issue. The order was placed on the 3rd and arrived on the 11th.

ref: Everyone is anticipating this pot because of the positive comments, When I first got it, I really liked it, although it is quite lightweight, there was an issue when I opened the pot, the pot's bottom is not perfectly flat, the oil has spread to the edges if it has sunk, Large, fatty meat that was particularly purchased is fried in so much oil that it cannot cover the entire surface of the pot.

I specifically bought it to fry large pieces of fatty meat, but the oil couldn't cover the central area, causing it to burn and making it impossible to season properly. This design is likely unsuitable for normal cooking.
final_translation: Because the reviews mentioned that it's all very good, I had high expectations for this pot. When I received it, I really liked it because it was light and compact. This design is likely unsuitable for normal cooking.

final_translation: Later on, I thought, if it turns out to be disappointing after opening it, then spending so much money would be a waste; if it turns out to be good after opening it, then reassembling it would be difficult, and using it would not be pleasant.

src: 算了，就算索尼用的是好电芯吧。

src: 至于电量的详细说明，一般人看着心里会发虚。

final_translation: Regarding the detailed explanation of power levels, it often makes people feel uneasy.

src: 我还好，长期在手机厂工作过，除了不懂电路外，也算是半个电池工程师了，能顶得住。

final_translation: I'm okay. I've worked at a phone factory for a long time. Besides not understanding circuits, I can be considered half-a battery engineer and can handle the job.

src: 喜出望外

final_translation: I really didn't have a clear idea before buying, but once I opened the packaging, I felt it was truly genuine!

src: 最后当我触碰到耳机线的时候，感觉特别柔韧，质量太好了，迫不及待插到手机上打开qq音乐。
ref: The headphone cable was incredibly flexible and of such high quality that when I finally touched it, I couldn't wait to connect it to my phone and launch QQ Music.

final_translation: Finally, when I touched the headphone cable, I realized it was particularly flexible and the quality was amazing. I couldn't wait to plug it into my phone and open QQ Music.

src: 我在实体通讯店问过了，差不多的30左右，但绝不是品胜牌子的，是杂牌的，因此说这款品胜虽然27块，但是性价比绝对的值得拥有！
ref: I inquired in the actual communication store and was told that it would be around 30 or so, but it is unmistakably not the Pinsent Masons brand; instead, it is a different brand, so even if this Pinsent Masons is 27 yuan, it is well worth the money!

final_translation: I checked at a brick-and-mortar store, where similar products are around 30 yuan, but they are not Pingsheng products—they are from a generic brand. Therefore, although this Pingsheng product is only 27 yuan, its value for money is absolutely worth it!

src: 最差的网购体验
ref: Worst experience with online purchasing
draft_translation: The worst online shopping experience
final_translation: The worst online shopping experience

src: 9月28号下单后，系统显示已经发货，结果一直等到10月12号依然没有收到货。
ref: The system said that the order had been dispatched after it was placed on September 28, but the products weren't received until October 12.
draft_translation: The system showed that the order had been shipped after placing it on September 28th, but I still haven't received the package until October 12th.
final_translation: The system showed that the order had been shipped after placing it on September 28th, but I still haven't received the package by October 12th.

src: 查询亚马逊订单状态，卖家没有提供快递单号，查不到订单在哪儿。
ref: Look at the Amazon order status, the vendor did not include an express tracking number, thus I am unable to determine the location of the order.
draft_translation: The user is trying to check the status of an Amazon order, but the seller hasn't provided the shipping number, so they can't find out where the order is.
final_translation: The user is trying to check the status of an Amazon order, but the seller hasn't provided the shipping number, so they can't track the order's location.

src: 于是发邮件给卖家问是否能提供快递单号，过了两天一直没有回复。
ref: So I emailed the vendor to ask whether I could share the tracking number, but after two days there was still no response.
draft_translation: Then I sent an email to the seller asking if they could provide the shipping tracking number, but there was no reply after two days.
final_translation: Then I sent an email to the seller asking if they could provide the shipping tracking number, but there was no reply after two days.

src: 无奈之下，打亚马逊客服，客服告诉了卖家的手机号码，我再打电话问店家，打了几次之后，电话通了，被告知快递丢件了，可以立刻再重新发我一个。
ref: I dialed Amazon customer support out of desperation, the seller's mobile phone number was provided by customer support, I dialed the shop once more.
draft_translation: In desperation, I called Amazon customer service, and they provided the seller's phone number. I then called the store several times, and after several calls, the phone line connected. They informed me that the package was lost in transit and that I could immediately request a new one to be sent to me.
final_translation: In desperation, I called Amazon customer service, and they provided the seller's phone number. I then called the seller several times, and after several calls, the phone call connected. They informed me that the package was lost in transit and that I could immediately request a new one to be sent to me.

src: 虽然我特别生气，但是由于电脑急需要，所以也就没跟卖家多说，只要立刻发给我就好。
ref: Despite my intense rage, I didn't say much to the seller and simply asked for them to deliver the computer over right away because I needed it so badly.
draft_translation: Although I was very angry, since the computer was urgently needed, I didn't argue much with the seller. Just send it to me immediately.
final_translation: Although I was very angry, since the computer was urgently needed, I didn't argue much with the seller. Please send it to me immediately.

src: 结果，第二天打电话问，发货了吗？
ref: I called the following day to inquire as a result: Has it been shipped?
draft_translation: Result, the next day called to ask, has it been shipped yet?
final_translation: So, the next day, he called to ask, has it been shipped yet?

src: 卖家说还没，下午才能发。
ref: Not yet, according to the vendor; it will be available in the afternoon.
draft_translation: The seller said it hasn't been sent yet and will be sent in the afternoon.
final_translation: The seller said it hasn't been sent yet and will be sent in the afternoon.

src: 我下午又打电话问，卖家说一定发，下午五六点之后发货，结果等我晚上七点打电话，电话就没人接了。
ref: The seller told me it will be delivered after five or six in the afternoon when I called again in the afternoon, but when I called at seven in the evening, nobody picked up.
draft_translation: I called again in the afternoon, and the seller said they would definitely ship it, stating it would be shipped after 5 or 6 PM. But when I called again at 7 PM in the evening, the phone was no longer answerable.
final_translation: I called again in the afternoon, and the seller said they would definitely ship it, stating it would be shipped after 5 or 6 PM. But when I called again at 7 PM in the evening, the phone was no longer answering.

src: 第三天上午我又打，问货发出去了吗？
ref: I contacted once more on the morning of the third day and enquired as to whether the things had been dispatched?
draft_translation: I asked again in the morning of the third day, has the goods been shipped out?
final_translation: I asked again in the morning of the third day, has the goods been shipped out?

src: 可以告诉我订单号了么？
ref: Could you let me know the order number?
draft_translation: Can you tell me the order number?
final_translation: Can you tell me the order number?

src: 卖家说没发，告诉我要是着急的话让我从别家订货，要是可以等的话下午就发。
ref: The vendor claimed he didn't ship it and advised me to get it from another store if I needed it right away, If I could wait, he said, I could send it in the afternoon.
draft_translation: The seller said they hadn't shipped it yet. If you're in a hurry, I can order it from another place. If you don't mind waiting, I'll ship it by afternoon.
final_translation: The seller said they hadn't shipped it yet. If you're in a hurry, we can order it from another place. If you don't mind waiting, I'll ship it by afternoon.

src: 没办法，从别家下单又要等好久。
ref: No way, placing an order from another store takes a lot of time.
draft_translation: No choice, placing an order from another place would take a long time too.
final_translation: There's no choice; placing an order from another place would take a long time.

src: 就只能拜托卖家赶紧发货。
ref: Just request rapid shipping from the seller.
draft_translation: I can only ask the seller to ship it as soon as possible.
final_translation: I can only ask the seller to ship it as soon as possible.

src: 终于在无数个电话跟踪之后，我在10月16号收到了电脑。

src: 至于电脑的质量怎样，我不知道，因为是给别人买的，后期再追加评论吧。

final_translation: As for the quality of the computer, I don't know because I bought it for someone else. I'll add more comments later.

ref: It has a horrible contact presently, despite the fact that I've only had it for six months and haven't used it much, Can I have it fixed?

final_translation: It's been less than six months since I bought it, and I've used it only a few times. Now it's having connection problems. Can you fix it for me?

ref: Since I acquired it, I've occasionally not used it because I have a desktop computer.

final_translation: Because there is a desktop computer, it hasn't been used very often after buying it.

ref: Recently, it was discovered that it was not charging when the power was turned on, To charge it, you had to repeatedly hold the charger's cable connection in place with your hands.
draft_translation: Recently, it was found that when connecting to power, it does not charge. It needs to be manually adjusted by holding the charger and cable connection part left and right to charge.
final_translation: Recently, it was found that when connecting to power, the device does not charge. It requires manually shaking the charger and cable connection part left and right to charge.

src: 怀疑是接口处接触不良，不知道现在还能给修吗？
ref: The interface may not be connected properly, according to speculation, can it be fixed right now, I wonder?

final_translation: It's suspected to be a poor connection at the interface. Do you think it can still be repaired now?

src: 强烈建议亚马逊停用EMS ！

final_translation: It is strongly recommended that Amazon disable EMS!

final_translation: The product is five-star, logistics is one-star, average three stars.

src: 不懂为什么亚马逊要寄EMS，业内公认的不靠谱，好嘛，电脑好歹也是贵重物品啊！

final_translation: I don't understand why Amazon sent it via EMS. It's widely recognized as unreliable. After all, a computer is still a valuable item!

src: 买后订单显示，预计20号送达，于是家里人在家等了三天！

final_translation: The post-purchase order shows that it is expected to arrive on the 20th, so the family waited at home for three days!

final_translation: It takes about four to five days to send a package from Xiamen to Fuzhou, why so long?

src: 22号早上查物流终于到福州了，准备开开心心收货，结果，晚上在没收到任何电话、短信的情况下，一查物流，竟然中午就被签收了，还显示的本人签收！
ref: I verified the logistics early on February 22nd and eventually made it to Fuzhou, I was happy and prepared to accept the gifts, So without getting any calls or texts, I reviewed the logistics at night!
draft_translation: The logistics information finally arrived in Fuzhou this morning on the 22nd. I was excited to receive the package. However, later that evening, I didn't receive any calls or messages, and when I checked the logistics status again, it turned out the package had been signed for in the afternoon and even showed that it was signed by the person themselves!
final_translation: The logistics status finally arrived in Fuzhou on the morning of the 22nd. I was excited to receive the package. However, later that evening, I received no calls or messages. When I checked the logistics status again, it turned out the package had been delivered by noon and even showed it was signed by the recipient!

src: 我瞬间震惊了！

ref: Finally, I returned the machine to the collecting location.

final_translation: I finally brought the computer back after making a final trip to the collection center.

src: 具体原因简单说就是因为快递小哥把两个单号弄反了，好在件没丢也就算了。
ref: The item is fortunately not lost, but specifically because the courier brother just switched the two tracking numbers.
draft_translation: The specific reason is simply that the delivery person mixed up the two order numbers. Fortunately, the packages weren't lost, so it's not a big deal.

src: 我强烈建议亚马逊不要用EMS了，以后亚马逊如果用EMS寄的快递，我一定不会再买了。
ref: I firmly advise Amazon not to employ EMS, I won't buy it again from Amazon if they start using EMS for rapid shipping in the future.
draft_translation: I strongly recommend that Amazon should not use EMS anymore. If Amazon continues to use EMS for shipping in the future, I will definitely no longer buy from them.
final_translation: I strongly recommend that Amazon should not use EMS anymore. If Amazon continues to use EMS for shipping in the future, I will definitely no longer buy from them.

src: 货还不错
ref: The products are not of poor quality
draft_translation: The goods are quite good.
final_translation: The products are good.

src: 首先说一句刚买了几天就发现降价了，差评，本还算不错，性价比高，cpu和显卡足够应付主流网游和相当一部分大型单机了，散热非常好，但屏幕有点漏光(ips屏的通病)，音响质量不太好，硬盘不好(建议自己花点钱加个固态)，昨天拿去售后检测了一下硬件，没有任何问题，自带的win8.1不太好用，建议升级成10，卖家发货很快，各项询问回答的也很快，收到电脑第二天发票就到了，不错，可惜什么赠品都没有。
ref: First and foremost, I purchased it a few days ago and discovered that the price had been dropped, the book is not bad, but the price is exorbitant, the CPU and graphics card are sufficient for most online games and a few huge single computers, the heat dissipation is very good, but the screen is a bit light leaking (IPS screen) (Common problems), the audio quality is not very good, and the hard disk is not very good (it is recommended to spend some money to add a solid state), I took it to the after-sales service yesterday to test the hardware, no problem, the built-in win8.1 is not very easy to use, It is recommended to upgrade to 10, The merchant delivered the goods immediately and responded to all inquiries promptly, after obtaining the PC, the invoice arrived the following day, not terrible, but there are no gifts unfortunately.
draft_translation: First, I should mention that I bought it a few days ago and found it had dropped in price, so it's a bad review. Overall, it's still decent with good value for money. The CPU and GPU are sufficient for mainstream online games and a significant portion of large single-player games. The cooling is very good, but the screen has some light leakage (a common issue with IPS screens). The speakers are of poor quality, and the hard drive is not great (it's recommended to spend a little extra money to add an SSD). Yesterday, I took it to the after-sales service for hardware inspection, and there were no problems. The pre-installed Windows 8.1 is not easy to use, so it's recommended to upgrade to Windows 10. The seller ships quickly, and they respond quickly to all inquiries. The invoice arrived the day after I received the computer, which is good. Unfortunately, there were no gifts included.
final_translation: First, I should mention that I bought it a few days ago and found it had dropped in price, so it's a negative review. Overall, it's still acceptable with good value for money. The CPU and GPU are sufficient for mainstream online games and a large number of large single-player games. The cooling is very good, but the screen has some light leakage (a common issue with IPS screens). The speakers are of poor quality, and the hard drive is not great (it's recommended to spend a little extra money to add an SSD). Yesterday, I took it to the after-sales service for hardware inspection, and there were no problems. The pre-installed Windows 8.1 is not user-friendly, so it's recommended to upgrade to Windows 10. The seller ships quickly, and they respond quickly to all inquiries. The invoice arrived the day after I received the computer, which is good. Unfortunately, there were no gifts included.

src: (顺便提一句买键盘贴膜一定不要去某宝一家叫E酷数码中心的店买，发货慢质量差，产品有问题不退不换，老板还满嘴脏话，特别曝光一下)

The shipping is slow, the quality is poor, and if there's a problem with the product, they won't accept returns or exchanges. The owner also talks dirty words. I want to expose this clearly.
final_translation: By the way, when buying keyboard membrane, definitely avoid the store called Eku Digital Center on Taobao. The shipping is slow, the quality is poor, and if there's a problem with the product, they won't accept returns or exchanges. The owner uses vulgar language. I want to expose this.

final_translation: The product is good, but the platform's bureaucracy remains.

src: 硬盘质量非常好，性价比绝对高，比香港买还便宜，不急着用和可以忍受物流的话绝对推荐购买。
ref: The hard disk's quality is excellent, and the price/performance ratio is excellent, It is less expensive than purchasing in Hong Kong, It is strongly advised to purchase if you are not in a hurry and can tolerate the logistics.
draft_translation: The hard drive has excellent quality and is definitely a great value for money. It's even cheaper than buying it in Hong Kong. If you don't need it urgently and can tolerate the logistics time, I highly recommend purchasing it.
final_translation: The hard drive has excellent quality and is definitely a great value for money. It's even cheaper than buying it in Hong Kong. If you don't need it urgently and can tolerate the logistics time, I highly recommend purchasing it.

src: 但不得不说的是亚马逊平台之官僚依旧，与几年前我发誓绝对不用的时候没有改进，你永远查不到实际物流状况，信息永远是几个星期以后送到，永远不能投诉，就是这么官僚！
ref: But I must remark that the Amazon platform's bureaucracy remains unchanged, it hasn't improved since I said I'd never use it again a couple years ago, you will never learn the true logistical situation, you can never complain because the information is always supplied after a few weeks, that's all there is to it: bureaucracy!

You will never be able to find the actual logistics status, the information is always that it will be delivered weeks later, and you can never complain. It's just bureaucratic like that!
final_translation: But it must be said that the bureaucracy on the Amazon platform remains unchanged, no better than when I vowed I would never use it again a few years ago. You will never be able to find the actual logistics status; the information is always that it is delivered weeks later, and you can never complain. It's bureaucratic as such!

src: 我联系厂家问手表在入库有核对时间吗?他们回复说“有”，既然有，那为啥时间相差那么多，那肯定是手表没有精确度，简单地说就是水货产品，不是我说的难听，看嘛，很明显的质量问题（数字显示不完全）都拿出来卖，是不是垃圾货。
ref: I contacted the manufacturer and asked if there was a time check on the watch in the warehouse, they replied "yes", since there is, so then why is the time difference so much? That must be because the watch is not accurate, simply put, it is a water product, not what I said, look well, as there are very obvious quality problems (digital display is not complete) and are taken out to sell, are not junk goods.
draft_translation: I contacted the manufacturer to ask if there is a time check when the watch is stored in the warehouse. They replied that there is. It's not that I'm being harsh, look at it, there are obvious quality issues (incomplete digital display), and they still take them out to sell. Is it garbage?
final_translation: I contacted the manufacturer to ask if there is a time verification when the watch is stored in the warehouse. They replied that there is. If there is, then why is there such a big time difference? It must be that the watch lacks precision, in simple terms, it's a second-hand product. final_translation: Contact Amazon customer service separately; the item can only be mailed to the United States at your own expense, with the shipping fee to be reimbursed later.

src: 5、2分的原因是客服服务还不错。
ref: 5, 2 points because customer service is not subpar.
draft_translation: The reason for 5 points and 2 points is that the customer service is quite good.
final_translation: The reason for a 5-point rating and a 2-point rating is that the customer service was quite good.

src: 只能说还凑合
ref: All I can say is that it isn't bad
draft_translation: It's just okay.
final_translation: It's passable.

src: 时间不是非常准，每天约快一秒，用了才几个月已经快两分多了。
ref: Only a few months have seen speeds more than two minutes, and time is not very accurate, moving forward by around a second per day.
draft_translation: The time is not very accurate, it is about one second fast each day. After a few months, it has already been more than two minutes fast.
final_translation: The time is not very accurate, it is about a second fast each day. After a few months, it has already gained more than two minutes.

src: 以前用过一块西铁城的，感觉一两年也不会差几秒。
ref: I've used Citizen previously, and I believe that it won't lag behind by a few seconds in a year or two.
draft_translation: I used one from Seiko before, and it never loses more than a few seconds over one or two years.
final_translation: I used one from Citizen before, and it never gains more than a few seconds over one or two years.

src: 万年历功能倒是蛮不错，计时功能有点鸡肋，基本用不到，偶尔会误触进入计时模式。
ref: While the timing function is a bit bland and hardly ever utilized, the perpetual calendar function is pretty wonderful, on occasion, it will unintentionally switch to timing mode.
draft_translation: The perpetual calendar function is actually quite good, but the timing function is a bit of a hindrance. It's rarely used, and occasionally it accidentally enters the timing mode.
final_translation: The perpetual calendar function is actually quite good, but the timing function is somewhat useless. It's rarely used, and occasionally it accidentally switches into timing mode.

src: 太阳能运动手表
ref: solar-powered sports watch
draft_translation: Solar-powered sports watch
final_translation: Solar-powered sports watch

src: 优点：太阳能充电不用担心须更换电池、具备世界时间、多种闹铃及整点提醒。
ref: Benefits: world time, a variety of alarms, and full point reminders, solar charging eliminates the need to worry about replacing the battery.
draft_translation: Advantages: Solar charging eliminates the need to replace batteries, features world time, multiple alarms, and hourly reminders.
final_translation: Advantages: Solar charging eliminates the need to replace batteries, features world time function, multiple alarms, and hourly alerts.

src: 不足：镜面容易划伤、进灰尘。
ref: Shortcomings: The mirror surface is vulnerable to dust buildup and scratches.
draft_translation: The shortcomings are that the mirror is easy to scratch and prone to dust accumulation.
final_translation: The shortcomings are that the mirror is prone to scratches and prone to dust accumulation.

src: 性价比：国内一般价格在220-300之间，海外购到手180多（用时1周左右）。
ref: Value for money: While it costs, on average, between 220 and 300 in China, it may be acquired for more than 180 abroad (with about 1 week).
draft_translation: The cost-performance ratio: the general price domestically is between 220 and 300, while overseas purchases cost over 180 (taking about a week).
final_translation: The value for money: typical prices domestically range between 220 and 300, while overseas purchases cost around 180 (taking roughly a week).

src: 很满意的手表
ref: Very pleased with the watch
draft_translation: Satisfied watch
final_translation: A satisfactory watch

src: 肯定是正品，去专柜验过货，表的外观很漂亮，做工精细，用料足，加上又是进口机械机芯，所以是有一定的分量的，是那些三四百所谓的机械表不能比的，这个是货真价实的。
ref: It has to be genuine, I went to the desk to inspect the merchandise, the watch has a lovely aesthetic, superb craftsmanship, adequate materials, and an imported mechanical movement, so it has weight, those three or four hundred so-called mechanical watches are inoperable, by the way, this is the real deal.
draft_translation: It's definitely genuine. I checked it at the official counter, and the appearance of the watch is very nice, with meticulous craftsmanship and good materials. Plus, it's an imported mechanical movement, so it has a certain weight, which is definitely better than those so-called mechanical watches priced around 300 yuan. This is truly worth the price.
final_translation: It's definitely genuine. I checked it at the official counter, and the appearance of the watch is very nice, with meticulous craftsmanship and good materials. Plus, it's an imported mechanical movement, so it has a certain weight, which is definitely better than those so-called mechanical watches priced at around 300 yuan. This is truly worth its price.

src: 表的走时是很准的，误差完全在可接受范围内，表的包装里有珠宝鉴定证书，表盘的12字那里是真钻石，这个自己戴很合适，作为礼品送出去也很有面子。
ref: The watch's trip time is extremely accurate, and its error is entirely within acceptable bounds, the 12 on the dial is a genuine diamond, and a certificate of jewelry appraisal is included with the watch, both as a present and as something you may wear by yourself, this is excellent.
draft_translation: The watch runs very accurately, with an error completely within acceptable limits. The packaging includes a gemstone certification, and the 12 o'clock position on the dial is genuine diamond. Wearing it yourself is very comfortable, and it also makes a great gift that gives a good impression.
final_translation: The watch keeps time accurately, with an error completely within acceptable limits. The packaging includes a gemstone certification, and the 12 o'clock area on the dial is genuine diamond. Wearing it is very comfortable, and it also makes a great gift that gives a good impression.

src: 宾利表确实不错。
ref: The timepieces made by Bentley are excellent.
draft_translation: Bentley watches are indeed quite good.
final_translation: Bentley watches are indeed quite good.

src: 有史以来体验最差的一次购物
ref: One of the worst buying experiences I've ever had
draft_translation: The worst shopping experience ever
final_translation: The worst shopping experience ever

src: 9月23日晚上老婆手机摔了，心血来潮立马来亚马逊订购了一台8p，有货但是不是自营的且没有加价（心里暗喜），由于不是自营的发货比较慢，系统显示预计最晚收货要到9月27日。
ref: My wife dropped her phone on the night of September 23rd, I ordered an 8p from Amazon on the spur of the moment, It was available, but it was not self-operated, and there was no price increase (I was secretly relieved), because non-self-operated delivery is relatively delayed, the system indicates that it is expected to be the most recent, the delivery date is September 27th.
draft_translation: The wife's phone broke on the evening of September 23. Inspired by this, I immediately ordered an 8P on Amazon. There was stock available, but it wasn't from Amazon's own store and there was no price increase (I was secretly happy). Since it wasn't from Amazon's own store, the shipping was slow, and the system showed the latest expected delivery date as September 27.
final_translation: The wife's phone broke on the evening of September 23. Inspired by this, I immediately ordered an 8P on Amazon. There was stock available, but it wasn't from Amazon's own store and there was no price increase (I was secretly happy). Since it wasn't from Amazon's own store, the shipping was slow, and the system showed the expected latest delivery date as September 27.

src: 老婆没手机用难受死了，第二天一早6点多叫我在想想办法，后来上京东一看256G有货可以当天送到，只得立马再订购一台。
ref: My wife felt really uncomfortable with the absence of a mobile phone, I was requested to come up with a solution the next morning at 6:00 am Later, I returned to Jingdong and saw that the 256G was in stock and could be delivered the same day, so I ordered another one right away.
draft_translation: It's really annoying when my wife can't use her phone. The next morning at around 6 o'clock, she called me and asked me to think of a solution. Later, when I checked JD.com, I saw that 256G models were available and could be delivered the same day. So I had to order another one right away.
final_translation: It's really annoying when my wife can't use her phone. The next morning at around 6 o'clock, she called me and asked me to think of a solution. Later, when I checked JD.com, I saw that 256GB models were available and could be delivered the same day. So I had to order another one right away.

src: 新的买好了，就想着马上把亚马逊的订单给取消。
ref: I planned to cancel the Amazon order as soon as I purchased the new one.
draft_translation: The new one is bought, just thinking about canceling the Amazon order right away.
final_translation: The new one has been bought, and I just want to cancel the Amazon order immediately.

src: 由于订单是半夜下的，没可能凌晨来收快递，7点多打给客服要求取消订单，客服答复已经取消请等待短信通知。
ref: Because the order was placed in the middle of the night, the courier could not arrive in the early morning, I called customer service after 7 o'clock and requested that the order be cancelled, the customer support representative said that it has been canceled, and to wait for the SMS message.
draft_translation: The order was placed in the late night, so it's impossible for the courier to come to collect it in the early morning. At around 7 o'clock, the user called the customer service to cancel the order. The customer service replied that the order has been canceled and asked to wait for the SMS notification.
final_translation: The order was placed in the late night, so it's impossible for the courier to come to collect it in the early morning. At around 7 o'clock, the customer called customer service to cancel the order. Customer service replied that the order has been canceled and requested to wait for the SMS notification.

src: 好吧，我就耐心的等着，到了中午上手机一看，订单还在状态还处于未发货，就立马联系客服要求赶快取消订单，客服答复已经操作OK。
ref: So I simply waited patiently, when I checked my phone at midday, the order was still in the status and had not been delivered, I immediately contacted the customer service and requested that the order be canceled as quickly as possible, customer service responded that the operation was well.
draft_translation: Okay, I'll wait patiently. By noon, I check my phone and find that the order is still in the "not shipped" status. I immediately contact customer service to request the order to be canceled as soon as possible. The customer service replies that the operation has been completed.
final_translation: Okay, I will wait patiently. By noon, I check my phone and find that the order is still in the "not shipped" status. I immediately contact customer service to request the order to be canceled as soon as possible. The customer service replies that the operation has been canceled.

src: 到了下午3点上手机一看订单还在，没办法只能再次联系客服明确告知已经第三次来电了，请取消订单并通知卖家务必不要发货！
ref: I checked the order on my phone at 3:00 pm and saw that it was still there, I had no alternative but to contact the customer support again to inform them that this was the third call, please cancel the order and notify the seller that it will not be shipped!
draft_translation: By 3 PM, I checked my phone and found the order was still there. There was no choice but to contact customer service again to clearly inform them that this was the third call. Please cancel the order and notify the seller to definitely not ship it!
final_translation: By 3 PM, I checked my phone and found the order still pending. With no choice but to contact customer service again, I clearly informed them this was the third call. Please cancel the order and notify the seller to must not ship it!

src: 客服在我要求下当场联系了卖家，并告知我卖家不熟悉系统，要等熟悉系统后再操作取消订单。
ref: At my request, customer support contacted the seller on the spot and informed me that the seller is unfamiliar with the system and will cancel the order once he becomes acquainted with it.
draft_translation: The customer service representative contacted the seller on my request and informed me that the seller is not familiar with the system and needs to wait until they become familiar with it before proceeding to cancel the order.
final_translation: The customer service representative contacted the seller on my request and informed me that the seller is not familiar with the system and needs to wait until he becomes familiar with it before proceeding with canceling the order.

src: 但是明确告诉我卖家已经知道了，绝对不会发货的请放心。
ref: But please reassure me that the seller is aware and will never ship if you can.
draft_translation: But please rest assured that the seller is aware and will definitely not ship it.
final_translation: But please rest assured that the seller is aware and has decided not to ship the item.

src: 等到周一我再看订单显示，竟然已经发货了，我也是无语了。
ref: I was in awe when I noticed that the purchase had already been dispatched when I checked the order display on Monday.
draft_translation: I'll check the order status on Monday, but it's already been shipped— I'm speechless.
final_translation: I'll check the order status on Monday, but it's already been shipped— I'm speechless.

src: 由于无法直接联系卖家，只能再次致电客服。
ref: I can only phone customer service since I can't get in touch with the merchant directly.
draft_translation: Since we can't contact the seller directly, we have to call the customer service again.
final_translation: Since we can't contact the seller directly, we have to call the customer service again.

src: 后面的处理简直无语，基本都是我说一步，客服才接着操作一下。
ref: After that, I'm just at a loss for words, in essence, I say do this action, and customer service will continue to operate.
draft_translation: The subsequent handling is truly beyond comprehension. Basically, I have to take each step, and the customer service representative only proceeds with a minimal action.
final_translation: The subsequent process is utterly frustrating. I have to take each step one by one, and the customer service staff only takes minimal action.

src: 订单到目前为止还是处于派件拒收状态，正准备再次派送！
ref: The order is getting ready to send it again and is currently still in the delivery refusal phase!
draft_translation: The order is still in a state of refused delivery, and we are about to attempt delivery again!
final_translation: The order is still in a refused delivery state, and we are about to attempt delivery again!

src: 亚马逊难道不会主动跟进下吗？
ref: Wouldn't Amazon go out of their way to follow up?
draft_translation: Will Amazon follow up on this actively?
final_translation: Will Amazon proactively take action?

src: 卖家公司反正也收了钱不跟进也无所谓了。
ref: It makes no difference if the seller's company has already collected the money and does not follow up.
draft_translation: The sales company doesn't really care since they've already received the money; it doesn't matter if they don't follow up.
final_translation: The sales company does not care since they have already received the money; it does not matter if they do not follow up.

src: 总结下以后大件绝对不会预付钱了，这个样子太麻烦了。
ref: To summarize, there will never again be prepayment for huge products, this is really too bothersome.
draft_translation: Summarize that large items will never require advance payment in the future, as this is too troublesome.
final_translation: It is concluded that large items will never require advance payment in the future, as this is too troublesome.

src: 看起来很美好
ref: Good looking
draft_translation: It looks very beautiful.
final_translation: It looks beautiful.

src: 很久以前就看中这个摄像头了，但是因为除了价格外，还有一些别的原因，所以没有购买，这次因为凑包邮，价格也还可以所以就买了。
ref: This camera has long since captured my heart, but I have refrained from purchasing it for reasons other than the cost, this time, I purchased it because it came with free shipping and the pricing was reasonable.
draft_translation: I've been eyeing this camera for a long time, but I didn't buy it because there were other reasons besides the price. This time, since it's included in a bundle with free shipping and the price is acceptable, I decided to purchase it.
final_translation: I've been eyeing this camera for a long time, but I didn't buy it because there were other reasons besides the price. This time, since it's part of a set with free shipping and the price is acceptable, I decided to purchase it.

src: 买来之后其他的都没什么问题，就是在软件连接的时候，怎么都连不上，我家是TP的路由器，上网查了之后发现好多人都有这个问题，弄了两个多小时，各种改路由器的设置，最后我用360WIFI作为媒介给弄好的，期间给小米客服打电话，他们对这个问题也没有什么解决方法，直接就让我联系亚马逊进行售后。
ref: Other things were fine once I got it, but when the program was connected, I was unable to connect, a TP router is at my house, I discovered after searching the Internet that this issue affects a lot of people, more than two hours later, I made several adjustments, in the end, I configured the router using 360WIFI as the medium, during that time, I called Xiaomi customer service, but they didn't have an answer for this issue, they merely instructed me to get in touch with Amazon for customer support.
draft_translation: After buying it, there were no other problems, but when trying to connect to the software, I couldn't connect at all. My home router is a TP-link one. After searching online, I found that many people have this issue. I spent more than two hours adjusting the router settings. Finally, I used 360WIFI as a medium to fix it. During this process, I called Xiaomi customer service, but they didn't have any solutions and directly told me to contact Amazon for after-sales service.
final_translation: After buying it, there were no other problems, but when trying to connect to the software app, I couldn't connect at all. My home router is a TP-Link one. After searching online, I found that many people have this issue. I spent more than two hours adjusting the router settings. Finally, I used 360WIFI as a medium to fix it. During this process, I called Xiaomi customer service, but they didn't have any solutions and directly told me to contact Amazon for after-sales service.

src: 另外一点值得注意的就是我在网上看到用户的评论说，这个摄像头支持的存储卡最小是8G，存储容量更小的就不能识别，希望大家注意这点。
ref: A further aspect worth mentioning is that, according to user comments I read online, the least memory card supported by this camera is 8G, and memory cards with a smaller storage capacity cannot be detected, I hope everyone is paying attention to this.
draft_translation: Another point worth noting is that I saw users' comments online saying that the camera supports storage cards starting from 8GB, and smaller capacities cannot be recognized. Please everyone be aware of this point.
final_translation: Another point worth noting is that I saw users' comments online saying that the camera supports storage cards starting from 8GB, and smaller capacity cannot be recognized. Please be aware of this point.

src: 用起来感觉还可以吧，画面还可以接受，但声音音质很差，机器有一定程度的发热，一直开启的话，感觉这种程度的发热有点让人难以接受。
ref: It's comfortable to use, the picture is good, but the sound quality is bad and the machine gets hot, if it is always switched on, it feels as if this level of heat is intolerable.
draft_translation: The usage feels acceptable, the visuals are manageable, but the audio quality is poor. The device does generate some heat, and if kept running continuously, this level of heat is somewhat difficult to accept.
final_translation: The user experience feels decent, the visuals are tolerable, but the audio quality is poor. The device does generate some heat, and if kept running continuously, this level of heat is somewhat unacceptable.

src: 综上所述，本产品还有诸多不足，希望大家买的时候要慎重。
ref: To summarize, this product still has numerous flaws, and I hope you would be cautious while purchasing it.
draft_translation: In summary, this product still has many shortcomings, so I hope everyone will be cautious when purchasing.
final_translation: In summary, this product still has many shortcomings, so I hope everyone will be cautious when purchasing.

src: 之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，一直到现在。
ref: Due to the fact that I purchased it with my first love in my life, I gave it 3 stars, after almost 3 years of dating, he abruptly broke up with me last year and has not returned.
draft_translation: The reason for giving 3 stars is that this is the one I bought for my first love of life. We dated for almost three years, and he passed away last year. To this day, he remains with me.
final_translation: The reason for giving 3 stars is that this was the gift I bought for my first love. We dated for almost three years, and he passed away last year. To this day, he remains in my heart.

src: 之所以给3星，是因为这个是和人生的初恋买的，现在不知道用到什么程度了，或许扔掉了吧！
ref: I gave it 3 stars since I bought it with my first love in my life and now I'm not sure how much I've used it, so maybe toss it away!
draft_translation: I gave it three stars because it was bought as a first love gift. Now I'm not sure how much I've used it, maybe I'll throw it away!
final_translation: I gave it three stars because it was bought as a gift for my first love. Now I'm not sure how much I've used it—maybe I'll throw it away!

src: 交往了快3年，就这样于去年离我而去了，到现在一想起她，就心痛的想要离开这个世界，人生中第一个女人，带给我一辈子的阴影和心痛，迄今还没能走出来。
ref: Almost 3 years of romance, so she left me last year, and now when I think of her, I want to quit the world, the first lady in my life, given me a lifetime of darkness and pain, and I have not been able to get out of it so far.
draft_translation: I have been in a relationship for almost three years, and she left me last year. To this day, whenever I think of her, I feel so painful that I want to leave this world. She was my first love, bringing me lifelong shadows and heartache. I have still not been able to move on from this.
final_translation: I have been in a relationship for almost three years, and she left me last year. To this day, whenever I think of her, I feel so painful that I want to leave this world. She was my first love, bringing me a lifelong shadow and heartache. I have still not been able to move on from this.

src: 买这个手机的时候，想想两个当时感觉，还是能一起同甘共苦，但现在却是不堪回首，人生或许就是这样吧，有些人一辈子都不想遇到，有些事儿一辈子都不想知道，可是有什么办法呢？
ref: I considered how the two felt at the time I got this cell phone, I could still join in their pleasures and sufferings, but I am unable to do so at this time, perhaps this is how life is, some people don't want to meet in their lifetime, and some things don't want to know in their lifetime, but what can be done?
draft_translation: When I bought this phone, I thought about the two feelings at that time, and we could share both the good and the bad. But now it's hard to look back, maybe life is just like that. Some people never want to meet, and some things never want to know. But what can we do?

src: 多少次一看到三星这个手机，脑海就想起她，那种痛苦就随之而来灌满全身，我从没舍得用过超过2千元的手机，可是买给她的时候，却毫不犹豫，对一个人再好，可是有天当她变心了，所有的山盟海誓也就烟消云散了。
ref: How many times have I seen a Samsung mobile phone and thought about her, and the agony has filled my entire body? I was never willing to use a phone worth more than 2,000 yuan, but I didn't hesitate when I bought it for her, no matter how nice you are to someone, when she changes her mind one day, all the promises will disappear.
draft_translation: Every time I see a Samsung phone, my mind immediately thinks of her, and a sense of pain floods my body. I have never been willing to spend more than 2,000 yuan on a phone, but when I bought it for her, I did so without hesitation. How kind you can be to someone, but one day when she turns her back on you, all your vows and promises vanish like smoke.
final_translation: Every time I see a Samsung phone, my mind immediately thinks of her, and a sense of pain floods my body. I have never been willing to spend more than 2,000 yuan on a phone, but when I bought it for her, I did so without hesitation. How kind you are to someone, but one day when she turns her back on you, all your vows and promises vanish like smoke.

src: 国产品牌中的精品
ref: The top national brands
draft_translation: Top-tier brands among domestic products
final_translation: Premium domestic brands

src: 华为是国货中的精品。
ref: Huawei is the best of national products.
draft_translation: Huawei is a premium domestic brand.
final_translation: Huawei is a top-tier domestic brand.

src: 低调的老总和企业，靠的是技术和质量取胜来赢得客户，这跟当下靠广告运作来提高知名度的营商风气截然不同！
ref: Unlike the current corporate climate, which depends on promotion to grow popularity, low-key CEOs and businesses win clients through technology and quality!
draft_translation: The modest boss and the company rely on technology and quality to win customers, which is entirely different from the current business trend of relying on advertising to enhance visibility.
final_translation: The low-key boss and the company succeed through technology and quality to win customers, which is completely different from the current business practice of relying on advertising to boost visibility.

src: 没有实力的企业根本不可能做到这样，也不敢这么做！
ref: This is difficult for a corporation lacking in strength, and it would be foolish to attempt it!
draft_translation: A company without the strength simply cannot do this, and dare not do it!
final_translation: A company without the strength simply cannot do this, and won't do it!

src: 正是源于此，我才选择了华为。
ref: I decided on Huawei because of this.
draft_translation: It is precisely because of this that I have chosen Huawei.
final_translation: It is precisely because of this that I have chosen Huawei.

src: 买来用了半年多了，感觉一直很好，非常不错。
ref: Since I purchased it more than six months ago, it continues to feel excellent all the time, very good.
draft_translation: This has been used for more than half a year, and I have felt it is very good all the time. It's really excellent.
final_translation: This has been used for over half a year, and I have felt it is very good all the time. It's really excellent.

src: 之所以没有给满分，是因为有一次在用它的离线导航时，出现了不定位现象，我最终没有找出原因，其他时候都很好。
ref: It was fine, but I didn't give it a perfect score because there was a non-location occurrence once when I was using its offline navigation, and I never did figure out why.
draft_translation: The reason why it didn't get a full score is that there was an issue with the offline navigation where it failed to locate properly. I was unable to determine the cause, but it worked well otherwise.
final_translation: The reason it didn't receive a full score is that there was an issue with the offline navigation where it failed to locate properly. I couldn't determine the cause, but it worked well otherwise.

src: 而且它的在线输入好了目的地，搜索之后自动设计出路线，离开wifi出发以后，它自动离线导航的功能很实用，不用跑流量，它直接跟卫星对话来实现定位及导航，非常好！
ref: Additionally, it has entered the destination online and, after searching, creates the route automatically, after disconnecting from the Wi-Fi, its automated offline navigation feature is very helpful since it instantly communicates with the satellite to achieve positioning and navigation without having to navigate through traffic, which is excellent!
draft_translation: And its online input is convenient for destination entry, and after searching, it automatically designs a route. Once it leaves the WiFi, its automatic offline navigation function is very practical, as it doesn't consume data. It directly communicates with satellites for positioning and navigation, which is excellent!
final_translation: And its online destination entry is convenient, as it automatically designs a route after searching. Once it leaves WiFi, its automatic offline navigation function is very practical, as it doesn't consume data usage. It directly communicates with satellites for positioning and navigation, which is excellent!

src: 索尼大法好
ref: Sony's great approach is effective
draft_translation: Sony is great
final_translation: Sony is great

src: 索尼的这种低端机，设计感依旧十足，而且价格便宜，屏幕够大，续航力一级棒，给老人使用很合适。
ref: Sony's entry-level phone still has a solid sense of design, is reasonably priced, has a sizable screen, and has exceptional battery life, the elderly will benefit much from it.
draft_translation: The low-end model from Sony still has a strong design, is affordable, has a large screen, and offers excellent battery life, making it very suitable for the elderly.
final_translation: The Sony low-end model still boasts a distinctive design, is affordable, features a large screen, and offers excellent battery life, making it ideal for elderly users.

src: 虽然时间已经过去很久了，但这机器依旧没什么毛病。
ref: Even though time has gone, this machine is still in perfect working order.
draft_translation: Although a long time has passed, this machine still has no problems.
final_translation: Although a long time has passed, this machine still has no problems.

src: 不过因为我的Z2下放了，所以这台手机也完成了使命。
ref: But as my Z2 is decentralized, this phone's task has also been accomplished.
draft_translation: However, since my Z2 was downgraded, this phone has completed its mission.
final_translation: However, since my Z2 was retired, this phone has completed its mission.
